translation.en: Allied Democratic Forces gained access to intelligence.
translation.lug: Allied Democratic Forces yasobola okuketta.

translation.en: Uganda Patriotic Movement calls for change of Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Uganda Patriotic Movement eyagala enkyukakyuka mu kakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: Life after Kampala bombing.
translation.lug: Embeera y'obulamu oluvannyuma lwa bbomu ezaakubwa mu Kampala.

translation.en: Former Allied Democratic Forces rebels warned of return to terror activities.
translation.lug: Abaaliko abayeekera ba Allied Democratic Forces baalabudde okuddamu ebikolwa eby'entiisa.

translation.en: At the Lugogo terror scene, security found a Koran next to the severed head of the suicide bomber.
translation.lug: E Lugogo ewaakolebwa obutujju, ab'ebyokwerinda baasanga Kolaani okumpi n'omutwe gw'omutujju eyatega bbomu.

translation.en: Inside the Koran were telephone numbers which also have given police important leads.
translation.lug: Munda mu Kolaani mwalimu ennamba z'amasimu eziyambye poliisi okufuna okubagulizibwako okw'omugaso.

translation.en: From these leads, police believe the bombs were assembled in Kampala, largely but not entirely, around Namasuba suburb towards the end of June.
translation.lug: Okuva ku kubagulizibwako kuno, poliisi esuubira nti bbomu zaategekebwa okusingira ddala mu bitundu bya Kampala ebimu okwetooloola akabuga k'e Namasuba awo ku nkomerero y'omwezi Gwomukaaga.

translation.en: General Aronda informed Museveni seven days to the attacks, security find new clues on the terror attacks.
translation.lug: Genero Aronda yategeeza Museveni ennaku musanvu ng'obulumbaganyi tebunnabaawo, ng'abebyokwerinda bwe bafunye obubaka obupya ku bulumbaganyi bw'ekitujju.

translation.en: In 2009, Ronald Mukasa stepped on a needle in a rubbish dump.
translation.lug: Mu nkumi bbiri mu mwenda, Ronald Mukasa yalinnya ku mpiso mu kasasiro.

translation.en: He later developed a high temperature and his mother rushed him to Kamwokya Christian Caring Community Centre.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma yafunye ebbugumu ery'amaanyi era maama we n'amuddusa ku Kamwokya Christian Caring Community Centre.

translation.en: Doctors revived him but he died a few days later of tetanus at Mulago Hospital.
translation.lug: Abasawo baamuzza engulu naye n'afa oluvannyuma obulwadde bwa tetanus mu ddwaliro e Mulago nga waakayita ennaku ntono.

translation.en: You are not helping Ugandans to calm down.
translation.lug: Toli mu kuyamba Bannayuganda kukakkana.

translation.en: Hutu majority have all the time to work.
translation.lug: Abahutu abasinga balina obudde bwonna okukola.

translation.en: The Hutu majority have all the time to work hard indeed as they stand in opposition to the dictatorship.
translation.lug: Aba Hutu abasinga bayina obudde bungi nnyo ddala okukola nga bwe bawakanya obwannakyemalira.

translation.en: Do the best for the people so that at the end of the day they can see the rationale of choosing a better African government.
translation.lug: Kolera abantu ekisingayo obulungi okusobola okulaba nti ku nkomerero basobola okulaba ensonga y'okulonda gavumenti y'Abafirika ennungi.

translation.en: The Hutu majority should have done better when during the Mobutu era they propped up a dictatorship of Juvenal Habiryamani instead.
translation.lug: Abahutu abasinga bandikoze bulungi mu kiseera ky'obukulembeze bwa Mobutu, mu kifo ky'okuwagira obwannakyemalira bwa Juvenal Habyarimana

translation.en: One would like to compare Mobutu and Kabila, or Habiryamani and Paul Kagame, or Amin and Obote versus Museveni.
translation.lug: Omuntu okugeraageranya Mobutu ne Kabila, oba Habyarimana ne Paul Kagame, oba Amin ne Obote ku Museveni.

translation.en: All these are now well known African dictators.
translation.lug: Bano bonna kati bannakyemalira Abafirika abamanyiddwa obulungi.

translation.en: Christine Kabayekka curses won't kill the terrorists Baganda say "curses of a hen do not kill the kite".
translation.lug: Ebikolimo bya Christine Kabayekka tebijja kutta batujju , Abaganda bagamba nti "ekikolimo ky'enkoko tekitta kamunye."

translation.en: The US Secretary of State Hillary Clinton played mother hen, whose curses have never killed the kite.
translation.lug: Minisita w'ensonga z'amawanga amalala Hillary Clinton yazannya nga maama w'enkoko ng'ebikolimo bye tebittanga kamunye.

translation.en: Now, wait for even more impotent ash from the "African Union Heads of State" summit.
translation.lug: Kaakati lindako nate abatayina mugaso balala okuva mu lukungaana lw'abakulembeze b'amawanga ga Afirika.

translation.en: Those in Nkore Karag hold that "curses of the hunter do not kill the buffalo".
translation.lug: Ab'omu Nkore Karag bagamba nti, "ebikolimo by'omuyizzi tebitta mbogo."

translation.en: All Somali refugees should go to refugee camps.
translation.lug: Abanoonyiboobubudamu Abasomalia bonna balina okugenda mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu.

translation.en: Ministers Matia Kasaija, Tarsis Kabwegyere, your task is clearly cut for you.
translation.lug: Baminisita Maria Kasaija, Tarsis Kabwegyere, obuvunaanyizibwa bwammwe bulambikiddwa bulungi.

translation.en: Ugandans have no reason to die for Somalia.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda tebalina nsonga kufiiririra Somalia.

translation.en: As for the Excellencies gathered in Kampala for the African Union summit, their number is close to that of the innocent lives who perished on July 11.
translation.lug: Nga abakulembeze b'amawanga bwe baakungaanidde mu Kampala mu African Union summit, omuwendo gwabwe gukunukkiriza ogwa bassaalumanya abaazikirira nga 11 omwezi Ogw'omusanvu.

translation.en: A few weeks ago I argued for the superpowers to take over Africa.
translation.lug: Wiiki ntono emabega nakaayanira amawanga ga kirimaanyi okweddiza Afirika.

translation.en: One patriotic General, my classmate at Makerere University, labelled me "saboteur" Ndugu Afande.
translation.lug: Genero omu mwoyo gwa ggwanga, gwe nasomako naye mu kibiina ku ssettendekero wa Makerere yankazaako lya "Saboteur" Ndugu Afande.

translation.en: What sort of sovereignty is this Amon B?
translation.lug: Amon B ono alina buyinza bwa ngeri ki obwenkomeredde?

translation.en: Mbekiza inquired if Uganda could export peace it does not have at home.
translation.lug: Mbekiza yeebuuzizza oba Uganda esobola okutwala emirembe gy'etalina ewaka.

translation.en: The entire African Union can only "condemn in the strongest terms possible" while Ugandans are murdered in cold blood.
translation.lug: Omukago gw'amawanga ga Afirika kye gusobola kyokka "kuvumirira mu ngeri yonna esoboka" nga bannayuganda battibwa kyere.

translation.en: Amon Mbekiza's comment in New Vision, July 19, 2010, on the July 11 terror attacks in Kampala missed one key point.
translation.lug: Endowooza ya Amon Mbekiza mu New Vision w'omwezi ogwomusanvu nga 19, 2010 ku bulumbaganyi bw'ekitujju mu Kampala yabulamu ensonga enkulu emu.

translation.en: As we mourn the dead, we must ask; whose political, economic interests does Uganda serve by being in Somalia?
translation.lug: Nga tukungubagira omugenzi, tulina okwebuuza bigendererwa by'ani ebyebyobufuzi n'ebyenfuna bannayuganda bye batuukiriza e Somalia?

translation.en: The insurgency in northern Uganda has lasted over 20 years.
translation.lug: Akasambattuko mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda kaamala emyaka egisoba mu 20.

translation.en: Millions of Ugandans were born during the rebellion and entered adulthood before it ended.
translation.lug: Obukadde bwa bannayuganda bwazaalibwa mu lutalo ne bakula nga terunaggwa.

translation.en: While some peace has returned, people in northern Uganda think the war has subsided, not ended.
translation.lug: Wadde emirembe emisaamusaamu gikomyewo, abantu mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda balowooza nti olutalo lusiriseemu so terunaggwa.

translation.en: The war cannot be pronounced over' unless Joseph Kony and his top commanders are captured or killed.
translation.lug: Olutalo terusobola kulangirirwa nti 'luwedde' okuggyako nga Joseph Konny n'abaduumizi be ab'oku ntikko bakwatiddwa oba nga battiddwa.

translation.en: I find Mbekiza's criticism of President Obama and Clinton misplaced.
translation.lug: Ndaba nga Mbekiza okukolokota Pulezidenti Obama ne Clinton tekisaana.

translation.en: President Obama is not an African head of state.
translation.lug: Ssuubi okufaananako ne Kabaka Yekka kijja kwesamba Buganda, omuyaga gw'ebyobufuzi omupya ogwatandikiddwawo bammemba ba Democratic Party abatali bamativu.

translation.en: Ssuubi like Kabaka Yekka will simply isolate Buganda, the new political pressure group formed by some disgruntled Democratic Party members.
translation.lug: Ssuubi okufaananako ne Kabaka Yekka ekyajja kwesamba Buganda, omuyaga gw'ebyobufuzi omupya ogwatandikiddwawo bammemba ba Democratic Party abatali bamativu.

translation.en: This reflects a repeat of the Kabaka Yekka Uganda People's Congress unholy alliance of 1961 to deny Benedict Kiwanuka of Democratic Party
translation.lug: Kino kyeyolekera mu kkobaane ly'omukago ogutaali mulungi ogwa Kabaka Yekka ne Uganda People's Congress ogwa lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu gumu okugaana Benedict Kiwanuka owa Democratic Party.

translation.en: The Kabaka Yekka allied with the Uganda Peoples Congress but the marriage crumbled in 1966 when the Kabaka was forced to flee to exile.
translation.lug: Kabaka Yekka yeegatta ne Uganda People's Congress naye omukago gwasaanawo mu lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu mukaaga Kabaka bwe yakakibwa okugenda mu buwanganguse.

translation.en: In spite of Buganda abandoning the Democratic Party for Uganda People's Congress in the 1960s, Democratic Party remained its honest and only ally.
translation.lug: Wadde nga Buganda yasuulawo Democratic Party n'edda ku Uganda People's Congress mu myaka gya lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga, Democratic Party yasigala nga ye munywanyi waayo yekka ow'amazima.

translation.en: Democratic Party now remains in the hearts of the majority of the Baganda, a big reason why Ssuubi members faced resistance in Masaka.
translation.lug: Democratic party kati esigala mu mitima gy'Abaganda abasinga, ensonga enkulu lwaki bammemba ba Ssuubi baasanga okuvuganyizibwa mu Masaka.

translation.en: Ssuubi 2011 was formed by some people who didn't want a non Muganda to take the Democratic Party leadership.
translation.lug: Ssuubi mu nkumi bbiri kkumi na gumu yatandikibwawo abantu abataayagala muntu ataali Muganda okutwala obukulembeze bwa Democratic Party.

translation.en: Ssuubi 2011 was formed by those who were opposed to the election of Norbert Mao from the north.
translation.lug: Ssuubi mu nkumi bbiri kkumi na gumu yatandikibwawo abo abaali baawakanya okulondebwa kwa Norbert Mao okuva mu bukiikakkono.

translation.en: Democratic Party refused to join the Inter-Party Cooperation because it has no serious future plan other than removing Museveni.
translation.lug: Democratic party yagaana okwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina kubanga tegulina biseera bya mu maaso bisimbiddwako ssira ng'oggyeko okuggyako Museveni.

translation.en: The arrogance exhibited by Forum for Democratic Change leaders especially when Democratic Party suggested reforms was self-explanatory.
translation.lug: Amalala agaayolesebwa abakulembeze ba Forum for Democratic Change naddala nga Democratic Party esaba enkyukakyuka gaali geyoleka lwatu.

translation.en: Democratic Party said not all parties can bring the same numbers in the Inter-Party Cooperation to elect one flag bearer.
translation.lug: Democratic party yagambye nti ebibiina byonna tebisobola kuleeta muwendo gwa bammemba gwe gumu mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina okulonda anaabikwatira bendera omu.

translation.en: How sure are we that delegates will not be donated to such parties?
translation.lug: Tukakasa tutya nti abakiise tebaagabweyo eri ebibiina ebo?

translation.en: For Democratic Party to just enter Inter Peoples Congress is to deny Ugandans a choice.
translation.lug: Democratic party okumala gayingira mu Inter Peoples Congress kya kumma Bannayuganda eky'okulondako.

translation.en: For members in Ssuubi to say they will support Mao in the congress while roaming with Forum for Democratic Change shows their intentions.
translation.lug: Bammemba ba Ssuubi okugamba nti bajja kuwagira Mao mu mukago ng'ate bakolagana ne Forum for Democratic Change kiraga ebiruubirirwa byabwe.

translation.en: Parties like Conservative Party, Social Democratic Party, the Justice Forum don't have roots even in Kampala.
translation.lug: Ebibiina nga Conservative Party, Social Democratic Party, Justice Forum tebirina mirandira wadde mu Kampala.

translation.en: Buganda has been a serious victim of deceit.
translation.lug: Buganda erimbiddwa nnyo.

translation.en: In 1961 allied with Uganda Peoples Congress but betrayed in 1967.
translation.lug: Mu lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu gumu yeegatta ne Uganda People's Congress naye n'eriibwamu olukwe mu lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu musanvu.

translation.en: In the 1980s Buganda was promised a federal system of governance by National Resistance Movement but has been denied to date.
translation.lug: Mu mwaka gwa lukumi mu lwenda kinaana Buganda yasuubizibwa aba National Resistance Movement enkola ya Federo naye egimmiddwa okutuuka leero.

translation.en: Mwaka Lutukumoi was the Democratic Party National Spokesperson.
translation.lug: Mwaka Lutukumoi ye yali ssekamwa wa Democratic Party.

translation.en: Kayonza Furniture Palace Plot 11, Old Port bell Road Opposite Sadolin Paints is your ultimate source for office and household furniture.
translation.lug: Kayonza Furniture Palace Plot kkumi n'emu, Old Portbell Road eyolekaganye ne Sadolin Paints y'ensibuko y'ebibajje ebya woofiisi n'awaka yokka.

translation.en: Thus, Ugandans should not ask what Obama and Clinton have done to castrate the African terrorists.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo Bannayuganda tebalina kubuuza ki Obama ne Clinton kye bakoze okumalawo abayeekera ba Africa.

translation.en: Rather we should ask what the African nationals are doing to liberate Africa from bad governance and poverty.
translation.lug: Wabula tulina kubuuza ki Abafirika kye bakola okununula Africa okuva mu bukulembeze obubi n'obwavu.

translation.en: Julius Kiiza said that Makerere University Military can't win the war.
translation.lug: Julius Kiiza yagamba nti bannamagye ba Makerere University tebasobola kuwangula lutalo.

translation.en: I don't agree with those who support the government's position to launch a full-scale war on Al-Shabaab militants in Somalia.
translation.lug: Sikkiriziganya n'abo abawagira ekirowoozo kya gavumenti eky'okuggulawo olutalo ku bamukwatammundu ba Al-Shabaab mu Somalia.

translation.en: The attack on Al-Shabaab is a very small part of the War on Terror, certainly not the heart of it.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi ku Al-Shabaab katundu katono nnyo ku lutalo lw'obutujju, si gwe mutima gwabwo.

translation.en: I disagree with President Museveni's war drums.
translation.lug: Sikkiriziganya na kya Pulezidenti Museveni ku ngoma z'olutalo.

translation.en: At this time, I don't understand our need to go to war with Al-Shabaab despite the recent bombs in Kampala.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera kino, sitegeera bwetaavu bwaffe okugenda mu lutalo ne Al-Shabaab ng'oggyeko bbomu ezaali mu Kampala gye buvuddeko.

translation.en: Perhaps some Ugandans are contented with Museveni's reasons.
translation.lug: Oboolyawo Bannayuganda abamu bamativu n'ensonga za Museveni.

translation.en: Ask former United States president George Bush.
translation.lug: Buuza eyaliko Pulezidenti wa United States George Bush.

translation.en: It's also so unfair when some people generalise that all Muslims are terrorists.
translation.lug: Era si kya bwenkanya abantu abamu bwe bakitwalira awamu nti abasiraamu bonna batujju.

translation.en: While there are some scriptures in the Koran that encourage violence, they are insignificant.
translation.lug: Wadde waliwo ebyawandiikibwa ebimu mu Kolaani ebikkiriza obutabanguko, si by'amaanyi.

translation.en: Islam has no central religious authority like the Vatican in Catholicism.
translation.lug: Obusiraamu tebuyina buyinza bwa ddiini bwa wamu nga Vatican mu Bakatoliki

translation.en: Abbey Kibirige Semuwemba United Kingdom on the story "Ganging up on Museveni" I can sense dome truth in this article.
translation.lug: Abbey Kibirige Semuwemba mu United Kingdom mu bubaka bwe "okwegattira ku Museveni" Ndaba amazima amajjuvu mu kiwandiiko kino.

translation.en: Though the National Resistance Movement spokesperson is trying to downplay Ssemwogerere Mulwanyamuli's role on Uganda's political scene, National Resistance Movement and President Museveni feel politically threatened.
translation.lug: Newankubadde omwogezi wa National Resistance Movement agezaako okufeebya omulimu gwa Ssemogerere Mulwanyamuli mu byobufuzi bya Uganda, National Resistance Movement ne Pulezidenti Museveni bawulira batidde mu byobufuzi.

translation.en: That is why the government is now pursuing him using National Social Security Fund, labelling his Ssuubi 2011 political group a Kabaka Yekka party.
translation.lug: Eyo y'ensonga lwaki gavumenti egezaako okumulemerako nga ekozesa National Social Security Fund ng'etuuma ekibiina kye eky'ebyobufuzi Ssuubi nkumi bbiri kkumi na gumu ekibiina kya Kabaka Yekka.

translation.en: Konny Jovia Ssuubi inquired if Kabaka Yekka was opportunism to the Muganda peasant
translation.lug: Konny Jovia Ssuubi yabuuza oba Kabaka Yekka yali nakigwanyizi eri Omuganda owa wansi.

translation.en: The only person capable of delivering that security is Yoweri Museveni.
translation.lug: Omuntu yekka asobola okussaawo obukuumi ye Yoweri Museveni.

translation.en: Kizza Besigye is already in league with the perceived enemies of Buganda.
translation.lug: Kiiza Besigye ali mu mpaka n'abatwalibwa ng'abalabe ba Buganda.

translation.en: Norbert Mao has been wise to avoid that lot.
translation.lug: Nobert Mao abadde mugezi okwewala abantu abo.

translation.en: Democratic Party and National Resistance Movement are the real friends of Buganda.
translation.lug: Democratic Party ne National Resistance Movement gye mikwano gya Buganda egya ddala.

translation.en: The Inter-Party Cooperation, Forum for Democratic Change and Uganda Peoples Congress are not true friends of Baganda
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina, Forum for Democratic Change ne Uganda Peoples Congress si mikwano gya Baganda emituufu.

translation.en: President Museveni and his Ethiopian counterpart Meles Zenawi have many things in common.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni ne munne ow'e Ethiopia Meles Zenawi balina bingi bye bafaanaganya.

translation.en: Pre-election events in Ethiopia and Rwanda show you can win an election before people go to the polls.
translation.lug: Ebibeerawo ng'okulonda tekunnabaawo mu Ethiopia ne Rwanda biraga nti osobola okuwangula akalulu ng'abantu tebannalonda.

translation.en: You can win an election before going to the polls and it is internationally recognised as legitimate.
translation.lug: Osobola okuwangula okulonda ng'okulonda tekunnabaawo era kimanyikiddwa mu mawanga gonna ng'ekiri mu mateeka.

translation.en: Is Mulwanyamuli still in Mengo?
translation.lug: Mulwanyamuli akyali Mengo?

translation.en: Does the law prevent former Katikkiros like Mayanja Nkangi from active politics?
translation.lug: Etteeka ligaana abaaliko bakatikkiro nga Mayanja Nkangi okw'etaba mu byobufuzi eby'okuvuganya?

translation.en: When the Buganda demands summarize Uganda demands.
translation.lug: Buganda bwe banja kizingiramu Uganda byebanja.

translation.en: Buganda remains the bigger dreamer and most naive actor in the IPC arrangement.
translation.lug: Buganda esigala ng'eroota ebinene n'okubeera kyakayiga ennyo mu nteekateeka za IPC.

translation.en: I can foresee with certainty that Buganda will remain the worst loser even if IPC wins the election in 2011.
translation.lug: Nsobola okulaba ebinaabaawo nga nsinziira ku bukakafu nga Buganda ejja kusigala ng'ewanguddwa nnyo, IPC ne bw'enaawangula okulonda mu nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: Uganda's future is still dark unless the IPC efforts focus on issues of national concern.
translation.lug: Ebiseera bya Uganda eby'omu maaso bikyali mu kizikiza okuggyako nga IPC essira eritadde ku nsonga ezigasiza awamu eggwanga.

translation.en: Does being a former Katikkiro disqualify Ssemwogerere Mulwanyamuli from engaging in active politics?
translation.lug: Eky'okubeera nti waliko Katikkiro kiggya Ssemwogerere Mulwanyamuli okwenyigira mu byobufuzi eby'okuvuganya?

translation.en: God bless Uganda!
translation.lug: Katonda wa Uganda omukisa!

translation.en: These former Mengo officials resigned from holding any responsibilities in the kingdom.
translation.lug: Bano abaaliko abakungu b'e Mengo baalekulira okuva kukutwala obuvunaanyizibwa bwonna mu bwakabaka.

translation.en: There is no violation of the constitution, which Mwenda, as a senior journalist, knows.
translation.lug: Tewali kutyoboola ssemateeka, ekintu Mwenda nga munnamawulire omukugu ky'amanyi.

translation.en: Microsoft co-founder Paul Allen is estimated to have a fortune of 13,500,000,000 billion US dollars.
translation.lug: Omu ku batandisi ba Microsoft Paul Allen ateeberezebwa okuba n'obugagga bwa ddoola z'America obuwumbi kkumi na busatu n'ekitundu.

translation.en: Kenya Commercial Bank (KCB) has registered 4,200,000,000 Kenya shillings in profits between January and June this year.
translation.lug: Bbanka ya Kenya Commercial Bank (KCB) yafunye amagoba ga siringi z'e Kenya obuwumbi buna mu obukadde bibiri wakati w'omwezi ogusooka n'ogwomukaaga omwaka guno.

translation.en: 1,000,000,000 people could not read or write worldwide at the beginning of the 21st century.
translation.lug: Abantu akawumbi kamu baali tebasobola kusoma na kuwandiika ku ntandikwa y'ekyasa eky'abiri mu ekimu.

translation.en: 27, 000,000 is the total number of Internally Displaced People worldwide as of 2010.
translation.lug: Mu bbiri kkumi, obukadde abiri mu musanvu gwe mugatte gw'abantu ogwasengulwa mu bifo we babeera okwetooloola ensi yonna.

translation.en: The total number of international migrants worldwide by 2010 was 214,000,000 according to the International Organisation for Migrants.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'omugatte ogw'ababundabunda mu nsi yonna mu nkumi bbiri gwali obuwumbi bibiri kkumi na buna okusinziira ku kitongole kya International Organisation for Migrants.

translation.en: The number of international migrants rose from 150 million in 2000.
translation.lug: Omuwendo gw'ababundabunda mu nsi yonna gwalinnya okuva ku bukadde kikumi ataano mu nkumi bbiri.

translation.en: According to UNICEF, 24,000 children die each day due to poverty in the world.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku kitongole kya UNICEF, abaana emitwalo ebiri mu enkumi nnya bafa buli lunaku olw'obwavu mu nsi.

translation.en: Google recruited 1200 employees in the past three months.
translation.lug: Google yawadde abantu lukumi mu bibiri emirimu mu myezi esatu egiyise.

translation.en: Former British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher.
translation.lug: Eyaliko ssaabaminisita wa Bungereza Margaret Thatcher.

translation.en: Does the law prevent former Katikkiros like Mayanja Nkangi from active politics?
translation.lug: Etteeka ligaana abaaliko bakatikkiro nga Mayanja Nkangi okwenyigira mu byobufuzi eby'okuvuganya?

translation.en: President Museveni reacted to the Al-Shabaab terror attacks on July 11 in Kampala which killed 76 people.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yavaayo ku bulumbaganyi bwa Al-Shabaab nga kkumi na lumu omwezi ogw'omusanvu mu Kampala obwatta abantu nsanvu mu mukaaga.

translation.en: Ronald Reagan is a former US president.
translation.lug: Ronald Reagan yaliko pulezidenti wa America.

translation.en: Everyday 2,000 African children die from diarrhoea.
translation.lug: Buli lunaku abaana Abafirika enkumi bbiri bafa ekiddukano.

translation.en: Nelson Mandela has given us a wonderful opportunity and duty to do something positive and active on Mandela Day.
translation.lug: Nelson Mandela atuwadde omukisa ogw'ettendo n'obuvunaanyizibwa okubaako kye tukola ekitwongerako era eky'amaanyi ku lunaku lwa Mandela.

translation.en: Jimmy Carter says that US knows that there is a belief held by too many Pakistanis that America's commitment to them begins and ends with security.
translation.lug: Jimmy Carter agamba nti US ekimanyi nti waliwo okukkiriza mu Bapaakisitaani abangi nti obumalirivu bwa America gye bali butandikira era ne bukoma ku byakwerinda.

translation.en: My main job is to serve the people of Ssembabule but not to shout over radio stations abusing people.
translation.lug: Omulimu gwange omukulu gwa kuweereza bantu b'e Ssembabule so si kuleekaanira ku mikutu gya laadiyo nga nvuma bantu.

translation.en: As chairman of NRM I must support Kawooya because she is the one holding the party's flag.
translation.lug: Nga Ssentebe wa NRM nina okuwagira Kawooya kubanga y'alina bendera y'ekibiina.

translation.en: Damalie Nakawombe Kisosonkole is the widow to the late king of Buganda Sir Edward Muteesa II passed away at Nakasero Hospital in Kampala.
translation.lug: Damalie Nakawombe Kisosonkole ye nnamwandu wa Ssekabaka Edward Muteesa owookubiri eyafiira mu ddwaliro e Nakasero mu Kampala.

translation.en: Damalie was a daughter of the late Christopher Ssenkuuma Kisosonkole and Victoria Nassozi.
translation.lug: Damalie yali muwala w'omugenzi Christopher Sserunkuuma Kisosonkole ne Victoria Nassozi.

translation.en: Damalie went to Buddo Junior School, King's College Buddo and later joined Sherbon College in Great Britain as the first African to this college.
translation.lug: Damalie yasomera ku ssomero lya Budo Junior, Kings college Budo, oluvannyuma n'agenda ku Sherbon college mu Great Britain nga omuddugavu eyasooka mu college eyo.

translation.en: Sir Edward Mutesa said he met Damalie at King's College Budo, when both were students.
translation.lug: Ssekabaka Edward Muteesa yagamba nti yasisinkana Damalie ku King's College Buddo nga bombi bayizi.

translation.en: They married on November 19, 1948.
translation.lug: Baafumbiriganwa mu mwezi gw'ekkumi n'ogumu nga kkumi na mwenda lukumi mu lwenda ana mu munaana.

translation.en: Numbers has had a hard time clearing his name over the Common Wealth Heads of Government Meeting accusations.
translation.lug: Numbers afunye akaseera akazibu okulongoosa erinnya lye okuva ku lujejeemo mu kakiiko k'abakulembeze b'amawanga ga Common Wealth Heads

translation.en: The position of the European Union is very clear: that we want the opportunity for people to be able to move around freely or to see goods.
translation.lug: Ekiruubirirwa ky'ekibiina ky'omukago gwa bulaaya kirambulukufu nti: twagala omukisa gw'abantu okusobola okuba nga tewali kibakugira mu kutambula oba okulaba ebyamaguzi.

translation.en: Damalie was born in 1929.
translation.lug: Damalie yazaalibwa mu lukumi mu lwenda abiri mu mwenda.

translation.en: Henry Ford said the only real security that a man will have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience, and ability.
translation.lug: Henry Ford yagamba nti obukuumi bwokka obwannamaddala omusajja bw'ajja okuba nabwo mu nsi eno ge magezi amangi, obumanyirivu n'obusobozi.

translation.en: Bob Marley said the good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
translation.lug: Bob Marley yagamba nti ebiseera ebirungi ebya leero bye birowoozo eby'ennaku eby'enkya.

translation.en: George Bernard Shaw said we don't stop playing because we grow old, we grow old because we stop playing.
translation.lug: George Bernard Shaw yagamba tetukoma kuzannya kubanga tukula, tukula kubanga tukoma okuzannya.

translation.en: Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell addressed the senate on Thursday 15th after the passing of the US financial regulation.
translation.lug: Munnalipaabulikaani omukulembeze w'olukiiko lw'ababaka ba America olw'okuntikko Mitch McConnell yayogeddeko eri ababaka ku lwokuna nga kkumi na ttaano oluvannyuma lw'okuyisa ebiragiro ku byensimbi mu US.

translation.en: Last week security agents were called to Kampala taxi park following a bomb scare.
translation.lug: Ssabiiti ewedde ab'ebyokwerinda baayitibwa mu paaka ya takisi ey'e Kampala oluvannyuma lw'okwekengera bbomu.

translation.en: President Museveni has said that the Al Shabaab were behind the July 11 terror attacks in Kampala.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni agambye nti aba Al-Shabaab be baali emabega wa bbomu ezaakubibwa mu Kampala nga kkumi na lumu Ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: Last week the Director of Public Prosecutions told parliament that his office did not have money to facilitate the investigations into the alleged theft.
translation.lug: Ssabiiti ewedde ssaabawolereza wa gavumenti yagamba paalamenti nti woofiisi terina ssente kukola ku kunoonyereza okw'obubbi obugambibwa.

translation.en: There are no funds for carrying out investigations into the alleged theft of Common Wealth Heads of Government Meeting funds.
translation.lug: Tewali ssente za kukola ku kunoonyereza kw'obubbi obugambibwa obwa ssente z'olukiiko lw'amawanga agaaliko amatwale ga Bungereza.

translation.en: Murasaki Shikibu wrote the world's first full novel.
translation.lug: Murasaki Shikibu yawandiika ekitabo ekijjuvu akaasookera ddala mu nsi yonna.

translation.en: The tale of Genji tells the story of a prince looking for love and wisdom.
translation.lug: Olugero lwa Genji lwogera ku mboozi y'omulangira anoonya omukwano n'okumanya.

translation.en: The world's first novel was written in the year 1007.
translation.lug: Akatabo akaasookera ddala mu nsi yonna kaawandiikibwa mu lukumi mu musanvu.

translation.en: By the middle ages, there were many novels about kings and heroic knights.
translation.lug: Mu myaka gy'omu makkati, waaliwo obutabo bungi obukwata ku bakabaka n'abajjaasi abazira.

translation.en: "Life of Lazarillo de Tormes" was written in 1554.
translation.lug: "Life of Lazarillo de Tormes" kaawandiikibwa mu lukumi mu bitaano ataano mu nnya.

translation.en: The record for the fastest selling book of all time is held by Joanne Rowling.
translation.lug: Akatabo akalina ekyafaayo ky'okusinga okutundibwa ka Joanne Rowling.

translation.en: Joanne Rowling was born on 31 July 1965.
translation.lug: Joanne Rowling yazaalibwa nga asatu mu lumu ogwomusanvu lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu ttaano.

translation.en: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows sold 11 million copies within 24 hours.
translation.lug: Harry Potter ne ba Deathly Hallows baatunda obutabo obukadde 11 mu ssaawa 24

translation.en: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince sold 9 million copies the first day.
translation.lug: Harry Potter ne Half-Blood Prince baatunda obutabo obukadde 9 ku lunaku olwasooka.

translation.en: The last four Harry potter books set the record for fastest-selling book within 24 hours.
translation.lug: Obutabo bwa Harry Potter obuna obwasembayo bwateekawo ekyafaayo ky'obutabo obukyasinze okugulibwa mu ssaawa 24.

translation.en: Ten years after the first installment, some 350 million fans have bought Harry Potter books.
translation.lug: Emyaka kkumi okuva ekitundu ekisooka lwe kyafulumizibwa, abawagizi obukadde 350 baguze obutabo bwa Harry Potter.

translation.en: The Gender pre-summit conference took place at Munyonyo on July 19.
translation.lug: Olukiiko olukulembera olukiiko lw'ekikula lwali Munyonyo nga 19 ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: SIYA, a Uganda Taxi Operators and Drivers Association will check people entering the Bus park on July 16.
translation.lug: SIYA, ekibiina ekitaba abakozi n'abavuzi ba takisi kijja kukebera abayingira mu paaka ya bbaasi nga 16 ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: Following the July 11 bomb blast attacks in Kampala, security has been beefed up in crowded areas in the city of Kampala.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lwa bbomu ezaakubibwa mu Kampala nga 11 ogwomusanvu, ebyokwerinda byongezeddwa mu bifo ebirimu omujjuzo mu kibuga kya Kampala.

translation.en: The deadly attacks ripped through Kyadondo Rugby Club and Ethiopian Village Restaurant in the Kabalagalaa suburb of Kampala.
translation.lug: Obulumbaganyi obw'obulabe bwakolebwa ku Kyadondo Rugby Club ne ku Ethiopian Village Restaurant e Kabalagala ku njegooyego za Kampala.

translation.en: On July 12 another suicide bomber vest was discovered in a bar in Makindye confirming fears that the bombers were targeting other places.
translation.lug: Nga kkumi na bbiri ogwomusanvu, akaambalo akatendekebwamu okutega bbomu kaazuulibwa mu bbaala e Makindye ekyaleetawo okutya nti abatezi ba bbomu baali baagala okukuba ekifo ekirala.

translation.en: Since the bombings, security forces have been extra alert responding to every bomb scare that the public has alarmed about.
translation.lug: Okuva bbomu lwe zaaliwo, abakuumaddembe babadde basitukiramu nnyo ku buli kwekengera kwa bbomu abantu kwe babategeezaako.

translation.en: Kampala is now marked with checkpoints at taxi and bus terminals, supermarkets and churches.
translation.lug: Kampala eteereddwamu awakebererwa ku bifo bya takisi, emiryango gya bbaasi, ssemaduuka n'amakanisa.

translation.en: Public transport providers in Kampala city have introduced new security checks to ensure the safety of travellers from terrorists.
translation.lug: Abakola mu ntambula ey'olukale mu Kampala bataddewo ebifo by'ebyokwerinda ebipya okusobola okukuuma abasaabaze okuva ku batujju

translation.en: At Nakumatt, security officers check all vehicles, while body searches have become common at Garden City and Shoprite Lugogo.
translation.lug: Ku Nakumatt, ab'ebyokwerinda bakebera emmotoka zonna so nga ate n'okukebera ku mibiri kweyolekera nnyo ku Garden City ne Shoprite e Lugogo.

translation.en: Police have called on the public to help in identifying two suspected suicide bombers whose likely appearance has been reconstructed by Interpol.
translation.lug: Poliisi esabye abantu okuyambako mu kuzuula abateeberezebwa okutega bbomu ababiri ng'ebifaananyi ebyefaananyiriza bwe bafaanana byafulumiziddwa poliisi y'ensi yonna.

translation.en: Various churches in Kampala have suspended overnight prayers following the July 11 deadly bombings.
translation.lug: Amakanisa ag'enjawulo mu Kampala gayimirizza okusaba okw'ekiro oluvannyuma lwa bbomu nnamuzisa eza nga kkumi na lumu ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: The National Fellowship of Born-Again Churches' chairman, Bishop David Kiganda, was speaking during a meeting with Kampala Capital City officials. Bishop David Kiganda recently said metal detectors would be placed at church entrances.
translation.lug: Ssentebe w'ekibiina ekigatta amakanisa g'Abalokole, Bishop David Kiganda yabadde ayogera mu lukiiko n'abakungu ba Kampala Capital City Authority.

translation.en: The measures follow a directive by Kampala City Council that restricts churches, bars and nightclubs from staying open past ten.
translation.lug: Ebyakoleddwa kyaddiridde ekiragiro okuva mu Kampala Capital City Authority okugaana amakanisa, bbaala, n'ebifo ebisanyukirwamu okusigala nga biggale okusukka essaawa ennya.

translation.en: Henry Luke Orombi, the Archbishop of the Church of Uganda, called for tighter security on July fourteen at places of worship.
translation.lug: Ssaabalabirizi w'Ekkanisa ya Uganda Henry Luke Orombi yasabye obukuumi obw'amaanyi mu masinzizo nga kkumi na nnya Ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: Henry Luke Orombi said that places of worship need tighter security because they can be targeted by terrorists.
translation.lug: Henry Luke Orombi yagambye nti amasinzizo geetaaga obukuumi obw'amaanyi kubanga gayinza okulumbibwa abatujju.

translation.en: Orombi was leading a special service at All Saints Cathedral Nakaero to remember the dead.
translation.lug: Orombi yabadde akulembedde okusaba okw'enjawulo ku All Saints Cathedral e Nakasero okujjukira omugenzi.

translation.en: Following Orombi's call, security was tight on Sunday at various city churches, including Rubaga, Namirembe and All Saints cathedral.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okusaba kwa Orombi, obukuumi bwabadde bwamaanyi ku Ssande ku masinzizo ag'enjawulo mu kibuga okuli Rubaga, Namirembe ne All Saints Cathedral.

translation.en: At Rubaga Cathedral, the administrator is known as Father Francis Lubanga.
translation.lug: Ku lutikko e Rubaga, eyakulembeddemu ye Faaza Francis Lubanga.

translation.en: Father Francis Lubanga, told the gathering that only one door to the church would be open so that everyone could be checked.
translation.lug: Faaza Francis Lubanga yagambye abaakungaanye nti oluggi lumu oluyingira mu ssinzizo lwe lwandigguddwa olwo buli omu akeberebwa.

translation.en: Archbishop Cyprian Kizito Lwanga requested all Christians to accept the new security measures.
translation.lug: Ssaabasumba Dr. Cyprian Kizito Lwanga yasabye Abakristu bonna okukkiriza ebiragiro by'ebyokwerinda ebipya.

translation.en: At All Saints Cathedral Nakasero, security officers, armed with metal detectors, were stationed at the entrance of the church.
translation.lug: Ku All Saints Cathedral e Nakasero, abaserikale abaabadde n'obuuma baateereddwa ku miryango gya Lutikko egiyingira.

translation.en: Vehicles were not allowed into the parking yard for All Saints Cathedral.
translation.lug: Emmotoka tezakkiriziddwa mu kifo we zisimba ku ku Lutikko ya All Saints Cathedral.

translation.en: The Sunday prayers were part of the seven-day national mourning declared.
translation.lug: Okusaba kw'oku Ssande kwabadde kitundu ku nnaku omusanvu ezaalangirirwa mu ggwanga lyonna ez'okukungubaga.

translation.en: The force comes after six months of thorough training, in which three hundred ten trainees were chosen from the police force and UPDF.
translation.lug: Eggye lijja oluvannyuma lw'okutendekebwa kw'emyezi omukaaga, ng'abaatendekeddwa bisatu mu kkumi baggiddwa mu poliisi mu UPDF.

translation.en: Three hundred ten trainees were chosen to represent Uganda Peoples Defence Forces by their commanders.
translation.lug: Abaatendekeddwa ebisatu mu ekkumi baalondeddwa omuduumizi waabwe okuva mu ggye lya Uganda peoples Defence Forces.

translation.en: According to Orland Balak, the chief instructor of the squad, the graduates have skills to counter terrorism threats of any kind.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Orland Balak, eyakulembedde okutendeka eggye, yagambye nti abaatendekeddwa balina obukugu okwanganga obulumbaganyi bw'abatujju okw'ekika kyonna.

translation.en: The Chief of Military Intelligence, Brigadier Abel Kandiho is one of the people that personally interrogated Kale Kayihura in two thousand eighteen.
translation.lug: Akulira bambega mu magye, Brig. Abel Kandiho y'omu ku bantu abaabuuza Kale Kayihura kajjogijjogi w'ebibuuzo mu nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na munaana.

translation.en: James Mugira said the new squad comes in at a time when the country is on the hunt for terrorists who struck Kampala killing seventy-six people.
translation.lug: James Mugira yagambye nti eggye eppya lijjidde mu kiseera ng'eggwanga liri ku muyiggo gw'abatujju abaalumba Kampala ne batta abantu nsanvu mu mukaaga.

translation.en: The brigadier, however, dismissed claims that the Al-Shabaab attacked Uganda because of the Uganda Peoples Defence Forces presence in Somalia.
translation.lug: Buligediya yasambazze ebigambibwa nti Al-Shabaab yalumba Uganda lwa ggye lya Uganda Peoples Defence Foreces eriri e Somalia.

translation.en: A lady collects water from a non protected source of water in Nsambya Gogonya zone one on July nineteen.
translation.lug: Omukazi akima amazzi okuva mu kifo eky'olukale mu Zzooni ya Nsambya Gogonya I nga kkumi na mwenda Ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: Such sources of water are the possible causes of illnesses around Kampala slams.
translation.lug: Ebifo ng'ebyo awaggibwa amazzi bisobola okuvaako obulwadde mu migotteko gya Kampala.

translation.en: Jimmy Siya, President Museveni inspects a scout parade during the African Youth Forum at Imperial Botanical Beach Hotel, Entebbe, on July seventeen.
translation.lug: Jimmy Siya, Pulezidenti Museveni yalambula ennyiriri z'abasikawutu mu lutuula lw'abavubuka ba Afirika ku Imperial Botanical Beach Hotel e Ntebbe nga kkumi na musanvu Ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: Kayihura confirmed last week that the police will start using the biometric technology that was used in the Electoral Commission voters' registration.
translation.lug: Kayihura yakakasizza wiiki ewedde nti poliisi ejja kutandika okukozesa tekinologiya akebera ebinkumu eyakozesebwa akakiiko k'ebyokulonda mu kuwandiisa abalonzi.

translation.en: Police will use the technology before the government carries out the national identification project.
translation.lug: Poliisi ejja kukozesa tekinologiya nga Gavumenti tennatandika kuwandiika bantu kufuna Densite.

translation.en: Uganda contracted the Muehlbauer Technology Group from Germany for the national identification project.
translation.lug: Uganda yasse omukago ne Muehlbauer Technology Group okuva e Bugirimaani okukola ku Densite.

translation.en: According to the Inspector General of Police, the registration progress will also entail registration of all local council residents.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Muduumizi wa poliisi, ng'okwewandiisa kujja kuzingiramu n'okuwandiika abatuuze bonna mu byalo.

translation.en: The National Social Security Fund has agreed to pay the victims of the recent terrorist attacks that ripped through Kyadondo Rugby Club.
translation.lug: Ekitongole kya National Social Security Fund kikkirizza okusasula abantu abaakosebwa mu butujju obwaliwo ku Kyadondo Rugby Club.

translation.en: The terrorist attacks hit Kyadondo Rugby Club and an Ethiopian restaurant in Kabalagala.
translation.lug: Abatujju baakuba Kyadondo Rugby Club ne Ethiopian Restaurant e Kabalagala.

translation.en: Mr. Grace Isabirye is the acting National Social Security Fund managing director.
translation.lug: Omwami Grace Isabirye y'akola nga Ssenkulu wa National Social Security Fund.

translation.en: Mr Isabirye did not provide a specific time frame on when the relatives of the bomb victims should pick their cash.
translation.lug: Mwami Isabirye teyawadde budde bwe nnyini abooluganda lw'abaakosebwa bbomu lwe balina okukimirako ssente zaabwe.

translation.en: The move came after Members of Parliament led by Mr. Okumu ordered National Social Security Fund to pay all the bomb victims their money.
translation.lug: Kino kyaddiridde ababaka ba Paalamenti nga bakulembeddwa Okumu okulagira National Social Security Fund okusasula abo bonna abaakosebwa bbomu ssente zaabwe.

translation.en: Mr Okumu said that Desperate measures call for desperate actions.
translation.lug: Okumu yagambye nti ebintu ebigwawo amangu byetaaga okukolebwako amangu.

translation.en: All the National Social Security Fund contributing members who either died or got injured in Sunday's bomb attack should be paid their money.
translation.lug: Bonna abatereka ssente mu National Social Security Fund abaafa oba abaafuna obuvune mu bulumbaganyi bwa bbomu obwa Ssande balina okusasulwa ssente zaabwe.

translation.en: Twenty have been imprisoned by Uganda Police over Al-Shabaab links.
translation.lug: Abantu abiri baggaliddwa poliisi ya Uganda ku byekuusa ku kuba n'akakwate ne Al-Shabaab.

translation.en: The photos professing how the suspects looked were reconstructed using computer technology.
translation.lug: Ebifaananyi ebiraga engeri abateeberezebwa bwe bafaanana byakoleddwa nga bakozesa tekinologiya wa kompyuta.

translation.en: The photos have been uploaded on the Interpol and American Bureau of Investigations websites to help in identification.
translation.lug: Ebifaananyi biwanikiddwa ku mikutu gya poliisi y'ensi yonna ne ku bibanja bya American Bureau of investigations okuyambako okubazuula.

translation.en: Two hotlines were released to the public to volunteer any information on the two terror suspects.
translation.lug: Ennamba z'amasimu bbiri zaaweereddwa abantu okuwaayo obubaka bwonna ku butujju obw'emirundi ebiri.

translation.en: Twenty suspects have been arrested by the police in various parts of the country for suspected links to the Al-Shabaab militants.
translation.lug: Abantu amakumi abiri baakwatiddwa poliisi mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo olw'okuteeberezebwa okuba n'akakwate ku bamukwatammundu ba Al-Shabaab.

translation.en: New research shows that African elections are far from promoting democracy on the continent.
translation.lug: Okunoonyereza okupya kulaga nti okulonda kw'Abafirika kuli wala nnyo n'okutumbula Demokulasiya ku Ssemazinga.

translation.en: Finance Minister Syda Bbumba's recently announced national budget was made with the two thousand eleven elections in mind.
translation.lug: Minisita w'ebyensimbi Syda Bbumba yalangiridde gye buvuddeko nti embalirira y'eggwanga yakolebwa n'okulowooza ku kalulu ka nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: Government critics claimed that the national budget read out in the Uganda Parliament is full of politics.
translation.lug: Abakolokota Gavumenti bagamba nti embalirira y'eggwanga eyasomeddwa mu Paalamenti ejjudde ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: New research conducted in Nigeria, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Uganda and Ivory Coast demonstrates that elections held in Africa have an impact.
translation.lug: Okunoonyereza okuggya okwakoleddwa mu Nigeria, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Uganda ne Ivory Coast kulaga nti okulonda okubeerawo mu Afirika kulina ekikuvaamu.

translation.en: It is one of the few things which presents challenges in elections in different elections in countries in Africa.
translation.lug: Ky'ekimu ki bintu ebitono ebireetawo okusoomoozebwa mu kulonda okw'enjawulo mu mawanga ga Afirika.

translation.en: In Uganda, it is shown that the economic reforms that the country was pursuing leading up to the election were not going to work.
translation.lug: Mu Uganda, embeera eraga nti enkyukakyuka mu byenfuna eggwanga bye lyali liruubirira nga ligenda mu kulonda tebijja kukola.

translation.en: African finance ministers and reformers who are known for their fiscal discipline are usually fired around election time.
translation.lug: Baminisita b'ebyensimbi aba Afirica ne bannankyukakyuka abamanyiddwa olw'engeri gye bakwatamu ensimbi batera okugobwa ng'ebiseera by'okulonda bigenda kutuuka.

translation.en: War, guns and votes also show unsuprisingly that voting decisions in African countries are based on ethnic voting blocks.
translation.lug: Olutalo, emmundu n'obululu nabyo byewuunyisa nti okusalawo ku kulonda mu mawanga ga Afirika kwesigamizibwa ku biwayi by'amawanga.

translation.en: A case study of two Ugandan state ministers is shown.
translation.lug: Okusoma ku baminisita ba Uganda ababeezi babiri kulagiddwa.

translation.en: An alumni from Makerere University focuses on winning re-election to the Uganda Parliament.
translation.lug: Eyasomerako e Makerere aluubirira okuwangula akalulu akaddiddwamu okugenda mu Paalamenti ya Uganda.

translation.en: The member of parliament who bet his re-election on perfromance lost the election while ethnic posturing won the day.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Paalamenti eyeesigamya okuddamu okulondebwa kwe ku ngeri gye yali akolamu yawangulwa abantu bwe baalonda nga beesigamye ku ggwanga.

translation.en: Further evidence that Barrack Obama could never win an African election can be found here.
translation.lug: Obujulizi obulala nti Barrack Obama tasobola kuwangula kalulu ka Afirika kusobola kusangibwa wano.

translation.en: Besides, quality information on governmental performance in Africa is scanty and hard to come by.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko, obubaka obukwata ku mutindo gw'ebyo Gavumenti bye zikoze butono era buzibu bwa kufuna.

translation.en: Think of Iraq under Saddam Hussein and today's dysfunctional Iraqi democracy.
translation.lug: Lowooza ku Iraq wansi wa Saddam Hussein ne demokolasiya w'Abayiraaka owa leero atakyakola.

translation.en: Ethnic violence in Kenya is usually rife during elections such as those in two thousand two and two thousand seven.
translation.lug: Obutabanguko bw'amawanga mu Kenya butera okubalukawo mu biseera byokulonda ng'obwo obwa nkumi bbiri mu ebiri ne nkumi bbiri mu musanvu.

translation.en: Interestingly, the rough and tumble of African elections discourages decent African candidates from competing for political office and instead encourages some not so well suited candidates.
translation.lug: Ekyewuunyisa, okulonda kwa Afirika okuzibu era okw'obumenyi bw'amateeka kulemesa abantu abalungi okwesimbawo okuvuganya wabula ate abatalina busobozi ne bavuganya.

translation.en: Mu mawanga agakyakula abeesimbyewo batera okwogera ebisasamaza abalonzi ne bamenya amateeka.
translation.lug: Mu mawanga agakyakula abeesimbyewo batera okwogera ebisasamaza abalonzi ne bamenya amateeka.

translation.en: Uganda is not short of examples in this regard.
translation.lug: Uganda erina ebyokulabirako bingi mu kiti kino.

translation.en: After all winning an election in Africa can mean immunity from prosecution and he who reins of state power controls the judicial machinery as well.
translation.lug: Ekirungi kya byonna okuwangula akalulu m Afirica kikusibozesa obutavunaanibwa ku bw'egugungo obubalukawo kubanga ali mu buyinza y'afuga n'ebitongole ebiramuzi.

translation.en: Collier presents research by Pedro Vicente in Sao Tome which found that candidates who bribed voters won as compared to those who did not.
translation.lug: Abeesimbawo abagulirira abalonzi bawangula bw'ogeraageranya n'abo abatagulirira.

translation.en: It is an empirical fact that bribery wins elections in poor countries.
translation.lug: Kya mazima ag'enkukunala nti okugulirira abalonzi kuwangula okulonda mu mawanga agakyakula.

translation.en: After all African voters do not expect that the competing politicians will deliver on their promises and elections are their only chance to cash in.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lwa byonna abalonzi ba Abafirika tebasuubira nti bannabyabufuzi abavuganya kutuukiriza bweyamo bwabwe era okulondebwa kusinziira ku ssente z'otaddemu.

translation.en: Some politicians will actually be seen again four years later at the next election.
translation.lug: Bannabyabufuzi abamu baakuddamu okulabibwako oluvannyuma lw'emyaka ena mu kulonda okuddako.

translation.en: Collier and Pedro, during the two thousand seven Nigerian election determined that electoral bribery and vote miscounting were used to win elections.
translation.lug: Mu kulonda kwa nkumi bbiri mu Nigeria baakakasa nti okugulirira abalonzi n'okubala obubi obululu byakozesebwa okuwangula okulonda.

translation.en: War, guns and votes is an insightful reading into how electoral democracy has had the opposite effect in African countries.
translation.lug: Olutalo, emmundu n'obululu bulaga engeri Demokulasiya w'okulonda bw'akoze ekikontana n'ebyo ebyasuubirwa mu nsi za Afirika.

translation.en: Since Uganda was bombed in July two thousand eleven, Al-Shabaab terrorist group in Somalia claimed responsibility.
translation.lug: Okuva Uganda lwe yakubibwa bbomu mu Gwomusanvu mu nkumi bbiri kkumi na gumu, akabinja k'abayeekera ba Al-Shabab mu Somalia keewaana okukola obulumbaganyi.

translation.en: There has been a lot of tough talk in Kampala.
translation.lug: Wabaddewo okwogeza obukambwe kungi mu Kampala.

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni has promised to hit back at Al-Shabaab by increasing our troops in that country.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni asuubizza okwesasuza aba Al-Shabaab ng'ayongera amagye mu ggwanga eryo.

translation.en: Many Ugandans support the government in its posturing for a surge.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda bangi bawagira Gavumenti mu ngeri gy'edduukiriramu enjega eno.

translation.en: Yet the surge will increase rather than reduce the problem of the fragmentation of the state in Somalia.
translation.lug: Enjega ejja kweyongera okusinga okukendeeza obuzibu mu mawanga agataaguddwataaguddwa mu Somalia.

translation.en: It will also increase the financial and human cost on the state of Uganda.
translation.lug: Kijja kwongera okufiiriza Uganda ensimbi n'abantu.

translation.en: No amount of Uganda Peoples Defence Forces' presence in Somalia will bring peace to that country.
translation.lug: Tewali muwendo gwa magye ga Uganda mu Somalia gujja kuleeta mirembe mu nsi eyo.

translation.en: Only Somalis' can.
translation.lug: Abasomaali bokka be basobola.

translation.en: Uganda's troops can only assist in peace building if there are strong internal forces with a strong vested interested in peace.
translation.lug: Amagye ga Uganda gasobola kuyambako buyambi mu kuzzaawo mirembe singa wabaawo eggye ery'omunda ery'amaanyi nga lyagala okukuuma emirembe.

translation.en: Somalia needs a war lord able to mobilise reources and build a military capability to take effective control of the entire country.
translation.lug: Somalia yeetaaga omuduumizi w'amagye asobola okukungaanya ebintu ebyetaagisa n'okuzimba eggye eririna obusobozi okukuuma obulungi eggwanga lyonna.

translation.en: The crisis of the state in Somalia, though initially created by internal factors, has been worsened by international interference in its domestic politics.
translation.lug: Akasambattuko mu Somalia wadde nga kaatandikibwawo embeera okuva mu ggwanga munda, kasajjuddwa amawanga gw'ebweru okweyingiza mu byobufuzi byalyo.

translation.en: Indeed it is part of the wider African dilemma.
translation.lug: Mu butuufu kitundu ku kusoomoozebwa ku Afirika okw'awamu.

translation.en: Quality information on governmental performance in Africa is scarcely a basis of voter choice as compared to ethnic identity and loyalty.
translation.lug: Obubaka ku mutindo gw'enkola za Gavumenti mu Afirika butono olw'okusalawo kw'abalonzi okwesigamiziddwa ku mawanga n'okwewaayo.

translation.en: Voting decision in African countries are not based on government performance as is the case in the west.
translation.lug: Okusalawo mu kulonda mu mawanga ga Afirika tekwesigamizibwa ku kukola kwa Gavument nga bwe kiri mu Bazungu.

translation.en: Elections held in Africa increase political violence, ethnic tensions, electoral bribery and imprisonment of formidable opposition candidates.
translation.lug: Obutabanguko bw'ebyobufuzi, okutya kw'amawanga, okugulirira abalonzi n'okusiba ab'oludda oluvuganya abamanyiddwa.

translation.en: The July eleven twin bomb blasts in the city that killed seventy six people and left dozens of others injured.
translation.lug: Okubwatuka kwa bbomu ebbiri mu Gwomusanvu nga kkumi na lumu mu kibuga kwatta abantu nsanvu mu mukaaga n'abalala nkumu ne basigala n'ebisago.

translation.en: Mr. Okumu said the reason why they have ordered National Social Security Fund to pay people who were affected by the Sunday night disaster.
translation.lug: Okumu yayogedde ensonga lwaki baalagidde National Social Security Fund okusasula abantu abaakosebwa ekikangabwa ky'ekiro kya Ssande.

translation.en: Mr Grace Isabirye told that on July fourteen all the bomb victims will be paid the money they saved with National Social Security Fund. Uganda Peoples Defence Forces last week approved one hundred ninety six strong Joint Anti-terrorism Taskforce to secure the search and fight against terrorists .
translation.lug: Grace Isabirye yagambye nti nga kkumi na nnya Ogwomusanvu bonna abaakosebwa bbomu bajja kusasulwa ssente ze baatereka ne National Social Security Fund.

translation.en: The fight against terrorism in Uganda was inspired by the terror attacks that happened on July eleven in the country.
translation.lug: Okulwanyisa obutujju mu Uganda kwava ku bulumbaganyi bwa bbomu obwaliwo mu ggwanga nga kkumi na lumu Ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: Kunsa also underscores the need for a thorough legal framework behind the Bill.
translation.lug: Kunsa naye tawagira kya bwetaavu bwa kakiiko k'amateeka akaali emabega w'ebbago lino.

translation.en: Grace Isabirye, Onegi Obel, Amama Mbabazi former Managing Director, David Jamwa and Ezra Suruma are going to be hear today.
translation.lug: Grace Isabirye, Onegi Obel, Amama Mbabazi eyaliko ssenkulu, David Jamwa ne Ezra Suruma bagenda kubeera wano leero.

translation.en: The Independent randomly interviewed some workers who save with the National Social Security Fund.
translation.lug: Independent yabuuza abamu ku bakozi abatereka ne National Social Security Fund.

translation.en: There have been numerous complaints about the inefficiencies of National Social Security Fund, and the never ending scandals.
translation.lug: Wabaddewo okwemulugunya kungi ku nkola embi eya National Social security fund n'emivuyo egitaggwa.

translation.en: John Matovu said that if government chose to allow competitors to National Social Security Fund perhaps we would see improved service.
translation.lug: John Matovu yagambye nti singa gavumenti esalawo okukkiriza abavuganya National Social Security Fund oboolyawo tuyinza okulaba ng'obuweereza bulongooka.

translation.en: Joan Nantume wished that people could save with any organization they wanted instead of National Social Security Fund.
translation.lug: Joan Nantume afundako nti singa abantu basobola okutereka n'ekitongole kyonna kye baagala ekitali National Social Security Fund.

translation.en: I have been saving with National Social Security Fund for 10 years now.
translation.lug: Mbadde ntereka ne National Social security Fund okumala emyaka kati kkumi.

translation.en: Gilbert Okello from Mukwano Group of companies said he will get them some time, even if government changed.
translation.lug: Gilbert Okello okuva mu Mukwano Group of Companies yagambye nti ajja kubawaayo obudde Gavumenti ne bw'enaaba ekyuse.

translation.en: Government needs to craft this law well maybe setting a minimum interest rate on the workers' savings, says Immaculate Akanyo.
translation.lug: Gavumenti yeetaaga okutereeza etteeka lino oboolyawo ng'essawo amagoba eg'essalira ku ssente z'abakozi eziterekebwa, Immaculate Akanyo bwe yategeezezza.

translation.en: According to the Independent issue of July 23 - 29, 2010, by John Njoroge, the air is pungent with urine, fecal matter and cow dung.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent ow'Ogwomusanvu 23-29, 2010, ebyawandiikibwa John Njoroge, empewo ejjudde ekivundu ky'omusulo, obubi n'obusa.

translation.en: This is Kifumbira, a slum in Kamwokya, a suburb of Kampala city.
translation.lug: Eno ye Kifumbira, enzigotta mu Kamwokya, esangibwa ku nkingizzi z'ekibuga Kampala.

translation.en: This issue is not exclusive to Kifumbira; the suburbs of Kawempe, Kalerwe, Wandegeya, Bwaise, Kisaasi, Kiwatule, Kitintale and Banda are also affected.
translation.lug: Embeera eno teri mu Kifumbira yokka, enzigotta eza Kawempe, Kaleerwe, Wandegeya Bwaise, Kisaasi, Kiwatule, Kitintale n'e Bbanda.

translation.en: At the Kitintale market, used needles, bandages and syringes are openly dumped with domestic food waste.
translation.lug: Ku katale k'e Kitintale, empiso ezikozeseddwa, bbandeegi, bisuulibwamu lujjudde.

translation.en: In late November 2009, Ronald Mukasa, fell ill after he stepped on a needle while looking for plastic bottles and scrap metal in a rubbish dump.
translation.lug: Mu Museenene wa 2009 ng'aggwaako, Ronald Mukasa yalwala oluvannyuma lw'okulinnya ku mpiso bwe yali anoonya obucupa bwa pulasitiika n'ebyuma ebikadde mu kasasiro.

translation.en: He developed an extremely high temperature, and began losing consciousness and he was then rushed to Mulago National Referral Hospital.
translation.lug: Yafuna omusujja ogw'amaanyi n'afuna n'obukosefu ku bwongo oluvannyuma n'addusibwa mu ddwaliro ekkulu e Mulago.

translation.en: He was rushed to Kamwokya Christian Caring Community Centre, a health centre in the Kamwokya area.
translation.lug: Yaddusiddwa mu kalwaliro ka Kamwokya Christian Caring Community Centre.

translation.en: Doctors there revived him but Mukasa died a few days later of tetanus while at Mulago Hospital.
translation.lug: Abasawo b'eyo baamukolako naye Mukasa oluvannyuma lw'ennaku ntono yafa obulwadde bwa ttetanansi bwamuttira e Mulago.

translation.en: We show the Minister for Primary Health, James Kakooza, some photos from Kifumbira.
translation.lug: Tulage minisita w'ebyobulamu ebisookerwako, James Kakooza ebimu ku bifaananyi okuva mu Kifumbira

translation.en: The problem is the "I don't care" attitude of people in Kampala especially.
translation.lug: Obuzibu bwa nkola ya bantu b'omu Kampala okusinga ey'obutafaayo.

translation.en: There are hospitals in the rural areas, both government and private where people can go instead of coming to Kampala.
translation.lug: Waliwo amalwaliro ga Gavumenti mu bitundu by'ebyalo n'ag'obwanannyini abantu gye basobola okugenda okusinga okujja e Kampala.

translation.en: However, according to the Commissioner of Clinical Services at the Ministry of Health Jacinto Amandwa, the problem goes well beyond attitude.
translation.lug: Wabula, okusinziira ku mukungu w'amalwaliro ku minisitule y'ebyobulamu, Jacinto Amandwa ekizibu kya maanyi ddala.

translation.en: Amandwa, is suddenly shocked and saddened when he views the pictures.
translation.lug: Amandwa, yeewuunyizaawo era n'anyolwa bwe yalabye ebifaananyi.

translation.en: Amandwa apportions part of the blame to the Uganda Medical Council, the licensing body for private hospitals in Uganda.
translation.lug: Amandwa omusango agusalira kibiina ekigatta abasawo ekiwa layisinsi amalwaliro ag'obwanannyini mu Uganda.

translation.en: According to the independent issue of July 23 - 29, 2010, many are operating without clear medical waste disposal channels.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent ow'Ogwomusanvu 23-29, 2010, mangi gakola nga tegalina watuufu we gasuula kasasiro avudde mu ddwaliro.

translation.en: The Uganda's Healthcare Waste management system Plan of 2007/08-2009/10 suggested that, it should collect and destroy waste.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka y'enkwata ya kasasiro eya nga 2007/08-2009/10, yateesa nti, erina okukungaanya era eyokye kasasiro.

translation.en: Major hospitals like Mulago National Referral Hospital, St. Francis Hospital, Nsambya and Kibuli have their own incinerators.
translation.lug: Amalwaliro amanene nga ekkulu ery'e Mulago, St. Francis Hospital, Nsambya ne Kibuli galina ebyuma byago ebyokya kasasiro.

translation.en: The government has a burner in Nakasongola but hospitals and clinics do not have burners.
translation.lug: Gavumenti erina we bayokyeza kasasiro e Nakasongola naye amalwaliro amanene n'obutono tebulina we bayokyeza kasasiro.

translation.en: Health facilities retain the duty of transporting their waste to collection centres from where contracted companies pick it and take it to Nakasongola.
translation.lug: Amalwaliro gasigaza obuvunaanyizibwa bw'okutwala kasasiro waago mu bifo w'akungaanyizibwa kkampuni ezaapatanibwa we zimuggya okumutwala e Nakasongola.

translation.en: Minister Kakooza said that they provide armed escorts for expired drugs to ensure that they are transported to Nakasongola.
translation.lug: Minisita Kakooza yagambye nti bawaayo abakuumi ab'emmundu okugendera ku ddagala eriyiseeko okukakasa nti litambuziddwa okutwalibwa e Nakasongola.

translation.en: Dr Appolo Ahimbisibwe from Kamwokya Christian Caring Community Centre said that they have an understanding with the health centre in Kisenyi.
translation.lug: Musawo Appolo Ahimbisibwe okuva ku Kamwokya Christian Caring Community Centre yagambye nti balina entegeeragana n'eddwaliro mu Kisenyi.

translation.en: Ahimbisibwe adds that the centre pays Shs. 2000 for every kilo of medical waste it transports to Kisenyi.
translation.lug: Ahimbisibwe agattako nti eddwaliro lisasula 2000/- ku buli kkiro ya kasasiro w'eddwaliro atwalibwa mu Kisenyi.

translation.en: A spot survey of private medical units in Kifumbira Kamwokya reveals that many private clinics are not willing to pay these additional disposal costs.
translation.lug: Okunoonyereza ku malwaliro g'obwannannyini mu Kifumbira mu Kamwokya kulaga nti amalwaliro g'obwannanyini mangi si meetegefu kusasula ssente za kasasiro zino ez'ennyongereza.

translation.en: At Kasee Clinic, one of 12 private medical units within a 200 metre radius, an attendant was initially helpful but suddenly became hostile.
translation.lug: Ku ddwaliro ly'e Kasese, akamu ku busenge 12 ak'obwanannyini mu bbanga lya mmita 200, omujjanjabi okusooka yali wa mugaso naye oluvannyuma yafuuka mukambwe.

translation.en: Life clinic and Nyange clinic also offered very rude responses.
translation.lug: Amalwaliro nga Life clinic ne Nyange clinic nago gaweereza bulungi.

translation.en: "We don't want journalists here"one attendant shouted in Luganda before slamming her door.
translation.lug: Omujjanjabi omu yaleekaana mu Luganda nti, ''tetwagala bannamawulire wano'' nga tannagalawo luggi lwe.

translation.en: Unrecognized by government and the Ministry of Health, these illegal clinics operate without letters from the medical council.
translation.lug: Olw'obutakkirizibwa gavumenti ne Minisitule y'ebyobulamu, amalwaliro ago agatali mu mateeka gakola nga tegalina bbaluwa kuva mu kakiiko akafuga abasawo.

translation.en: Many clinics in Kampala, Wakiso, Mukono and central region do not have professional people working in them.
translation.lug: Amalwaliro mangi mu Kampala, Wakiso, Mukono ne mu kitundu ky'omu masekkati tegalina bakugu bagakolamu.

translation.en: According to Ahimbisibwe, slum dwellings like Kifumbira-Kamwokya are ideal for unregistered private medical centres to operate.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Ahimbisibwe, enzigotta nga Kifumbira-Kamwokya zirabika zirimu amalwaliro agatali mawandiise kukola.

translation.en: "You do not expect such people to be responsible," Ahimbisibwe notes in frustration.
translation.lug: Tosuubira bantu abo kuba na buvunaanyizibwa, Ahimbisibwe bwe yagambye mu busungu.

translation.en: Mulago Hospital is a shining example of how medical waste disposal is supposed to work.
translation.lug: Eddwaliro ly'e Mulago kyakulabirako ekirungi ku ngeri enkwata ya kasasiro w'eddwaliro gy'erina okuba.

translation.en: With three incinerators, Mulago boasts an organised and elaborately systematic method of medical waste management.
translation.lug: N'ebyuma bisatu ebyokya kasasiro, Mulago erina enkola ennambulukufu ey'okukwatamu kasasiro.

translation.en: Plastic bottles are recycled, domestic waste is collected by Kampala City Council and human body parts are taken to the mortuary grounds in Bukasa.
translation.lug: Obucupa obwa pulasitiika buddamu okusaanuusibwa, kasasiro w'awaka akung'aanyizibwa Kampala Capital City Authority n'ebitundu by'emibiri gy'abantu bitwalibwa mu ggwanika e Bukasa.

translation.en: But for the residents of Kifumbira Kamwokya, just two kilometres away, Mulago's organisation offers little comfort.
translation.lug: Naye mu batuuze b'e Kifumbira Kamwokya, abawukanako kkiromita bbiri zokka, enteekateeka ya Mulago ebagumya kitono.

translation.en: Used needles, syringes and blood transfusion tubes were dumped in Kifumbira, Kamwokya.
translation.lug: Empiso ezikozeseddwa, ebbomba ezivaamu eddagala ly'empiso n'obupiira obuyisibwamu omusaayi byali bisuulibwa mu Kifumbira - Kamwokya.

translation.en: Mulago Hospital has an incinerator.
translation.lug: Mulago erina ekyuma omwokyebwa kasasiro.

translation.en: THE INDEPENDENT July 23 - 29, 2010 By Rosebell Kagumire and Maya Prabhu.
translation.lug: The Independent w'Ogwomukaaga 23-29, 2010 bya Rosebell Kagumire ne Maya Prabhu.

translation.en: The sprawling Nakivale Refugee Settlement in south-western Uganda is home to over 50,000 asylum-seekers and refugees.
translation.lug: Enkambi y'ababundabunda eya Sprawling Refugee Settlement mu bukiikakkono bw'obugwanjuba bwa Uganda maka g'ababundabunda n'abanoonyiboobubudamu 50,000.

translation.en: Okumu asked whether the government should come in as a guarantor or rely on the weak insurance market that characterises our economy?
translation.lug: Okumu yabuuza oba Gavumenti erina okujja ng'omusembi oba yeesigame ku nkola ya yinsuwa ennafu eri mu ggwanga?

translation.en: This was done for easy supervision and conducting routine operations directed by the Directorate of Criminal Investigations.
translation.lug: Kino kyakolebwa okwanguya okulondoola wamu n'okukola ebikwekweto ebikolebwa ekitongole ekinoonyereza ku buzzi bw'emisango.

translation.en: The actions by the former Allied Democratic Forces reporters if not checked can be a recipe for disaster.
translation.lug: Ebikolwa by'abawandiika ku baaliko bamukwatammundu ba Allied Democratic Forces singa tebikolebwako biyinza okuvaamu obuzibu.

translation.en: The demand for the reinstatement of the former Allied Democratic Force liaison office at the Container Village cannot be entertained.
translation.lug: Obwetaavu bw'okuzzaawo woofiisi z'abaaliko bamukwatammundu ba Allied Democratic Force ku Container Village tebusobola kukkirizibwa.

translation.en: Lieutenant Col Buturo dismissed the proposal of setting up an office even after numerous complaints from the wananchi.
translation.lug: Luteenanti Kkano Buturo yagoba okusaba kw'okussaawo woofiisi wadde nga abantu ba bulijjo baali beemulugunyizza nnyo.

translation.en: All these affairs at the former Container Village were used in the name of the Joint-Terrorist Task Force of Uganda which negatively affected its image.
translation.lug: Ensonga zino zonna ezaali ku eyali Container Village zeeyambisibwa mu linnya ly'okussaawo akakiiko akalwanyisa abatujju mu Uganda ekyayonoona ekifaananyi kyakyo.

translation.en: There are active serving Uganda People's Defense Force soldiers who need to observe and abide by rules and regulations of the army.
translation.lug: Waliwo abajaasi ba Uganda People's Defence Force abaweereza abeetaaga okugondera amateeka n'ebiragiro by'amagye.

translation.en: These individuals include Benz Tushabe, Kigonya Siraje, Abdu Rashid Mukiibi, Kakooza Ahmad and others.
translation.lug: Abantu bano mulimu Benz Tushabe, Kigonya siraje, Andy Rashid Mukiibi, Kakooza Ahmad n'abalala.

translation.en: It was widely involved in extortion, illegal detentions and torture, and forgery of Joint-Terrorist Task Force of Uganda documents.
translation.lug: Lyenyigira nnyo mu bulyake, okusiba okutali mu mateeka n'okutulugunya, n'okugingirira ebiwandiiko by'akakiiko akalwanyisa abatujju mu Uganda.

translation.en: The Arab world whose agenda and accountability cannot be clear and convincing.
translation.lug: Ensi y'Abawalabu ng'ebigobererwa n'embalirira yabyo si nnambulukufu era nga tematiza.

translation.en: It is wrong for the group to claim that the government negotiated a deal with Ali Bamuze and Muhammed Kigundu and ignored them.
translation.lug: Kikyamu ekibinja okulumiriza nti gavumenti yakola ddiiru ne Ali Bamuze ne Muhammed Kiggundu ate n'ebasuulirira.

translation.en: The Allied Democratic Forces and Lord Resistance Army leadership are still holed up in the bush fighting the government.
translation.lug: Obukulembeze bwa Allied Democratic Forces ne Lord Resistance Army bukyalemedde mu nsiko bulwanyisa gavumenti.

translation.en: Therefore, it's irrelevant for the group to claim to work for and on behalf of the Allied Democratic Force.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo tekyetaagisa kibinja kulumiriza nti kikolera oba nti kikola ku lwa Allied democratic force.

translation.en: It's not true that by the time Rwigyema Shafik was arrested, he was on official Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force of Uganda duties as alleged.
translation.lug: Si kituufu nti mu kiseera Rwigyema Shafik mwe yakwatibwa, yali ku mulimu gw'akakiiko akalwanyisa abatujju mu Uganda nga bwe kyogerebwa.

translation.en: Much as he was initially deployed by the Joint Anti-Terrorist Task Force of Uganda in the Busoga region, he was given an official vehicle and a pistol.
translation.lug: Wadde nga yasindikibwa mu kusooka, akakiiko akalwanyisa abatujju mu Uganda mu bitundu by'e Busoga, yaweebwa emmotoka ya gavument ne pisito.

translation.en: In 2007, after my second contract, I thought maybe I had served enough, but the board said no because of Kamonkoli.
translation.lug: Mu nkumi bbiri musanvu oluvannyuma lwa kontulakiti yange eyokubiri, nalowooza nti nali mpeerezza ekimala naye akakiiko kaagaana olwa Kamonkoli.

translation.en: Secondly, because of the delays in Kamonkoli, the factory ended up costing much than it should have cost.
translation.lug: Ekyokubiri, olw'okulwawo kwa Kamonkoli, ekkolero lyawunzika nga lisasudde kinene okusinga ku kye lyalina okusasula.

translation.en: It is true that up to 2008 we had been making profits.
translation.lug: Kituufu nti okutuuka mu nkumi bbiri munaana twali tukola amagoba.

translation.en: The East African Common Market is in place finally.
translation.lug: Kyaddaaki akatale k'amawanga g'obugwanjuba bwa Afirika kagguse.

translation.en: The Common Market is a very big deal for Uganda Clays.
translation.lug: Akatale k'omukago ka mugaso nnyo eri Uganda Clays.

translation.en: We are the biggest in the community in spite of our counterparts in Kenya producing at lower costs of production, but our quality is unmatched.
translation.lug: Ffe tusinga obunene mu kitundu wadde nga bannaffe mu Kenya bafulumya ebyamaguzi ku miwendo egya wansi, naye omutindo gwaffe tegwenkanankana.

translation.en: The job in Uganda Clays was tailor-made for me.
translation.lug: Omulimu mu Uganda Clays gwateekebwawo nga gwange.

translation.en: It has been a challenging but exciting eighteen years I have spent here, first as company secretary for nine years and then CEO for nine years.
translation.lug: Kubadde kusoomoozebwa ate nga kisanyusa nti emyaka kkumi na munaana gye mmaze wano, okusooka ng'omuwandiisi wa kampuni okumala emyaka mwenda n'emirala mwenda nga ssenkulu.

translation.en: So I am carrying good memories for the company, the employees, and the board, especially the chairman, Professor Ssenfuma.
translation.lug: Nolwekyo nina ebujjukizo bya kampuni ebirungi, abakozi, n'olukiiko, naddala ssentebe, pulofeesa Ssenfuma.

translation.en: He has been my chairman since I became the chief executive officer in 2001.
translation.lug: Abadde ssentebe wange okuva lwe nnafuuka ssenkulu w'ekitongole mu nkumi bbiri mu gumu.

translation.en: Uganda Clays is a worker focused organisation in almost every way and I think that has been the basis of our success.
translation.lug: Uganda Clays kitongole ekifaayo ennyo ku bakozi kumpi mu buli ngeri era ndowooza gwe gubadde omusingi gw'obuwanguzi bwaffe.

translation.en: We have put employees first and you have seen this through the awards we have got from the Federation of Uganda Employers.
translation.lug: Abakozi tubatadde ku mwanjo era kino mukirabye okuyita mu birabo bye tufunye okuva mu Federation of Uganda Employers.

translation.en: In February next year I will make 64, how old are you?
translation.lug: Mu gwokubiri omwaka ogujja nja kuweza emyaka nkaaga mu ena, olina emyaka emeka?

translation.en: In Africa that is old age.
translation.lug: Mu Afirika, egyo myaka gya bukadde.

translation.en: I became the chief executive officer in 2001.
translation.lug: Nafuuka ssenkulu w'ekitongole mu nkumi bbiri mu gumu.

translation.en: That means my contract has been renewed twice in 2004 and 2007.
translation.lug: Ekyo kitegeeza nti kontulakiti yange ezziddwa buggya emirundi ebiri, mu nkumi bbiri mu ena ne nkumi bbiri musanvu.

translation.en: John Wafula who has been the Chief Executive at Uganda Clays Kajjansi leaves office at the end of this year.
translation.lug: John Wafula abadde ssenkulu wa Uganda clays Kajjansi ava mu woofiisi ku nkomerero y'omwaka guno.

translation.en: The Independent`s Patrick Kagenda talked to him.
translation.lug: Patrick kagenda owa Independent yayogeddeko naye.

translation.en: According to the Independent issue of July 23-29, Housing finance bank last week listed its oversubscribed bond on the Uganda securities exchange.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent ku nsonga ya 23-29 Ogwomusanvu, bbanka ya Housing Finance wiiki ewedde yatimba olukalala lw'omugabo ogusinze oggulibwa ku Uganda Securities Exchange

translation.en: The lead participants in the bond, who invested more than 5 billion shillings, were the National Social Security Fund and Crane bank.
translation.lug: Abeetabi abaasinga mu kibanda, abaateekamu ssente ezisukka mu buwumbi bwa siringi butaano baali ba National Security Fund ne Crane bank.

translation.en: The participants who invested more than 2.5 billion include the Stanbic Investment Management Services and the East African Development Bank.
translation.lug: Abeetabamu abaasiga obuwumbi obusukka mu bubiri n'ekitundu mulimu Stanbic Investment Management Service ne East African Development Bank.

translation.en: Housing Finance Bank Director for Development Finance, Patrick Kabonero said the bank plans to concentrate on local funding to raise the 80 billion.
translation.lug: Ssenkulu wa Housing Finance Bank For Developmet, Patrick Kabonero yagambye nti banka eteekateeka okussa essira ku kusiga ensimbi kuno okusobola okuweza obuwumbi kinaana.

translation.en: MTN Uganda last week received its 5G network from Huawei Technologies of China.
translation.lug: MTN Uganda wiiki ewedde yafuna neetiwaaka yaayo eya 5G okuva mu Hauwei Technologies ey'e Kyayina.

translation.en: MTN Chief Executive, Themba Khumalo said that they believe with such investments, Uganda will be among the fastest growing economies in Africa.
translation.lug: Ssenkulu wa MTN, Themba Khumalo yagambye nti bakkiriza nti okusiga ensimbi nga kuno, Uganda ejja kuba mu mawanga agasinga okukulaakulanira ku misinde emingi mu Africa.

translation.en: Investment in the 5G network is part of the 111 million dollars that MTN is reported to have budgeted for additional network investment.
translation.lug: Okusiga ensimbi mu neetiwaaka ya 5G kitundu ku bukadde bwa ddoola 111 MTN bw'egambibwa okuba nga yabalirira okwongera okusiga mu neetiwaaka.

translation.en: Last October, MTN signed a loan agreement with 11 commercial banks providing a one hundred million dollar for network investment.
translation.lug: Omwezi gwekkumi oguwedde, MTN yassa omukono ku ndagaano y'ebbanja ne banka z'obusuubuzi 11 ne zigiwa obukadde bwa ddoola kikumi okuzisiga mu neetiwaaka.

translation.en: MTN is connected to The East African Marine System cable and will connect to The East African Submarine Cable System, which goes live soon.
translation.lug: MTN yayungibwa ku mukutu gwa The East African Marine System era ejja kuyungibwa ku The East African Submarine Cable System ogugenda ku mpewo mu bwangu.

translation.en: Development Finance Company of Uganda Bank last week hosted its investment club members to a breakfast forum at the Kampala Serena Hotel.
translation.lug: Development Finance company of Uganda Bank wiiki ewedde yakyaza bammemba b'ekibiina ekisiga ensimbi ku kyemisana ku Serena hotel mu Kampala.

translation.en: The forum is aimed at equipping Development Finance Company of Uganda Investment Club members with skills to better manage their businesses.
translation.lug: Omukutu guluubirira okuwa bammemba ba Development Finance Bank Company of Uganda Investment Club obukodyo okukwata obulungi bizinensi zaabwe.

translation.en: Charles Ocici of Enterprise Uganda took the investment club members through a session on how to build lasting business clubs and investments.
translation.lug: Charles Ocici owa Enterprise Uganda yasomesa bammemba b'ekibiina ekisiga ensimbi ku ngeri y'okuteekawo ebibiina bya bizinensi ebiwangaala n'okusiga ensimbi.

translation.en: Ocici said that it takes more than just friendship but rather an investment in time and determination to build a strong brand.
translation.lug: Ocici yagamba nti kitwala ekisukka ku mukwano wabula okusiga ensimbi mu budde n'obumalirivu okuzimba omutindo omugumu.
