translation.en: The Head of Women in Business Damalie Mukiibi said that the future of the country's economy is in the development of investment clubs.
translation.lug: Akulira bizinensi z'abakyala Damalie Mukiibi yagambye nti ebiseera by'eggwanga eby'omu maaso mu by'enfuna biri mu kukulaakulanya bibiina by'okusiga ensimbi.

translation.en: Standard Bank the mother bank of Stanbic Bank Uganda has been named the best investment bank in Africa in 2010.
translation.lug: Standard Bank nnakazadde wa bbanka ya Stanbic Bank Uganda erondeddwa nga bbanka esinga okusiga ensimbi mu Afirika mu 2010.

translation.en: Jacko Maree, the Standard Bank Group chief executive said that it is particularly pleasing to be recognised in Africa's highly competitive banking sector.
translation.lug: Jacko Maree, ssenkulu wa Standard Bank Group yagambye nti kisanyusiza ddala okusiimibwa mu kitongole kya zi bbanka mu Afirika ekirimu okuvuganya ennyo.

translation.en: Being named as the best investment bank in Africa is further confirmation of our capacity to provide top quality services.
translation.lug: Okulondebwayo nga bbanka esinga okusiga ensimbi mu Afirika kuba kwongera kukakasa busobozi bwaffe okutuusa obuweereza obw'omutindo ogwa waggulu.

translation.en: Standard Bank has a presence in 17 African countries, 16 countries outside the continent.
translation.lug: Standard Bank eri mu nsi z'Afirika 17 ne mu nsi 16 wabweru wa ssemazinga.

translation.en: Opportunity Uganda, a microfinance institution, has dragged the Uganda Revenue Authority to commercial court for wrongful taxation.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'ebyenfuna ekya Opportunity Uganda kitutte Uganda Revenue Authority mu kkooti y'ebyenfuna olw'okukiwooza emisolo mu bukyamu.

translation.en: Post Bank Uganda was last week relieved from paying 288 million shillings in Value Added Tax arising from the sale of its land on William Street.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde Post Bank Uganda yasonyiyibwa omusolo gwa bukadde 228 ku misolo egyali girina okweyongeramu ng'etunze ettaka ku luguudo lwa William Street.

translation.en: Opportunity Uganda is also contesting a stamp duty to the tune of 488 million shillings imposed on it by the tax body.
translation.lug: Opportunity Uganda ewakanya omusolo ogw'obukadde bwa siringi 488 ogwagiteekebwako ekitongole ekiwooza ky'omusolo.

translation.en: It says it is not a credit institution if it is not obligated to work as a collecting agent for the Uganda Revenue Authority.
translation.lug: Kigamba nti si kitongole ekiwozi ky'ensimbi bwe kiba nga tekirina layisinsi ya Uganda Revenue Authority ekikkiriza kukungaanya byamaguzi ebigenda okusaabazibwa.

translation.en: Uganda Revenue Authority, without verifying the details of its transactions, wrongfully classified them by applying inappropriate stamp duty rates.
translation.lug: Uganda revenue Authority nga tekakasizza biwandiiko okwaguliddwa ebintu, singa ebikolako mu bukyamu n'ebiggyako omusolo ogutatuukagana nabyo.

translation.en: Development Finance Company of Uganda bank shareholders Khumalo Nicholas, Okwir, Aaron Agima and Damalie will host investment breakfast.
translation.lug: Bannanyini migabo mu bbanka ya Development Finance Company of Uganda omuli Khumalo Nicholas, Okwir, Aaron Agima ne Damalie baakwogera ku by'okusiga ensimbi.

translation.en: In 1979, Harvard Business Review published an article by a young economist and associate professor, Michael E.
translation.lug: Mu 1979, Harvard Business Review yafulumya ekiwandiiko kya munnabyanfuna omuto era eyali anaatera okufuuka Polofeesa, Michael E.

translation.en: Housing Finance Bank bond listed on use and sued for Shillings 500 million.
translation.lug: Emigabo gya Housing Finance Bank egyalagibwa era n'ewawaabirwa mu mateeka lwa bukadde bwa siringi 500.

translation.en: According to the Independent of July 23 - 29, 2010, awareness can help a company understand the structure of its industry.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent owa nga 27 -29, 2010, okumanyisibwa kuyamba kkampani okumanya ekisaawe mw'ekolera.

translation.en: It was his first Havard Business Review article, and it started a revolution in the strategy field.
translation.lug: Kye kiwandiiko kye ekya Havard Business Review ekyasooka era kyatandikawo enkyukakyuka mu kisaawe ekyo.

translation.en: In subsequent decades, Porter's work has impacted health care and many other people's lives.
translation.lug: Mu myaka egiddiridde, emirimu gya Porter gikoze kinene mu byobulamu ne mu bantu abalala bangi.

translation.en: Porter's five forces have shaped a generation of academic research and business practice.
translation.lug: Empagi gya Porter ettaano mu nzirukaya ya kkampuni zirambise okunoonyereza mu kusoma ne mu byobusuubuzi.

translation.en: With assistance from Harvard Business School Professor Jan Rivkin and longtime colleague Joan Magretta, Porter extended the classic work.
translation.lug: Ng'ayambibwako Polofeesa Jan Rivkin owa Harvard Business School ne munywanyi we gwe bamaze ebbanga eddene Joan Magretta, Porter yasobola okugaziya emirimu gye.

translation.en: Her attempt to reunite Ugandans around her position failed at that point.
translation.lug: Okulafuubana kwe okw'okwagala okugatta Bannayuganda ng'akozesa ekifo ekyo kwagaana mu kaseera ako.

translation.en: It is time for the government to try and bring Ugandans together on such an issue of national importance.
translation.lug: Kye kiseera gavumenti okugezaako okugatta Bannayuganda ku nsonga ng'eyo egasiza awamu eggwanga.

translation.en: Paget Kintu said that African Union member states have betrayed Africa.
translation.lug: Paget Kintu yagamba nti amawanga ga African Union galiddemu Afirika olukwe.

translation.en: The African Union 15th Summit in Kampala ended on July 27.
translation.lug: Ttabamiruka wa African Union ow'omulundi ogw'e 15 eyatuula e Kampala yakomekkerezebwa nga 27 Gwomusanvu.

translation.en: Kwame Nkrumah one of Africa's greats said that revolutions are brought about by men who think as men of action and act as men of thought.
translation.lug: Kwame Nkrumah omu ku bakyasinze mu Afirika yagamba nti enkyukakyuka zireetebwa abasajja abalowooza ng'abasajja ab'ebikolwa era ne bakola ng'abasajja abalowooza.

translation.en: The Summit left doubt as to whether African States are capable of working together to solve Africa's most pressing challenges.
translation.lug: Ttabamiruka yaleka okubuusabuusa oba ng'amawanga ga Afirika gasobola okukolera awamu okumalawo okusoomoozebwa okutawaanya ennyo Afirika.

translation.en: The July 11 bombings on Uganda now blamed on the Al-Quaeda, and Al-Shabab jihadist terrorists in Somalia.
translation.lug: Okutulika kwa bbomu okwali mu Uganda mu gwomusanvu nga kkumi na lumu kwateekebwa ku bannalukalala ba Al-Quaeda ne Al-Shabab jihadist okuva e Somalia.

translation.en: Despite the jihadist threats, Uganda became the first African nation to respond to the African Union call in 2007 to send troops to war-torn Somalia.
translation.lug: Newankubadde waaliwo okutiisibwatiisibwa okuva mu ba jihadists, Uganda ly'eggwanga lya Afirika eryasooka okuddamu omulanga African Union mu nkumi bbiri mu musanvu okusindika amagye mu Somalia eyali etaaguddwataaguddwa olutalo.

translation.en: Uganda was followed by Burundi in sending troops to Somalia.
translation.lug: Uganda yagobererwa Burundi mu kusindika amagye e Somalia.

translation.en: Uganda remained the lone nation in the African Union peace mission in Somalia until 2008 when it was followed by Burundi.
translation.lug: Uganda y'ensi yokka eri mu African Union eyasigala ng'ekuuma emirembe mu Somalia okutuuka mu nkumi bbiri mu munaana bwe yeegattibwako Burundi.

translation.en: Other African countries such as Ghana, Nigeria and Sierra Leone broke their commitment to send troops to flush out the Al-Shabab in Somalia.
translation.lug: Amawanga ga Afirika amalala nga: Ghana, Nigeria ne Sierra Leone gaava ku bweyamo bw'okusindika amagye gaago okufufuggaza aba Al-Shabab e Somalia.

translation.en: Until July 11, Uganda and Burundi remained the only countries in Somalia being drained both in personnel and equipment due to militant attacks.
translation.lug: Okutuuka nga kkumi na lumu ogwomusanvu, Uganda ne Burundi ge mawanga gokka agaali gakyali e Somalia nga gakaluubirizibwa mu amagye n'ebikozesebwa olw'obulumbaganyi bw'abayeekera.

translation.en: There seems no concerted effort on the continent to end this growing terror in Somalia.
translation.lug: Kirabika nga tewali nzikiriziganya ya kukolera wamu ku Ssemazinga okukomya ebikolwa eby'ekitujju ebikula mu Somalia.

translation.en: This has left only Uganda and Burundi to fight with the Lord Resistance Army uprising in northern Uganda and the troubles in Bujumbura.
translation.lug: Kino kirese Uganda ne Burundi bokka okulwanagana n'obutabanguko bwa Lord Resistance Army mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda n'obwegugungo mu Bujumbura.

translation.en: The African Union states must show their commitment to solving Africa's problems not just by words by concrete action on the ground.
translation.lug: Amawanga agali mu mukago ogutaba amanga ga Afirika galina okulaga obumalirivu bwago mu kugonjoola ebizibu Afirika nga tegakoma mu bigambo wabula nga gakolera ddala ku bizibu ebiriwo.

translation.en: Nkrumah and Sekou Toure stood to liberate Africa from colonialism and yet today, no leader appears to borrow a leaf from them.
translation.lug: Nkrumah ne Sekou Toure okununula Afirika okuva mu mikono gy'abafuzi b'amatwale kyokka mu kiseera kino tewali mukulembeze ayinza kubayigirako.

translation.en: That explains why the approval for the peacekeeping role in Somalia was left to only two countries for over three years now.
translation.lug: Ekyo ekinnyonnyola lwaki okukakasa omulimi gw'okukuuma emirembe mu Somalia kwalekerwa ensi bbiri zokka okumala kati ebbanga lya myaka esatu.

translation.en: Allan Ssempebwa Kyobe of Makerere University thinks Al-Shabab claimed false responsibility.
translation.lug: Allan Ssempebwa Kyobe owa Makerere University alowooza nti Al-Shabab yeewaana mu bukyamu.

translation.en: if any Ugandan had been behind the terror attacks, with or without links to Al- Shabaab, they would never come out to take responsibility.
translation.lug: Singa Munnayuganda yenna yabadde emabega w'obulumbaganyi bw'ekitujju oba ng'alina oba nga talina kawate ku Al-Shabaab, tebandivuddeyo kwewaana.

translation.en: The Ugandan security agencies need to continue with investigations despite the Al-Shabaab claim.
translation.lug: Ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda mu Uganda birina okugenda mu maaso n'okunoonyereza newankubadde Al-Shabaab eraga nti yeeyakikola.

translation.en: After the bomb blasts during the FIFA world cup final in two places in Kampala, Somali militants claimed responsibility.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okubwatuka kwa bbomu mu bifo ebibiri abantu gye baali balabira omupiira gwa fayinalo za FIFA world cup mu Kampala, abatujju okuva e Somali beewaana nti be baali emabega w'ekikolwa kino.

translation.en: In his July 25 article in the Daily Monitor, Abu Ayman's attempt to prove to us that Islam is misrepresented by the terrorists confused us more.
translation.lug: Mu mboozi ye eyafulumira mu Daily Monitor nga abiri mu ttaano ogwomusanvu Abu Ayman mwe yagerezaako okutulaga nti abayeekera bakozesa bubi Obusiraamu ne kitutabula.

translation.en: David Kulubya wants to know the killing that Quran calls illegal.
translation.lug: David Kulubya ayagala okumanya okutta Kolaani kw'egamba nti kumenya mateeka.

translation.en: He admits that the 72 virgin reward is indeed in the Hadith but it should not be taken to be true.
translation.lug: Akkiriza nti ekirabo ky'embeera ensanvu mu omusanvu kyogerwako mu Aya naye tekirina kutwalibwa nti ntuufu.

translation.en: Prophet Muhammad said that a believer remains in the scope of his religion.
translation.lug: Nabbi Muhammad yagamba nti omukkirirza alina okutambulira mu ddiini ye.

translation.en: The restoration of the East African common market is the non-material dream of all good globalists.
translation.lug: Okuzzibwako kw'ensuubulagana y'amawanga ga East Afirika kuba kutuukiriza kirooto ekyannamaddala eky'okutambuza ebintu okusukka ensalo z'ensi zino.

translation.en: The East African Community goal is clear, a common economic space for all people, a space in which trade, capital, and people move freely.
translation.lug: Ekiruubirirwa ky'omukago gwa East Africa kirambulukufu, ebyensuubulagana ebigatta abantu bonna ku bwereere, ekitundu ng'ebyobusuubuzi, entandikwa n'abantu nga beetaaya awatali kukugirwa.

translation.en: Therefore, the East African Community's joined strategy calls for a more open border for the movement of goods and people.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo omukago ogutaba amawanga ga East Africa gwaggulawo kaweefube w'okwongera okuggula ensalo zaago okusobozesa ebyamaguzi n'abantu okutambuala obulungi.

translation.en: It is absurd to believe that suddenly we can create a regional free trade area with Kenya without massive social-economic changes in our countries.
translation.lug: Kyennyamiza okukkiriza nti tusobola okutandikawo ensuubulagana ne Kenya mu bunnambiro nga tetusoose kukola nkyukakyuka mu byanfuna mu mawanga gaffe.

translation.en: In common market countries, college education is free, but this can not happen in our East African Community setting.
translation.lug: Mu mawanga agasuubuliganira awamu, okusoma ku ddaala lya college kwa bwereere, naye kino tekisobola kubaawo mu nkola yaffe ey'omukago ogutaba amawanga ga East Africa.

translation.en: The East African Common Market was started in 1917 as a preindustrial stage.
translation.lug: Okusuubulagana kw'amawanga ga East Africa kwatandika mu lukumi mu lwenda mu kkumi na musanvu nga tetunnatandika kukola byamaguzi ebiva mu makolero.

translation.en: It was started to serve the British business interests and those settlers in Kenya.
translation.lug: Kyatandikibwa okutuukiriza ebigendererwa by'Abangereza n'abo abaasenga mu Kenya.

translation.en: Therefore, it came as no surprise that when joint services were established in 1945, Kenya benefited more than Uganda and Tanganyika.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo, tekyagwa bugwi nti enkolagana ey'awamu bwe yatandikibwawo mu lukumi mu lwenda mu ana mw'etaano, Kenya yaganyulwa okusinga Uganda ne Tanzania.

translation.en: Kenya benefitted in terms of value-added to their Gross Domestic Product; more employment benefits and revenue.
translation.lug: Kenya yaganyulwa mu ngeri omwali okwongera omutindo ku byamaguzi byabwe; emirimu n'omusolo.

translation.en: For instance, in 1971 the East Africa Railways employed 55% Kenyans, 33% Tanzanians and 12 per cent Ugandans.
translation.lug: Ekyokulabirako, mu lukumi mu lwenda nsanvu mu gumu oluguudo lw'eggaali y'omukka olwa East Afirika lwawa Bannakenya ebitundu ataano mu bitaano ku buli kikumi emirimu, ebitundu asatu mu bisatu ku buli kikumi baali Batanzania n'ebitundu kkumi na bibiri ku buli kikumi baali Bannayuganda.

translation.en: Kenya also had a higher manufacturing base than either Uganda or Tanzania, a situation that persists to date.
translation.lug: Kenya era yalina amakolero mangi okusinga ku Uganda ne Tanzania, embeera eyo ebaddewo okutuusa leero.

translation.en: To correct this uneven situation the British colonial government established the Raisman Commission in 1960.
translation.lug: Okutereeza embeera eya kyekubiira eno, gavumenti y'abafuzi b'amatwale eya Bungereza yateekawo akaiiko ka Raisman Commission mu lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga.

translation.en: According to Professor Brown, who was a member of the Commission, Kenya gained the most from the common market.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Polofeesa Brown, eyali mmemba ku kakiiko kano, Kenya ye yasinga okuganyurwa mu katale k'awamu.

translation.en: Uganda gained marginally and Tanzania broke even.
translation.lug: Uganda yafunamu kitono ate yo Tanzania yavaamu n'okuvaamu.

translation.en: Therefore, fiscal compensation to Tanganyika and Uganda through the distribution tool was recommended, as one of the solutions to this inequity.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo, kyasalibwawo okuliyirira Tanzania ne Uganda mu by'ensimbi nga bagabana ebikozesebwa ng'omu ku kaweefube w'okumalawo obutali bwenkanya buno.

translation.en: The sums involved were far short of what would be needed to lead to the development of industries in Uganda and Tanganyika.
translation.lug: Ssente ezaateekebwamu zaali ntono nnyo okusinziira ku zaali zeetaagibwa okukulaakulanya eby'amakolero mu Uganda ne Tanganyika.

translation.en: The sums that would be considered adequate were too high for Kenya to accept.
translation.lug: Ssente ezanditwaliddwa nti ze zimala zaali nnyingi nnyo nga kizibu Kenya okuzikkirirza.

translation.en: I am now wondering what exactly was negotiated recently by the architects of the East African Community to address this situation.
translation.lug: Kati nneebuuza ddala biki ebyateesebwako jjuuzi wakati w'abateeseza omukago ogutaba amawanga ga East Africa okusobola okutereeza embeera eno.

translation.en: Abbey Kibirige Semuwemba confirms that the East African Community common market is an ideal dream.
translation.lug: Abbey Kibirige Semuwemba akakasa nti ensuubulagana y'amawanga g'omukago gwa East Africa kikyali kirooto.

translation.en: According to the independent issue of July 30th to August 05, 2010, his act was unlawful.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent owa nga asatu ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga ttaano ogwomunaana nkumi bbiri mu kkumi, ekikolwa kye tekyali mu mateeka.

translation.en: Byarugaba is excited at the news that finally a new Managing Director has been appointed at National Social Security Fund.
translation.lug: Byarugaba musanyufu olw'amawulire nti kyaddaaki ssenkulu wa National Social Security Fund omuggya alondeddwa.

translation.en: Richard Byarugaba takes over from Grace Isabirye who took over from David Jamwa and made him and Mondo Kagonyera pay their debts to NSSF.
translation.lug: Richard Byarugaba adda mu bigere bya Grace Isabirye eyadda mu bigere bya David Jamwa eyaleetera ye ne Mondo Kagonyera okusasula amabanja gaabwe eri NSSF.

translation.en: I have never met Byarugaba but I have followed press reports about him over time.
translation.lug: Sisisinkanagako Byarugaba naye mbadde ngoberera lipooti ezimwogerwako mu mawulire okumala akabanga.

translation.en: I was excited by the announcement that he was taking over at National Social Security Fund.
translation.lug: Nasanyukira nnyo ekirangiriro yali alondeddwa ku National Social Security Fund.

translation.en: He is no doubt better placed to drive National Social Security Fund forward.
translation.lug: Tabuusubwabuusibwa nti y'asaanidde okutwala National Social Security Fund mu maaso.

translation.en: His previous employment suggests he will make sound decisions in regard to prudent and viable investment of workers' savings
translation.lug: By'akozeeko biraga nti ajja kukola okusalawo okutuufu mu kutereka n'okusiga obulungi ensimbi eziterekebwa abakozi.

translation.en: He can turn around the pension scheme, increase interest on workers' savings as well as returns on National Social Security Fund investments.
translation.lug: Ayinza okulongoosaamu mu nkola ey'akasiimo, okwongera amagoba ku nsimbi abakozi ze batereka n'okubaddiza ku magoba agaba gavudde mu nsimbi eziba zisigiddwa.

translation.en: As it is the tradition at National Social Security Fund let us not be quick to shoot him down.
translation.lug: Nga bw'eri enkola ku National Social Security Fund, tuleke kwanguwa kumulemesa.

translation.en: The time for being cynical about National Social Security Fund has long ticked away into the past.
translation.lug: Ekiseera ky'okusuubira nti abantu beefaako bokka ku National Social Security Fund ekibaddewo emabega kyakufumwa bufumwa.

translation.en: Everybody deserves a fair chance and so let's give Byarugaba a chance.
translation.lug: Buli agwana omukisa okutali bukwakkulizo, n'olw'ekyo tuwe Byarugaba omukisa.

translation.en: Duncan of Kyaliwajjala wouldn't call the current democracy competitive.
translation.lug: Duncan ow'e Kyaliwajjala yabadde tasobola kuyita demokolasiya aliwo nti wa kuvuganya.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement has corruptly co-opted a large section of the electorate to serve the party's interests.
translation.lug: National Resistance Movement era esazeewo okugulirira ettundutundu erisinga ery'ekitongole ky'ebyokulonda okutuukiriza ebigendererwa by'eibiina.

translation.en: There is little competition for votes outside and inside the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Waliwo okuvuganyiza obululu kutono wabweru ne munda mu National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Ocheto said that Mwenda was wrong.
translation.lug: Ocheto yagamba nti Mwenda yali mukyamu.

translation.en: Andrew Mwenda missed a great point by just concentrating on symptoms and in so doing, he came up with a wrong solution to tackle the problem.
translation.lug: Andrew Mwenda yalekayo ensonga enkulu n'ateeka essira ku bubonero era mu kukola kino, yawunzika n'enkola enkyamu okugonjoola ekizibu.

translation.en: Edgar says a section of the intellectual and political class in Uganda is too lazy to think over this paradox.
translation.lug: Edgar agamba nti abayivu ne bannabyabufuzi b'omu Uganda banafu nnyo okulowooza ku mbeera eno y'okusoomooza.

translation.en: There is an interesting discussion paper prepared by Ferraz and Finan at Berkeley in 2005.
translation.lug: Waaliwo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kiwandiiko ekyategekebwa Ferraz ne Finan e Berkeley mu nkumi bbiri mu etaano.

translation.en: As Ocheto rightly observes, the absence of term limits in Uganda's constitution removes all such re-election incentives.
translation.lug: Nga Ocheto bw'akiraba mu ngeri entuufu, obutabaawo kkomo ku bisanja mu Ssemateeka wa Uganda kiggyawo ebyandiyambyeko byonna mu kuddamu okulonda.

translation.en: Ocheto and Omeros think your points are questionable.
translation.lug: Ocheto ne Omeros balowooza nti ensonga zo ziriko akabuuza.

translation.en: Why should President Museveni put in place a competitive system that can cause him to lose power?
translation.lug: Lwaki Pulezidenti Museveni ateekawo enkola ey'okuvuganya eyinza okumuviirako okuggyibwa mu buyinza?

translation.en: Husain Haqqani, Pakistan's ambassador in Washington, addressed about Pakistan's contribution in the war on terror.
translation.lug: Husain Haqqani, omubaka wa Pakistan e Washington, yannyonnyodde Pakistan ky'ekoze mu lutalo ku butujju.

translation.en: Andrew said democracy is not failing us, we are failing it.
translation.lug: Andrew yagamba nti demokalasiya si y'atulemesa wabula ffe tumulemesa.

translation.en: According to the independent of July 30-August 5, 2010, how much money has been transferred in Uganda through the MTN mobile money services?
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent owa ng'asatu ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga ttaano ogwomunaana nkumi bbiri mu kkumi, ssente mmeka eziyisiddwa ku nkola ya MTN mobile money mu Uganda?

translation.en: Bank of Africa has signed up billions of Uganda Shillings with the French Development Agency to guarantee loans for Small and Medium Enterprises.
translation.lug: Bank of Africa etadde omukono ku buwumbi bwa siringi za Uganda n'ekitongole kya French Development Agency okusobozesa bubizinensi obutonotono okufuna looni.

translation.en: Billions of Uganda Shillings was overdrawn from the Bank of Uganda.
translation.lug: Obuwumbi bwa siringi za Uganda bwaggyiddwa mu Bank of Uganda.

translation.en: The money was meant for the Ministry of Education.
translation.lug: Ssente zaali zirina kuba za Minisitule y'ebyenjigiriza.

translation.en: The amount in billions of American dollars recently signed by Iran in a pipeline agreement is to send gas to Turkey.
translation.lug: Omuwendo oguli mu buwumbi bwa ddoola za Amerika gye buvuddeko bwateekeddwako omukono gavumenti ya Iran mu ndagaano y'okusindika ggaasi e Turkey.

translation.en: The American bank Manager Goldman Sachs has agreed to pay 550,000,000 American dollars to settle civil fraud charges made against it.
translation.lug: Maneja wa bbanka ya Amerika, Goldman Sachs akkirizza okusasula obukadde bwa ddoola za Amerika bitaano ataano mu butaano okuggyawo emisango gy'obufere egyamussibwako.

translation.en: The Kabale district administration was ordered by a court to pay 250,000,000 in millions of Ugandan Shillings to Gladys Aserua.
translation.lug: Obukulembeze bwa disitulikiti y'e Kabale bwalagiddwa kkooti okusasula Gladys Aserua obukadde bwa siringi za Uganda bibiri ataano.

translation.en: I condemn the attack on the innocent civilians in Kampala.
translation.lug: Nvumirira obulumbaganyi obwakolebwa ku bantu ba bulijjo abatalina musango mu Kampala.

translation.en: Terror has no place in Africa and no place in humanity.
translation.lug: Obutujju tebulina kifo mu Afirika ne mu buntu.

translation.en: African Union chairman and Malawi president said those involved should find other ways of addressing their differences than waste human life.
translation.lug: Ssentebe w'omukago gwa Afirika era nga ye Pulezidenti wa Malawi yagambye nti abo abakyenyigiddemu balina okufuna engeri endala ez'okugonjoola obutakkaanya bwabwe okusinga okutirimbula abantu.

translation.en: Bingu wa Mutharika addressed presidents at the African Union Summit on July 25th.
translation.lug: Bingu wa Mutharika yayogeddeko eri Bapulezidenti mu lukungaana lw'amawanga g'omukago gwa Afirika olwatuula ng'abiri mu ttaano ogwomusanvu.

translation.en: We have paid a price in treasure and in blood over the last two years.
translation.lug: Tusasudde mu kwagala ne mu musaayi mu myaka egisukka ebiri egiyise.

translation.en: More Pakistani have been killed by terrorists, including our military officers and intelligence service officials.
translation.lug: Abapakistani bangi batiddwa abatujju, nga mwe muli abaserikale baffe n'abakessi.

translation.en: President Yoweri Museveni called for social-economic transformation to attain maternal and child health.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni yakubirizza abantu okwekulaakulanya kiyambeko okutereeza ebyobulamu bya bamaama abazaala n'eby'abaana abawere.

translation.en: If there was an attack on Venezuela from Colombian territory, promoted by the Yankee Empire, we would suspend oil shipments to the US. Venezuela's President Hugo Chavez threatened to suspend oil shipments to the United States of America in case of any attacks from Colombia.
translation.lug: Singa waba nga waaliwo obulumbaganyi ku Venezuela okuva mu ttwale lya Colombia obwakolebwa Yankee Empire, twandiweze okutwala amafuta mu US. Pulezidenti wa Venezuela Hugo Chaves yatiisizzatiisizza okuyimiriza okutwala amafuta mu United States of America singa Colombia ekola obulumbaganyi bwokka.

translation.en: Chavez has threatened to halt oil exports to the United States if his country is attacked by Colombia.
translation.lug: Chavez atiisizzatiisizza okucankalanya okutunda amafuta agatwalibwa mu United States ssinga eggwanga lye lirumbibwa Colombia.

translation.en: It's the first time since the fall of the regime 31 years ago that anyone responsible in any way for even a small number of the grave atrocities.
translation.lug: Gwe mulundi ogwasoose bukyanga obukulembeze buva mu buyinza emyaka 31 emabega nga tewali muntu n'omu eyali akozesezza byuma bissi byonna.

translation.en: A prisoner of war is a man who tries to kill you and fails and then asks you not to kill him.
translation.lug: Omusibe okuva mu lutalo y'oyo agezaako okukutta n'alemererwa n'oluvannyuma n'akusaba oleme kumutta.

translation.en: Winston Churchill said that we shall never know all the good that a simple smile can do.
translation.lug: Winston Churchill yagamba nti tetulimanya birungi byonna akamwenyumwenyu akatono bye kasobola okukola.

translation.en: AMISOM as an AU and UN mandated peace keeping force has a limited capacity to protect the Presidential Palace, Mogadishu airport.
translation.lug: AMISON ng'ekitongole kya AU ne UN ekikuumi ky'emirembe tekiyina buyinza bumala  okukuuma olubiri lw'obwapulezidenti, ekisaawe ky'ennyonyi ekya Mogadishu.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Defence Force presence within the AMISOM framework does not answer the needs of the Ugandans.
translation.lug: Okubeerawo kwa Uganda People's Defence Force mu  AMISON tekuyamba kumalawo  byetaago bya bannayuganda.

translation.en: When the population talks of wiping out Al-Shabaab from Somalia, they mean militarily defeating them thus removing ability of launching attacks.
translation.lug: Abantu bwe boogera ku ky'okumalawo Al-Shabaab mu Somalia, bategeeza kubawangula mu kulwana olwo ne babeera nga tebakyasobola kukola bulumbaganyi.

translation.en: Since the Uganda People`s Defence Force cannot achieve that goal, the only feasible option is to withdraw from Somalia.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba nti Uganda People's Defence Force tesobola kutuukiriza kigendererwa ekyo, engeri yokka esobola okukolebwa kwe kuva mu Somalia.

translation.en: We can then, as a member state of the UN, ask the UN Security Council for a mandate forcefully invade Somalia to pursue Al-Shabaab.
translation.lug: Awo nno nga bammemba ba UN tusobola okusaba UN Security Council ejje mu Somalia ku mpaka efutize Al-Shabaab.

translation.en: This strategy would allow Uganda to launch attacks against the Al-Shabaab.
translation.lug: Enkola eno yandisobozesa Uganda okukola obulumbaganyi ku Al-Shabaab.

translation.en: Bwesigye works with Advocates for Public International Law Uganda.
translation.lug: Bwesigye akola ne Advocates for Public International Law Uganda.

translation.en: During its National Executive Conference in January, the NRM declared it had registered 8 million members including the under age.
translation.lug: Mu lukiiko lwa National Exective Conference mu Gatonya, NRM yalangirira nti yali ewandiisizza bammemba obukadde 8 omuli n'abatannaweza myaka.

translation.en: This was before the EC started the national voter registration exercise which also yielded about 15 million voters, up from 10 million in 2006.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo nga EC tennatandika nkola ya kuwandiisa balonzi era kyayambako okutuusa  abalonzi okukunukkiriza obukadde 15 okuva ku bukadde 10 mu 2006.

translation.en: The NRM has been registering people it calls its members across the country.
translation.lug: NRM ebadde ewandiisa abantu b'eyita bammemba baayo okwetooloola eggwanga.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission also doubts the authenticity of the NRM figures.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda nako kabuusabuusa obutuufu bw'omuwendo gwa NRM.

translation.en: Early this year, the NRM also doubted the genuineness of the EC's national voter register, alleging that it contained two million ghost names.
translation.lug: Ku ntandikwa y'omwaka guno, NRM nayo yabuusabuusa obutuufu bw'enkalala z'abalonzi eza EC ng'erumiriza nti zaalimu amannya ag'empewo obukadde bubiri.

translation.en: Uganda's demographic statistics put the 2009 population projections to 30.6 million.
translation.lug: Embalirira y'abantu mu Uganda mu 2009 eteebereza abantu okubeera mu bukadde 30.6.

translation.en: This implies that 14.2 million Ugandans are above 18 and thus qualified to register as voters.
translation.lug: Kino kitegeeza nti bannayuganda obukadde 14.2 bali waggulu w'emyaka 18 n'olw'ekyo bakkirizibwa okwewandiisa ng'abalonzi.

translation.en: Population estimates published by the Population Secretariat rise even more questions on the Electro Commission's 15 million voters.
translation.lug: Enteebereza y'omuwendo gw'abantu eyafulumizibwa eggwandiisizo  eteekawo ebibuuzo bingi ku balonzi obukadde 15 obw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The estimates for 2010 show Ugandans of 18 years and above are 13.9 million, up from 12.9 million in 2008.
translation.lug: Enteebereza ya 2010 eraga bannaganda ab'emyaka 18 n'okusukkawo bali obukadde 13.9 okuva ku bukadde 12.9 mu 2008.

translation.en: Given the high apathy among Ugandans to register for voting and death of some registered voters, the number of new voters would be fewer.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba nti bannayuganda tebaagala nnyo kwewandiisa kulonda n'okufa kw'abalonzi abamu abeewandiisa, omuwendo gw'abalonzi abapya gwandibadde mutono.

translation.en: However, the EC has said this is not the final figure.
translation.lug: Newankubadde, EC egambye nti guno si gwe muwendo ogw'enkomeredde.

translation.en: Some MPs in the NRM have already accused the secretariat of creating ghost members on the register which could facilitate rigging the primaries.
translation.lug: Ababaka abamu mu NRM bamaze okunenya eggwandiisizo olw'okutondawo bammemba ab'empewo ku lukalala ekiyinza okuleetawo okubba obululu mu kamyufu.

translation.en: Kinkizi East MP Chris Baryomunsi, has cited that a person's name would be manipulated to appear several times on the same register differently.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Kinkizi East Chris Baryomunsi anokoddeyo nti erinnya ly'omuntu liyinza okukyusibwakyusibwa ne lirabikira ku lukalala lwe lumu mu ngeri ez'enjawulo.

translation.en: At the recent NRM National Conference, some delegates complained that even well-known opposition members had been on the party register.
translation.lug: Ku lukiiko lwa NRM National Conference, abakiise abamu beemulugunyizza nti ne bammemba abali ku ludda oluvaganya abamanyiddwa baabadde ku lukalala lw'ekibiina.

translation.en: This had been done by some NRM officials for selfish interests.
translation.lug: Kino kyali kikoleddwa abakungu ba NRM abamu abeeyagaliza ebyabwe.

translation.en: The NRM deputy spokesman Ofwono Opondo has said that not all 9 million party registered members are eligible to vote as 1 million are minors.
translation.lug: Amyuka omwogezi wa NRM Ofwono Opondo agambye nti si bammemba b'ekibiina bonna obukadde 9 abaawandiisibwa nti balonzi abatuukiridde kuba akakadde 1 si balonzi.

translation.en: However,a big question is; who will stop a 16 year old registered NRM member from voting if they registered with the EC ?
translation.lug: Wabula ekibuuzo ekinene kiri nti; ani anaatangira mmemba wa NRM ow'emyaka 16 okulonda singa baba nga beewandiisa ne EC?

translation.en: Statistics show that Uganda's population has been growing at the rate of 3.2 per annum since 2003.
translation.lug: Ebibalo biraga nti obungi bwa bannayuganda bubadde bukulira ku bitundu 3.2 buli mwaka okuva mu 2003.

translation.en: Godber Tumushabe, ED of ACODE, a local think-tank on public policy analysis, is skeptical about the NRM claim of 9 million members.
translation.lug: Godbler Tumushabe, ED wa ACODE, omutunuulizi w'embeera z'abantu, abuusabuusa NRM okugamba nti erina bammemba obukadde 9.

translation.en: It was not proper for the National Resistance Movement to register before the national Electoral Commission exercise.
translation.lug: Tekyali kituufu National Resistance Movement okuwandiisa nga Electoral Commission tennatandika mulimu.

translation.en: He says political parties should focus on the EC national voter register for it is easy to verify and it's more credible than any party's register.
translation.lug: Agamba nti ebibiina byobufuzi birina kussa essira ku lukalala lw'abalonzi olwa EC kuba lwangu okukakasa era nti lutuufu nnyo okusinga olukalala lw'ekibiina kyonna.

translation.en: In 2011 Electoral Commission registers 15m voters, NRM enrolls 9m; do the figures lie?
translation.lug: Mu 2011 Electoral Commission yawandiisa abalonzi obukadde 15, NRM yawandiika obukadde 9; Ennamba zirimba?

translation.en: The Police regrets the incidents and thanks all the people who participated in the evacuation and management of the victims.
translation.lug: Poliisi enakuwala olw'ebyatukawo era ne yeebaza abantu bonna abeenyigidde mu kusengula n'okukwasaganya abaakoseddwa.

translation.en: We therefore, call upon all members of the public to be aware of this threat join the Police and other agencies to fight and prevent its occurrence.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo tukubira omulanga abantu b'ekitundu bonna okuba obulindaala eri ekizibu kino, mwegatte ku poliisi n'ebitongole ebirala okukirwanyisa n'okukitangira okutuukawo.

translation.en: We strongly urge organizers of public events such as parties, concerts, open air public prayers, sports and others should involve the police.
translation.lug: Tusabira ddala abateesiteese b'emikolo egibaako abantu abangi ng'obubaga, ebivvulu, okusaba okuli mu byereeerezi, ebyemizannyo n'abalala balina okwetabyamu poliisi.

translation.en: We hereby give notice to the proprietors of the following, that teams of Police will visit their premises to ensure availability of adequate security.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo tutegeeza ba nannyini bino nti, poliisi ejja kutuuka mu bifo bino okusobola okulaba nti waliwo obukuumi obumala.

translation.en: We call upon every member of the public with any information of security nature to call the following toll free lines;
translation.lug: Tukoowoola omuntu yenna alina obubaka bwonna obwebyokwerinda okukuba ku nnamba zino ezitali za kusasulira.

translation.en: At their weekly press conference, the EC chairperson Eng Kiggundu told the public that they hadn't lent their registration kits to the NRM as alleged.
translation.lug: Ku lukungaana lwa banamawulire olwa wiiki eno, ssentebe wa EC yinginiya Kiggundu yagambye abantu nti tebaapangisa ba NRM byambalo byabwe mwe bawandiisiza abantu nga bwe kirumizibwa.

translation.en: The NRM has been registering its voters using registration kits that resemble the ones of the EC in the recent national voter registration exercise.
translation.lug: NRM ebadde ewandiisa abalonzi baayo ng'ekozesa kiiti z'okuwandiisa ezifaanaana eza EC mu kuwandiisa abalonzi okubaddewo gye buvuddeko.

translation.en: There have been allegations in some media outlets that EC lent out its equipment to certain political parties to enable them register supporters.
translation.lug: Wabaddewo ebibadde byogerebwa ku mikutu gy'amawulire egimu nti EC yapangisa ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebimu ebintu byayo by'ekozesa mu kuwandiisa abantu okubisobozesa okuwandiika abalonzi.

translation.en: "The commission categorically denies this allegation",Eng. Kiggundu said.
translation.lug: Akakiiko keeganira ddala ebyogerebwa bino, yinginiya Kiggundu yagamba.

translation.en: Kiggundu said that they concluded the update of the national voters' register on June 18, 2010 and retrieved all the equipment from the field.
translation.lug: Kiggundu yagambye nti baamaliriza okuzza obuggya enkalala z'abalonzi nga 18 ogwomunaana, 2010 era ne baggya ebikozesebwa byonna mu bantu.

translation.en: He said the equipment would be packed and sent to the Ministry of Internal Affairs after completion of data transfer.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ebikozesebwa bya kutegekebwa ne bisindikibwa ku minisitule y'ensonga z'omunda oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza okusindika obubaka.

translation.en: According to Kiggundu, by July 13, the EC had uploaded 4,670,585 voters, which constitute 97% of the voters they registered in the last registration.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Kiggundu nga 13 Ogwomusanvu, EC yali etaddeyo abalonzi 4,670,585, abaali baweza ebitundu 97% eby'abalonzi be baawandiisa mu kuwandiika okwasembayo.

translation.en: According to Kiggundu, of the 4,670,585 voters, 4290,634 were registered as new, 326,609 as transferring, and 53,342 whose photos were missing.
translation.lug: Okusinzira ku Kiggundu, ku balonzi 4,670,585, 4,290,634 be baawandisibwa nga bapya, 326,609 nga bakyusa, ne 53,342 nga baali tebalinaako bifaananyi.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission expects to start displaying the national voter register on August 11 and end it on August 30.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kasuubira okutandika okutimba enkalala z'abalonzi nga 11 Ogwomunaana era kufundikirwe nga 30 Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: This means the EC has most of its equipment lying idle when they could earn money needed to boost their election budget if they rented them out.
translation.lug: Kino kitegeeza nti ebikozesebwa bya EC ebisinga tebirina kye bikola era bandifunyeemu ssente okwongera ku mbalirira yaabwe singa babipangisa.

translation.en: However, the Electoral Commission spokesman Paul Bukenya said the constitution does not allow them to do income generating business.
translation.lug: Wabula, omwogezi w'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda Paul Bukenya yagamba nti ssemateeka tabakkiriza kukola mulimu guvaamu nsimbi.

translation.en: Considering that government has consistently failed to meet the commission's budget, the EC could explore ways of generating its own income.
translation.lug: Okusinziira nti gavumenti ezze eremererwa okutuukiriza embalirira y'akakiiko, EC yandinoonyezza engeri gy'efunamu ssente ezaayo.

translation.en: Last week, the Electoral Commission had to defend itself why it cannot give every opposition party a copy of the national voters' register.
translation.lug: Wiiiki ewedde, akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kaalina okwewozaako lwaki tekasobola kuwa buli kibiina kivuganya kkopi y'olukalala lw'abalonzi.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission said it would be too expensive.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kaagamba nti kyandibadde kya buseere nnyo.

translation.en: If the EC had other sources of revenue other than relying on remittances from the national treasury, it would reduce on such financial constraints.
translation.lug: Singa akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kaalina we kasobola okuggya ensimbi okusinga okwesigama ku ssente entono okuva mu ggwanika ly'eggwanga, kyandikendeezezza ku buzibu bw'ensimbi nga buno.

translation.en: However, upon growing pressure from the opposition who accused the EC of incompetence, it revised its stand.
translation.lug: Wabula, okusinziira ku maanyi agava mu bavuganya abaanenyezza EC olw'obutaba na busobozi, keetegerezza enkola yaako.

translation.en: It promised to give the voter registers to the political parties.
translation.lug: Kaasubiza okuwa enkalala z'abalonzi eri ebibiina byobufuzi.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission management have added that they are in talks with government for additional money for this purpose.
translation.lug: Abaddukanya akakiiko k'ebyokulonda baagasseeko nti bali mu njogerezeganya ne gavumenti okufuna ssente ez'ennyongereza ku nsonga eno.

translation.en: Electoral Commission denies lending its equipment to National Resistance Movement during the independent July 23 - 29, 2010 election.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda keegaana okupangisa National Resistance Movement ebintu byako mu kulonda okwetengeredde okwa nga 23-29, 2010.

translation.en: The "fresh-election-call" was made in a statement issued by Uganda Patriotic Movement Secretary General Bidandi Ssali in Kampala yesterday.
translation.lug: Omulanga gw'okuddamu okulonda, gwakoleddwa mu sitatimenti eyafulumiziddwa Uganda Patriotic Movement Secretary General Bidandi Ssali mu Kampla eggulo.

translation.en: The UPM wishes to reiterate to the world and particularly Ugandans that the forthcoming elections will be held under certain conditions.
translation.lug: UPM esuubira okuddira ensi naddala bannayuganda nti okulonda okujja kujja kukolebwa wansi w'obukwakkulizo obumu.

translation.en: These conditions have already rendered the elections unfair and unfree.
translation.lug: Obukwakkulizo buno bumaze okufuula okulonda obutaba kwa mazima na bwenkanya.

translation.en: Right from the beginning, it was clear that the Chairman of the Military Commission had motives other than organizing a free and fair election.
translation.lug: Okuviira ddala mu ntandikwa, kyali kirabikirawo nti ssentebe w'akakiiko k'amagye yalina ebigendererwa okusinga okutegeka okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: For instance the constituency where our President Yoweri Museveni`s contesting has been unlawfully altered at least three times.
translation.lug: Okugeza mu konsitituwensi Pulezidenti waffe Yoweri Museveni gye yavuganya ebadde ekyusiddwa mu bukyamu ekitono ennyo emirundi esatu.

translation.en: This includes last week and all in a vain attempt to minimize his support.
translation.lug: Kino kitwaliramu ne wiiki ewedde era mu ngeri y'emu egezaako okukendeeza obuwagizi bwe.

translation.en: In all cases those who were denied registration were known opponents of UPC .
translation.lug: Mu ngeri zonna abo bonna abaagaaniddwa okuwandiisibwa baali bantu abamanyiddwa nga ba UPC.

translation.en: The imported foreigners registered were in all cases brought by UPC.
translation.lug: Abagwira abaaleeteddwa ne bawandiisibwa mu ngeri zonna baaleetebwa UPC.

translation.en: During the nomination exercise, sixteen Uganda Patriotic Movement candidates were disqualified.
translation.lug: Mu kusunsulwamu, abeesimbyewo kkumi na mukaaga aba Uganda Patriotic Movement baasuuliddwa ebbali.

translation.en: Other UPM candidates were denied nomination on grounds that their ability to speak English was not ascertainable.
translation.lug: Aba UPM abalala baagaaniddwa okusunsulwamu ku bigambibwa nti tebaalina busobozi bw'ogera Lungereza.

translation.en: These included a Lecturer Mr. Chango Macho and a Catholic Father Rev.Okoth.
translation.lug: Bino mwabaddemu ssaabasomesa mwami Chango Macho ne Faaza Omukatolika Lev. Okoth.

translation.en: All our petitions about nominations have been ignored by the Electoral Commission, for example, by the men of "integrity".
translation.lug: Okwemulugunya kwaffe kwonna ku kusunsulwamu kugaaniddwa akakiiko k'ebyokulonda, okugeza abasajja abeesimbu.

translation.en: Up to now, fifteen District Commissioners have been retired arbitrarily by the Chairman of the Military Commission.
translation.lug: Okutuuka kati, bakamisona ba disitulikiti kkumi na bataano baawummuziddwa ssentebe w'akakiiko k'amagye mu ngeri etategeerekeka.

translation.en: These District Commissioners were also the Returning Officers.
translation.lug: Bakamisona ba disitulikiti bano era be baali bakulira okulonda mu bitundu.

translation.en: The 15th was fired only two days ago apparently because when Obote went to Rukungiri there was no one to address people.
translation.lug: Ow'ekkumi n'abatano yagobebwa ennaku bbiri emabega kubanga Obote bwe yagenda e Rukungiri tewaaliwo muntu yenna kwogerako eri abantu.

translation.en: But why did the South African police arrest you?
translation.lug: Naye lwaki poliisi ya South Africa yakukwata?

translation.en: I fell out with Kabila and returned to Rwanda.
translation.lug: Nayawukana ne Kabila ne nzirayo e Rwanda.

translation.en: Kayumba is my friend and he knows that I cannot do something like that to him.
translation.lug: Kayumba mukwano gwange era akimanyi nti sisobola kumukola kintu bwe kityo.

translation.en: Do you still work for Rwandan intelligence?
translation.lug: Okyakolera ekitongole kya Rwanda ekikessi?

translation.en: I used to be a soldier in the Ugandan army, later, Rwandan army and finally in the Congolese army.
translation.lug: Nali mujaasi mu ggye lya Uganda, ne mmala ne ngenda mu ggye ly'e Rwanda ne nsembayo mu eggye lya Congo.

translation.en: In Congo, I was the Commanding Officer of the Presidential Guard of Laurent Kabila.
translation.lug: Mu Congo nali mudduumizi w'eggye erikuuma Pulezidenti erya Loteenanti Kabila.

translation.en: He spoke to the Independent's Andrew Mwenda on Kayumba`s shooting; "Karegyeya engineered my detention".
translation.lug: Yayogerako ne munnamawulire wa Independent Andrew Mwenda ku kukubibwa kwa Kayumba amasasi nti Karegyeya ye yakulemberamu okumukuumira mu kkomera.

translation.en: He is influential in the government of South Africa and sits on the National Executive Committee of the ruling Africa National Congress.
translation.lug: Wa maanyi mu gavumenti ya South Africa era atuula ki kakiiko akafuzi ak'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Congress.

translation.en: Kayumba was also visited by the South African chief of police and the head of South Africa's military intelligence.
translation.lug: Kayumba yakyalirwa ssaabapoliisi wa South Africa n'akulira obukessi mu magye.

translation.en: It is said that all these powerful Africa National Congress and government officials were there due to Masetera's influence.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti abakungu ba Africa National Congress bano bonna b'amaanyi baaliwo olw'amaanyi ga Masetera.

translation.en: The involvement of powerful personalities from the South African government has caused some rifts in the relationship between the two countries.
translation.lug: Okwenyigiramu kw'abantu ab'amaanyi okuva mu gavumenti ya South Africa kuleeseewo obutakkaanya mu nkolagana wakati w'amawanga abiri.

translation.en: Some Rwandan insiders claim it has also biased the investigation into the Kayumba attempted assassination.
translation.lug: Abanyalwanda abamu ab'omunda era bagamba nti kigootaanyizza okunoonyereza ku kugezaako okukuba Kayumba amasasi.

translation.en: A Rwandan source, told the Independent that Karegyeya was the one giving South African police tips on whom to arrest.
translation.lug: Ensonda okuva mu Rwanda, yategeezezza Independent nti Karegeya ye yali awa poliisi ya South Africa obubaka ku ani abeera akwatibwa.

translation.en: Gakwerera also claims he was arrested on the advice of Karegyeya.
translation.lug: Gakwerera naye agamba nti yakwatibwa ku magezi ga Karegyeya.

translation.en: Further, Rwandan officials have openly accused the South African police of incompetence.
translation.lug: Okwongerako, Abakungu mu Rwanda bazze malumiriza poliisi ya South Africa obutaba na busobozi.

translation.en: They claim that immediately Kayumba was shot, the first people taken to make police statements are those he had in the car.
translation.lug: Bagamba nti amangu ddala nga Kayumba akubiddwa amasasi, abantu abaasooka okutwalibwa okukola sitatimenti ku poliisi be bo be yali nabo mu mmotoka.

translation.en: However, a South African diplomat worsened things when he mentioned in an interview that the Rwandan government was behind the shooting.
translation.lug: Wabula, omukungu okuva e South Africa yasajjula ebintu bwe yayogerera mu yintaaviyu nti gavumenti ya Rwanda ye yali mabega w'okukuba amasasi gano.

translation.en: The Kayumba case seems to be setting the relationship between the two nations into a dangerous balance.
translation.lug: Omusango gwa Kayumba gulabise okuteeka enkolagana wakati w'amawanga abiri mu lusuubo olw'obulabe.

translation.en: But there is more; the Rwandan government had applied for the deportation of Kayumba on charges of terrorism.
translation.lug: Naye waliwo ekisingawo, gavumenti y'e Rwanda yali esabye okukomyawo Kayumba olw'emisango gy'obuyeekera.

translation.en: On April 6, Spain submitted its own application to deport Kayumba on charges of crimes against humanity.
translation.lug: Nga 6 Ogwokuna, Spain yawaayo okusaba kwayo okuzza Kayumba olw'emisango gy'okutyoboola eddembe ly'obuntu.

translation.en: Two days later, France also applied for the same.
translation.lug: Nga waakayitawo ennaku bbiri Bufalansa nayo yasaba ky'ekimu.

translation.en: Kayumba could afford to rubbish Rwanda's claims against him because it is a poor country whose accusations can easily be disregarded.
translation.lug: Kayumba yali asobola okugamba nti Rwanda by'emulumiriza nti tebiriimu nsa kubanga ggwanga lyavu nga bye lyogera bisobola okugaanibwa amangu.

translation.en: However, France and Spain are powerful nations considered to be mature democracies and reasonable in their actions.
translation.lug: Wabula, Bufalansa ne Spain nsi zikirimaanyi ezitwalibwa okuba ne demokolasiya ow'amaanyi n'ebikolwa eby'amaanyi.

translation.en: So,their applications could carry more weight with South Africa.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo, okusaba kwazo kwali kuzito ne South Africa.

translation.en: What is clear, however, is that by the time he was shot, Kayumba had begun to reassess his options.
translation.lug: Wabula ekyo ekirabibwako, kirinti mu biseera we yakubibwa amasasi, Kayumba yali atandise okukola okusalawo kwe.

translation.en: Deportation applications from Spain and France showed that Kayumba and Kagame shared a stronger common threat.
translation.lug: Bufalansa ne Spain okusaba okumuzza, kyalaga nti Kayumba ne Kagame baalina beerinako okutya okw'amaanyi.

translation.en: This common threat was stronger than the issues that separate them.
translation.lug: Okutya kuno kwali kwa maanyi nnyo okusinga ekibaawula.

translation.en: So, he began making contact with Kigali.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo yatandika okukwatagana ne Kigali.

translation.en: Kayumba is a close personal friend to Maj.Gen.Steven Kashaka, currently Uganda's military ambassador to South Africa.
translation.lug: Kayumba mukwano nnyo gwa Maj. Gen. Steven Kashaka nga mu kiseera kino ye mubaka w'amagye ga Uganda mu South Africa.

translation.en: According to Francis Gakwerera, this thing was engineered by Patrick Karegyeya, the former director of Rwanda's External Security.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Francis Gakwerera, kino kyayongerwamu amaanyi Patrick Karegyeya, eyali akulembera ebyokwerinda bya Rwanda eby'ebweru.

translation.en: Whenever I travel through South Africa, I meet and talk with Karegyeya because he is also my friend.
translation.lug: Buli lwe ntambula mu South Africa, nsisinkana era ne njogerako ne Karegyeya kubanga naye mukwano gwange.

translation.en: He sometimes picks me from the airport whenever I get into South Africa.
translation.lug: Ebiseera embimu ankima ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi buli lwe ntuuka mu South Africa.

translation.en: On this occasion, I got into South Africa on Wednesday and called him on Friday, the day before Kayumba was shot.
translation.lug: Ku mulundi guno, Natuuka mu South Africa ku lwokusatu ne mmukubira ku lwokutaano, olunaku lumu nga tannakubwa masasi.

translation.en: On Saturday, I had a lunch appointment with Karegyeya which he cancelled saying he was going to watch soccer.
translation.lug: Ku lwomukaga, nalina enteekateeka y'okulya ekyemisana ne Karegyeya naye n'agisazaamu ng'agamba nti yali agenda kulaba mupiira.

translation.en: He later called me saying Kayumba had been shot.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma n'ankubira ng'agamba nti Kayumba yali akubiddwa esasi n'afa.

translation.en: I called him thirty minutes later to ask about Kayumba`s state but he said he was busy and promised to call back.
translation.lug: Namukubira oluvannyuma lw'eddakiika asatu okumubuuza ku mbeera Kayumba gye yalimu naye n'agamba nti yali alina by'akolako n'asuubiza okuddamu okunkubira.

translation.en: I was at the home of Albert Gatare, a brother of the late Miko.
translation.lug: Nali mu maka ga Albert Gatare muganda w'omugenzi Miko omulenzi.

translation.en: He told me that Kayumba was in Riverside Hospital.
translation.lug: Yangamba nti Kayumba yali mu ddwaliro ly'e Riverside.

translation.en: It is at that moment that the police called me and said they wanted me.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera ekyo poliisi yankubira n'engamba nti yali eneetaaga.

translation.en: Nine police men then came in heavily armed.
translation.lug: Abasajja aba poliisi mwenda oluvannyuma bajja nga balina ebyokulwanyisa bingi.

translation.en: There were many policemen with police dogs.
translation.lug: Waaliwo abapoliisi bangi nga balina embwa za poliisi.

translation.en: Then on Sunday night, almost 30 hours later, they brought other suspects including Richard who turned out to be Kayumba's driver.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma ku Sande ekiro, nga waakayita kumpi essaawa amakumi asatu, baaleeta abateeberezebwa abalala omwali ne Richard eyalinga ddereeva wa Kayumba.

translation.en: The other suspects included two Rwandans, a Kenyan and a Tanzanian.
translation.lug: Abateeberezebwa abalala mwalimu Abanyalwanda babiri, Omunakenya n'Omutanzaniya.

translation.en: They asked me if I knew any of the suspects and I knew the two Rwandans.
translation.lug: Baambuuza oba nali manyi omu ku bateeberezebwa nga mmanyi Abanyalwanda ababiri.

translation.en: He told me that he was actually involved in the shooting of Kayumba.
translation.lug: Yangamba nti yali yeenyigira mu kukuba Kayumba amasasi.

translation.en: He said someone called him on telephone saying his name was Dr. Ndahiro.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti waliwo eyamukubira essimu ng'agamba ye dokita Ndahiro.

translation.en: He promised to give him two thousand United States dollars if he helped them kill Kayumba that is an enemy of Rwanda.
translation.lug: Yasuubiza okumuwa ddoola z'Amerika enkumi bbiri singa abayambako okutta Kayumba eyali omulabe wa Rwanda.

translation.en: He said that Dr. Ndahiro promised that the driver would be rewarded by President Paul Kagame if he cooperated.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti dokita Ndahiro yasuubiza nti ddereeva yandisiimiddwa Pulezidenti Paul Kagame singa yali akolaganye nabo.

translation.en: The driver also said that the shooting was the second attempt on Kayumba's life.
translation.lug: Ddereeva naye yagambye nti okukuba amasasi lwe lwali olulumba olwokubiri ku bulamu bwa Kayumba.

translation.en: Kayumba was sleeping in his bed with his wife.
translation.lug: Kayumba yali yeebase mu buliri ne mukyala we.

translation.en: Three days later, he tipped them off when Kayumba and wife were going to the shopping mall.
translation.lug: Ennaku ssatu oluvannyuma, yabatwalako Kayumba ne mukyalawe bwe baali bagenda ku ssemaduuka.

translation.en: First, I understood him to be referring to Dr.Emmanuel Ndahiro, the head of the National Security Services.
translation.lug: Okusooka, namutegeera ng'ajuliza ku dokita Emmanuel Ndahiro, akulira National Security Services.

translation.en: So, I asked him if he knew this Ndahiro and he said no.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo, namubuuza oba nga yali amanyi Ndahiro ono, n'agamba nti nedda.

translation.en: So I asked him why he believed that it was Dr. Ndahiro.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo namubuuza lwaki yali asuubira nti ye yali dokita Ndahiro.

translation.en: I was commanding officer of the presidential guard of rebel leader and later President Laurent Kabila.
translation.lug: Nze nali omuduumizi w'eggye erikuuma Pulezidenti w'abayeekera n'oluvannyuma eyafuuka Loteenanti Kabila.

translation.en: So I know, the story of Kayumba's shooting is all deceptive.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo nkimanyi nti emboozi y'okukuba Kayumba amasasi yonna enyumizibwa bunyumizibwa.

translation.en: Then the killer went over to the side of Kayumba and they had a physical fight.
translation.lug: Awo omutemu n'agenda eri Kayumba ne batandika okulwana.

translation.en: We were then transferred to John Foster Prison on Monday.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma ku Mmande twatwalibwa mu kkomera lya John Foster.

translation.en: Kayumba's driver recorded his statement in my presence and he repeated to the police what he had told me in jail.
translation.lug: Ddereeva wa Kayumba yakola siteetimenti ye nga wendi era n'addamu okugamba poliisi bye yali ang'ambye mu kkomera.

translation.en: These people were not victimized in any way after the overthrow of Amin.
translation.lug: Abantu bano tebaavunaanibwa oluvannyuma lw'okuggyako Amin.

translation.en: But there was evidence against them that they aided Amin in Killing Uganda People's Congress members.
translation.lug: Naye waaliwo obujulizi obubalumiriza nti baayambako Amin mu kutta bammemba ba Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: Let Kahigiriza come here and contradict my words, if what I say is not correct.
translation.lug: Leka Kahigiriza ajje wano awakanye ebigambo byange, bwe mba nga bye njogera si bituufu.

translation.en: While addressing another rally in Buzabo's constituency, Muwanga warned saying;
translation.lug: Bwe yabadde ng'ayogera mu lukungaana olulala mu konsitituwensi ya Buzabo, Muwanga yalabudde ng'agamba;

translation.en: "Take the message to Buzabo and all the Democratic Party supporters that they must stop the dirty politics immediately".
translation.lug: Twala obubaka eri Buzabo n'abawagizi ba Democratic Party nti bateekeddwa okukomya ebyobufuzi byabwe eby'emivuyo mu bunnambiro.

translation.en: The liberty which was brought by the Uganda People's Congress cost people's lives some died in Lake Victoria, others between Mutukula and Arua.
translation.lug: Eddembe eryaleetebwa Uganda people's congress lyaviirako abantu bangi okufiirwa obulamu bwabwe abamu baafiira mu nnyanja Nalubaale abalala wakati wa Mutukula ne Arua.

translation.en: They sacrificed their lives for the freedom of everyone in Uganda.
translation.lug: Baasaddaaka obulamu bwabwe ku lw'eddembe lya buli omu ali mu Uganda.

translation.en: Muwanga warned that, members of different parties should not claim to have an upper hand on others by molesting them.
translation.lug: Muwanga yalabude nti bammemba b'ebibiina eby'enjawulo tebateekeddwa kukaayana kubaamu na mukono ogwawaggulu nga banyiiza abalala.

translation.en: Muwanga talked to the Uganda people's Congress in Mbirizi, Masaka South-West constituency.
translation.lug: Muwanga yayogeddeko eri Uganda People's Congress e Mbirizi mu konsitituwensi ya Masaka South-West.

translation.en: The 65 year old chairman who effectively participated in last years' liberation war which toppled Amin said:
translation.lug: Ssentebe w'emyaka 65 omwaka oguwedde eyeenyigira obutereevu mu lutalo lw'ameenunula olw'aggyako Amin yagambye;

translation.en: "You the youth of Uganda People's Congress will spearhead the reconstruction and development task".
translation.lug: Mwe abavubuka ba Uganda People's Congress mujja kukulemberamu omulimu gw'okuzzaawo awamu n'okulaakulanya.

translation.en: "The first thing the Uganda People's Congress will do as soon as it comes to power will be to engage the youth in productive work.
translation.lug: Ekintu ekisooka Uganda People's Congress ky'ejja okusookera ddala okukola ng'ezze mu buyinza kujja kuba kunyigira bavubuka mu mirimu egizimba.

translation.en: Uganda People's Congress youths will spearhead this so as to set an example to the rest.
translation.lug: Abavubuka ba Uganda People's Congress bajja kukulemberamu kino okusobola okuteekawo ekyokulabirako eri abalala.

translation.en: Muwanga also appealed to Ugandans to strive hard and establish mutual respect for each other.
translation.lug: Muwanga era yasaba bannayuganda okufuba ennyo okwewangana ekitiibwa.

translation.en: At Bwezibwera, the chairman pledged, never again shall the Uganda People's Congress allow Uganda to be humiliated as it was in the Amin's days.
translation.lug: E Bwezibwera, ssentebe yeeyamye, aba Uganda People's Congress tebajja kuddamu kukkiriza Uganda okuddamu okujoogebwa nga bwe kyali mu biseera bya Amin.

translation.en: Never shall Uganda be characterized with the life of scarcities of essential commodities.
translation.lug: Uganda teribeera mu mbeera ya bbulwa ly'ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo.

translation.en: Uganda People's Congress needs determined characters who would stand with this nation even in difficult times.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress yeetaaga abantu abamalirivu abanaayimirira nayo ne mu biseera ebizibu.

translation.en: Commenting on the Democratic Party led by Paulo Kawanga Semogerere, he said it was characterized by contradictions.
translation.lug: Okwogera ku Democratic Party ekulirwa Paulo Kawanga Semogerere, yagambye nti kwalimu okukontana.

translation.en: He commended Semogerere for his ability to lead a party which was almost torn apart by contradictions.
translation.lug: Yasembye Semogerere ku lw'obusobozi bwe okukulembera ekibiina ekyali kumpi kitaaguddwataaguddwa okwetema engalize.

translation.en: The Democratic Party, serious contender with the Uganda People's Congress in the polls, had given away more that 10 parliamentary seats.
translation.lug: Democratic party eyali evuganya ennyo ne Uganda People's Congress mu kalulu, yali eviiriddwako ebifo bya paalamenti ebisukka 10.

translation.en: I tend to think that Semogerere is only unfortunate to lead such men.
translation.lug: Ngenda ne ndowooza nti Semogerere talina bubeezi mukisa ku kulembera bantu ng'abo.

translation.en: Otherwise, how can we have the 1980 parliamentary candidates who cannot fill in the forms and present them in time?
translation.lug: Mu ngeri endala, tusobola tutya okuba n'abavuganya ku bubaka bwa paalamenti mu 1980 nga tebasobola kujjuza mpapula ne baziwaayo mu budde.

translation.en: Nakasi's story is heartbreaking.
translation.lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi emenya omutima.

translation.en: This series is compiled and reproduced by John Njoroge.
translation.lug: Obutundutundu buno bwakungaanyiziddwa era ne buddamu okufulumizibwa John Njoroge.

translation.en: According to the independent issued on Jul 30- August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumire reported that;
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 30 Ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga 05 Ogwomunaana 2010, Rosebell Kagumire yagamba nti;

translation.en: A young woman who was returning home outside the countryside town of Soroti was raped.
translation.lug: Omuwala eyabadde adda ewaka wabweru w'ekibuga kya Soroti yasobezeddwako.

translation.en: The 28 year old Grace Nakasi was a victim of an insurgency in eastern Uganda.
translation.lug: Grace Nakasi ow'emyaka 28 yakosebwa akatabanguko mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda.

translation.en: She was pulled off the road to the bush and gang-raped by the men in uniform.
translation.lug: Yasikiddwa okuva ku kkubo n'atwalibwa mu nsiko n'asobezebwako ekibinja ky'abasajja abaali mu yunifomu.

translation.en: I was living in Soroti town.
translation.lug: Nali mbeera mu kibuga ky'e Soroti.

translation.en: I met nine soldiers on patrol at about 7:00 pm.
translation.lug: Nasisinkanye abajaasi mwenda ku paatulo ku ssaawa nga 7:00 ez'ekawungeezi.

translation.en: Nakasi begins her story by narrating how they all raped her and abandoned by the roadside.
translation.lug: Nakasi atandika emboozi ye ng'attottola engeri bonna gye baamusobyako ne bamuleka ku mabbali g'ekkubo.

translation.en: This was 1987, a year after President Yoweri Museveni had captured the reigns of state power.
translation.lug: Guno gwali mwaka gwa 1987, nga Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni awambye obuyinza bw'eggwanga.

translation.en: He announced "a fundamental change", not a mere change of guard.
translation.lug: Yalangirira enkyukakyuka ey'omuggundu so si kukyusa bukyusa bakuumi.

translation.en: The heinous incident marked the dawn of repeated sexual violence against Nakasi and many other women in conflict areas.
translation.lug: Akaseera k'entiisa kano ke kaali entandikwa y'okusobya ku Nakasi entakera n'abakyala abalala abaali mu bitundu ebirimu obutabanguko.

translation.en: "I decided to go to the bus park to take a bus to visit my home," Nakasi narrates with suppressed sadness.
translation.lug: Nasazeewo okugenda mu paaka ya bbaasi nninnye bbaasi ngende ewange, Nakasi anyumya nga munakuwavu.

translation.en: It was on the way to the bus park that Nakasi became a victim of the second rape.
translation.lug: Nakasi  asobezebweko omulundi ogwokubiri ku lugendo lwe okutuuka ku paaka ya bbaasi .

translation.en: Nakasi narrated, "I met four National Resistance Army soldiers, two of them dragged me off the road and forced themselves on me".
translation.lug: Nakasi ya ttotodde, "nasisinkanye abajaasi ba National Resistance Movement bana, babiri ku bo ne bansika okuva ku luguudo ne banneekakaatikako."

translation.en: Nakasi a mother of 12 children, a resident of Soroti, was raped 16 times, infected with HIV.
translation.lug: Nakasi maama ow'abaana 12, mutuuze w'e Soroti, yasobezebwako emirundi 16, n'asiigibwa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.

translation.en: She was later thrown out of her marital home by the enraged husband.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma yagobebwa baawe omunyiivu mu maka ge ag'empeta.

translation.en: It's a touching narrative and a wider reflection of the tribulations women face in Africa's conflict-torn regions.
translation.lug: Yabadde mboozi ekwata ku muntu nga yeefumiitiriza ku kaseera akazibu abakazi ke basanga mu bifo bya Afirika ebirimu obutabanguko.

translation.en: She is one of the faces of Ugandan women that carry the burden of sexual violence.
translation.lug: Y'omu ku bakyala abannayuganda abasanga ekizibu ky'okukabassanyizibwa.

translation.en: For the past decade Uganda has been applauded on the world stage as a successful story in the fight against Human immunodeficiency Virus.
translation.lug: Mu kyasa ekiyise, Uganda ebadde etenderezebwa ku mutendera gw'ensi yonna ng'erina emboozi ey'obuwanguzi mu kulwanyisa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.

translation.en: Women trapped between government soldiers and the LRA rebels have borne the brunt of the HIV.
translation.lug: Abakyala abakwatibwa wakati w'abajaasi ba gavumenti n'abayeekera ba LRA be bali ennyo mu buzibu bw'okukwatibwa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.

translation.en: This is more than any other women in the rest of the country.
translation.lug: Kino kisinga omukyala omulala yenna mu ggwanga lyonna.

translation.en: The prevalent sexual violence by both the LRA and government soldiers has left behind a traumatized and stressed generation of women.
translation.lug: Okukabassanya okugenda mu maaso okwa LRA n'abajaasi ba gavumenti kulese omujiji gw'abakyala nga bali mu kikangabwa n'obweraliikirivu.

translation.en: In 1990, Nakasi was again gang-raped by men whom she believes were government soldiers.
translation.lug: Mu 1990, Nakasi era yaddamu okusobezebwako b'akkiriza nti baali bajaasi ba gavumenti.

translation.en: She was admitted to Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital in Kampala for several months after the rape incident.
translation.lug: Yaweebwa ekitanda ku Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital mu kampala okumala emyezi egiwera oluvannyuma lw'okukabassanyizibwa.

translation.en: In 2002, Nakasi took an HIV test.
translation.lug: Mu 2002, Nakasi yeekebeza akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.

translation.en: But the day I told him I had tested HIV positive, he threw me out of the house, Nakasi narrates in a tone of courage that has defied many odds.
translation.lug: Naye olunaku lwe namugamba nti nazuuliddwamu akawuka akaleeta mukenenya, yanfulumya mu nnyumba, Nakasi attottola mu ddoboozi ery'obuvumu ekyewuunyisa abantu bangi.

translation.en: Nakasi was excommunicated from the community.
translation.lug: Nakasi yasosolebwa mu kitundu.

translation.en: A ray of hope emerged in 2007.
translation.lug: Oluwenda lw'essuubi lwaliwo mu 2007.

translation.en: Nakasi was rescued by World Vision International which paid for her operation to remove her uterus which helps eliminate the fistula condition.
translation.lug: Nakasi yanunulibwa aba World Vision International abaasasulira okulongosebwa kwe okuggyibwamu nabaana ekyamuyamba okuwona embeera y'ekikulukuto.

translation.en: After the treatment, she and other women, who are victims of sexual violence, started a support group called Teso Peace Women's Activists.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'obujjanjabi, ye n'abakyala abalala abaakosebwa okukabassanyizibwa, baatandikawo ekibiina ekiyambi ekiyitibwa Teso Peace Women's Activists.

translation.en: According to the Independent issue of July 30-August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumi wrote about women and girls who are abandoned after rape.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 30 Ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga 05 Ogwomunaana 2010, Rosebell Kagumi yawandiika ku bakazi n'abawala abasuulibwawo oluvannyuma lw'okukabassanyizibwa.

translation.en: Nakasi said the young girl's parents died in the war and now at nine no one wants to take care of her yet has six orphans under her care.
translation.lug: Nakasi yagambye, bazadde b'omuwala omuto baafiira mu lutalo era kati ku myaka mwenda tewali n'omu ayagala kumulabirira kyokka ng'alina bamulekwa mukaaga b'alabirira.

translation.en: Nakasi's story is not unique in Uganda's war-ravaged communities.
translation.lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi si mpya mu bitundu bya Uganda ebyakosebwa olutalo.

translation.en: She told the Independent that about 40 women within just one sub-county of Tubur in Soroti where she works suffer from vaginal fistula.
translation.lug: Yagambye Independent nti abakyala abakunukkiriza 40 mu ggombolola emu yokka eya Tubur mu Soroti gy'akolera balwadde ba kikulukuto.

translation.en: This is due to rape.
translation.lug: Kino kiva ku kukabassanyizibwa.

translation.en: Nakasi and other HIV- positive women regularly walk many miles from Tubur to get life pronging drugs.
translation.lug: Nakasi n'abakazi abalala abalina akawuka akaleeta mukenenya batambula mmayiro nyingi okuva e Tubur okufuna eddagala eribeezaawo obulamu.

translation.en: Nakasi has managed to get funds from Women's International Cross-Cultural Exchange and Urgent Action Fund Africa.
translation.lug: Nakasi asobodde okufuna obuyambi okuva mu Women's International Cross Cultural Exchange and Urgent Action Fund Africa.

translation.en: These funds help orphans and provide medicines to people living with HIV in her village.
translation.lug: Obuyambi buno buyamba bamulekwa n'okuwa abantu eddagala abayina akawuka akaleeta mukenenya mu kyalo kye .

translation.en: It became clear that the new government was there to stay after the late 1990's.
translation.lug: Kyategeerekeka nti gavumenti empya yali ya kubeerawo oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gya lukumi mu lwenda kyenda egyasembayo.

translation.en: Until then, the Rwandan Patriotic Front had managed to run the country through sheer ingenuity.
translation.lug: Okutuuka olwo, Rwanda Patriotic Front yali esobodde okuddukanya eggwanga ng'eyita mu kugonjoola ebizibu eby'amaanyi.

translation.en: A small and poor country grappling with problems of the magnitude Rwanda has faced in recently;
translation.lug: Ensi entono era enjavu zirwanagana n'ebizibu eby'enjawulo Rwanda by'eyiseemu gye buvuddeko.

translation.en: And still faces today cannot be considered normal.
translation.lug: Era n'okutuusa kati ffeesi tezisobola kutegeerekeka.

translation.en: Most people who visit Rwanda marvel at how clean and orderly Kigali is compared to cities elsewhere in the region and beyond.
translation.lug: Abantu abasinga abagenda e Rwanda beewuunya engeri ekibuga Kigali gye kiri ekiyonjo n'engeri gye kyateekebwateekebwamu.

translation.en: Remembering his childhood in clean and orderly Entebbe;
translation.lug: Ajjukira obuto bwe mu kibuga Entebbe ekiyonjo era enteeketeeke.

translation.en: Kalyegira arguably has grounds for asserting that there is nothing impressive about the state Kigali is in.
translation.lug: Kalyegira agamba alina obukakafu nti tewali kisikiriza ku mbeera Kigali gy'erimu.

translation.en: Nonetheless, that Kigali is the only Rwandan town talked about in these terms merely reflects that many visitors do not venture beyond it.
translation.lug: Ngy'oggyeeko ekyo, Kigali kye kibuga kya Rwanda kyokka ekyogerwako mu mbeera zino, ekiraga nti abagenyi bangi tebalambula kukisukka.

translation.en: Kigali is not the only clean and orderly town in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Kigali si kye kibuga kyokka ekiyonjo era ekiteeketeeke mu Rwanda.

translation.en: He has traversed Rwanda over the last decade sometimes as a visitor, other times as a researcher.
translation.lug: Alambudde Rwanda okumala emyaka kkumi egiyise oluusi ng'omugenyi, ebiseera ebirala ng'omunoonyereza.

translation.en: My adventures have allowed me to observe different aspects of life in Rwanda at close range.
translation.lug: Okulambula kwange kunsobozesezza okulaba ebintu eby'enjawulo mu Rwanda nga mbiri kumpi.

translation.en: A perceptive visitor to any place in Rwanda cannot fail to notice evidence of the high quality of public administration the country.
translation.lug: Omugenyi omwekkaanyi mu kifo kyonna e Rwanda tayinza kulemwa kulaba mutindo ogwa waggulu ogw'okukulemberamu abantu mu ggwanga eryo.

translation.en: Also the service delivery in the country.
translation.lug: N'obuweereza obuliwo mu ggwanga.

translation.en: The regular cleaning and garbage collection seen in Kigali is, for example, evident in towns, big and small across the country.
translation.lug: Okulongoosa okwa buli lunaku n'okukung'aanya kasasiro okulabibwa mu Kigali, okugeza kirabibwako mu bibuga, ebinene n'ebitono okwetoloola eggwanga.

translation.en: The reason why all this is impressive is not because it happens only in Rwanda, or that it has never happened anywhere else.
translation.lug: Ensonga lwaki kino kisikiriza teri nti kubanga kiri Rwanda yokka, oba nti tekibangawo awantu awalala wonna.

translation.en: Rather, it is because it happens in a country which only 16 years ago was expected to dig itself deeper into chaos and violence.
translation.lug: Wabula, kiri nti lwakuba kiri mu ggwanga eryali lisuubirwa okwenyigira mu mivuyo n'obutabanguko mu myaka kkumi na mukaaga gyokka egiyise.

translation.en: Thus add a new statistic to Africa's many failed and failing states.
translation.lug: N'olw'ekyo gatta omuwendo omuggya ku nsi za Afirika ennyingi eziremereddwa n'eziremererwa.

translation.en: Only RPF cadres and RPA soldiers who had organised a war and successfully defeated a better equiped and resourced army;
translation.lug: Akabinja ka RPF n'abajaasi ba RPA bokka abaali bateeseteese olutalo ne bawangula eggye eryali teteekeddwateekeddwa obulungi era nga lirina buli kyakukozesa.

translation.en: Expected to see a functioning and effective state in less than a generation.
translation.lug: Suubira okulaba eggwanga eritambuzibwa obulungi ng'omugigi tegunnayitawo.

translation.en: Most rural folks possess medical insurance which entitles them to quality services which their counterparts in neighbouring countries.
translation.lug: Abantu b'omu byalo abasinga balina yinsuwa z'obulamu ekibayamba okufuna obuweereza obulungi ekiringa ne bannaabwe abali mu nsi ez'oku muliraano.

translation.en: These include countries like Uganda, could not possibly expect.
translation.lug: Muno mulimu amawanga nga Uganda, agatasuubirwa.

translation.en: In health sphere, Rwandans do not expect to offer bribes to public servants employed to deliver services to which they are entitled.
translation.lug: Mu byobulamu, Abanyalwanda tebasuubira kugulirira bakozi ba gavumenti abasuubirwa okutuusa obuweereza bwe bateekeddwa okutuusa.

translation.en: Given the country's demographics, most of the beneficiaries of these advances are members of the majority Hutu population.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku muwendo gwabwe, abasinga okuganyulwa mu buweereza buno be Bahutu abasinga obungi.

translation.en: This is thanks to propaganda by past regimes.
translation.lug: Kino kwebaza eri abasaasaanya amawulire agalaliiko mitwe na magulu mu mirembe egyayita.

translation.en: Commentators of a particular bent may sneer at the Rwanda government's democratic credentials.
translation.lug: Batunuulizi bandyekkaanya engeri Rwanda gy'ekwatamu ensonga ya Demokulasiya.

translation.en: In Rwanda, police and army officers do not make political statements praising the Rwanda Political Front or criticising its opponents.
translation.lug: Mu Rwanda, poliisi n'abaamagye teboogera siteetimenti za byabufuzi nga batendereza Rwanda Political Front oba okukolokota abagivuganya.

translation.en: Hutu and Tutsi who qualify under the law are free to participate, without restriction or special privileges linked to ethnicity.
translation.lug: Abahutu n'Abatuusi abatuukiriza eteeka ba ddembe okwetaba awatali kukugirwa oba okuweebwa ekintu kyonna nga kyesigamizibwa ku ggwanga.

translation.en: They can participate as candidates or supporters of any of the country's legally registered political parties.
translation.lug: Basobola okwesimbawo oba okuwagira ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi byonna ebyawandiisibwa mu mateeka.
