translation.en: Journalists working for state media are not fired for hosting leaders of parties other than the Rwanda Political Front.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire abakolera omukutu gw'eggwanga tebagobebwa olw'okukyaza abakulu b'ebibiina abatali ba Rwanda Political Front.

translation.en: Under the supremacist Habyarimana and Kayibanda regimes this kind of ‚Äòfreedom for all' was unthinkable.
translation.lug: Mu mirembe gya Supremacist Habyarimana ne Kayibanda, eddembe lya bonna nga lino lyali terirowoozebwako.

translation.en: Another sphere in which the robustness of the Rwanda state can be discerned is law enforcement.
translation.lug: Embeera endala eyeenyumirizibwamu mu ggwanga lya Rwanda eri mu kwasisa y'amateeka.

translation.en: In some, including several of Rwanda's neighbours, having laws on the statute books is one thing, enforcement is another.
translation.lug: Mu zimu, nga mw'otwalidde ne baliraanwa ba Rwanda abawerako, okubeera n'amateeka mu bitabo kirala n'okugakwasisa kirala.

translation.en: In Rwanda, the state's willingness and capacity for law enforcement explains why the impunity which some of us have come to accept.
translation.lug: Mu Rwanda, embeera y'okweyagalira n'obusobozi bw'okukwasisa amateeka kinnyonnyola lwaki tusobola okukkiriza obutabonerezebwa.

translation.en: It explains it as a fact of life in our countries is virtually unknown.
translation.lug: Kikinnyonnyola ng'eky'amazima mu nsi zaffe ekitamanyiddwa.

translation.en: There are no untouchables, which explains why, regardless of what they may think of President Kagame as individuals.
translation.lug: Tewali bannantakwatwako, ekinnyonnyola lwaki, ne bw'oba nga ki ky'olowooleza Pulezidenti Kagame ng'omuntu.

translation.en: Then there are those who think he could be less strict and more compromising.
translation.lug: Era waliwo abo abalowooza nti ayinza okuba omugonvu oba obutafa kw'ekyo kye bakoze.

translation.en: There are also no cases of the high and mighty erecting buildings in total disregard of planning regulations and suffering no consequences.
translation.lug: Era tewaliiwo misango gya kugaana bizimbe bizimbiddwa nga tebiri ku ppulaani n'obutakozebwa bivaamu.

translation.en: And yet others have theirs demolished.
translation.lug: Ate ng'abalala ebyabwe bisaanyiziddwawo.

translation.en: Important personalities and ordinary folk, Hutu and Tutsi, soldier and civilian, all live in equal fear of, and respect for, the law.
translation.lug: Abantu ab'omugaso n'aba bulijjo, Abahutu n'Abatuusi, abajaasi n'abantu ba bulijjo banna babeera mu kutya kwe kumu n'okussa ekitiibwa mu mateeka.

translation.en: On law enforcement, Kalyegira is, of course, right to argue that "a state is not just about buildings, street lights or a functional civil service".
translation.lug: Mu kukwasisa amateeka, Kalyegira mutuufu okugamba nti eggwanga teriri ku bizimbe, mataala g'oku nguudo oba obuweereza eri abantu.

translation.en: It is too early to call Rwanda an African success story, as it is inappropriate to call it a normal country.
translation.lug: Ekiseera kikyali okuyita Rwanda olugero lwa Afirika olw'obuwanguzi, ng'era bwe kitali kituufu okuliyita eggwanga erya bulijjo.

translation.en: Golooba is Senior Research Fellow, Makerere Institute of Social Research, Makerere University.
translation.lug: Golooba munoonyereza omukugu, Makerere Institute of Social Research, Makerere University.

translation.en: Mubatsi Asinja HabatiIf says if you plan to seek the services of the Uganda police, prisons service, Mulago Hospital, any court, or UMEME;
translation.lug: Mubatsi Asinja Habatilf agamba nti bw'oba oteekateeka okusaba obweereza bwa poliisi, obw'amakomera, Eddwaliro ly'e Mulago, oba UMEME:

translation.en: You must be ready to bribe.
translation.lug: Olina okubeera omwetegefu okugulirira.

translation.en: The East African Bribery Index, a governance tool used to measure bribery levels says that no service is offered in the private and public sectors.
translation.lug: East African Bribery Index, ekikozesebwa kya gavumenti okupima eddaala ly'enguzi kigamba nti tewali buweereza bugabibwa mu bitongole by'obwannannyinga ne mu bya gavumenti.

translation.en: The Uganda Revenue Authority is slightly different than other national services that were surveyed.
translation.lug: Uganda Revenyue Authority eyawukanamu katono ku bitongole ebirala ebyanoonyerezebwako.

translation.en: The survey interviewed people in the East African Community member states of Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda and Burundi.
translation.lug: Okunonyereza kwetabibwamu abantu okuva mu nsi za East Afirika okuli Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania, Rwanda ne Burundi.

translation.en: The survey was carried out by Transparency International, an anticorruption watchdog.
translation.lug: Okunoonyereza kwakolebwa Transparency International, ekitongole ekirondoola obuli bw'enguzi.

translation.en: URA was found to be the institution with the highest aggregate index of all indicators, which means it performed worst on the bribery index.
translation.lug: URA yasangibwa okuba nga kye kitongole ekisinze okukola obubi nnyo mu bibalo by'enguzi ekitegeeza nti yali ekoze bubi nnyo bwe kituuka ku nguzi.

translation.en: It replaced the Uganda police, which was worst in the survey last year, but moved up to the second worst position this year.
translation.lug: Kyasikira poliisi ya Uganda eyali yasinga okukola obubi mu kunoonyereza kw'omwaka ogwayita n'edda mu kifo ekyokubiri omwaka guno.

translation.en: Regionally, Uganda is the second worst performer on the bribery index after Burundi.
translation.lug: Mu kitundu, Uganda yeeddirira Burundi mu kulya enguzi.

translation.en: Rwanda is by far the best performer with a corruption prevalence of only 6.6 percent.
translation.lug: Rwanda teriimu nguzi nga eno eri ku bitundu 6.6 ku buli kikumi byokka.

translation.en: Uganda, Kenya, and Burundi have bribery prevalence of 33 percent and dont expect service at URA, police and UMEME without a bribe.
translation.lug: Uganda, Kenya ne Burundi enguzi eri ku bitundu 33 ku buli kikumi era tusuubira buweereza ku URA, Poliisi ne UMEMR nga towadde nguzi.

translation.en: The report does not provide much information about why there is minimal corruption in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Alipoota tewa bubaka bungi ku lwali enguzi ntono mu Rwanda.

translation.en: However, it shows that the Rwandan Ombudsman enforces the government's zero tolerance against corruption.
translation.lug: Wabula, kiraga nti omukugu w'e Rwanda afuba okulaba nga tewali wadde enguzi mu gavumenti.

translation.en: In 2009, the Finance Director at the Presidency of Rwanda was suspended from office.
translation.lug: Mu 2009, akulira ebyensimbi mu woofiisi ya Pulezidenti yagobwa mu woofiisi.

translation.en: He was sentenced to four years in prison following corruption allegations.
translation.lug: Yasibwa emyaka ena mu kkomera olw'ebyo ebyekuusa ku buli bw'enguzi.

translation.en: He was also fined more than one billion Rwandan Francs.
translation.lug: Yatangibwa ensimbi ezisoba mu kawumbi ka ssente za Rwanda.

translation.en: A former top civil servant in the Rwandan infrastructure ministry was given a similar fine.
translation.lug: Eyali akulira emirimu mu Minisitule ya Rwanda ey'ebyenkulaakulana naye yaweebwa engassi y'emu.

translation.en: Over 20 of the 30 district mayors in Rwanda were removed from office for alleged mismanagement.
translation.lug: Bammeeya ba distulikiti abasukka mu 20 ku 30 mu Rwanda nabo baagobwa mu woofiisi ku bigambiwa nti bazikozesa bubi.

translation.en: In Rwanda, the Ombuds-man's office is responsible for reviewing the revenue declarations submitted by top government officials.
translation.lug: Mu Rwanda , woofiisi y'omukugu evunaanyizibwa ku kukebera omusolo oguweereddwayo abakungu ba gavumenti.

translation.en: These include the president.
translation.lug: Bano mulimu ne Pulezidenti.

translation.en: In comparison to Uganda where relatively low ranking offenders are arraigned before the anti-corruption court and convictions are rare.
translation.lug: Bw'ogeraageranya ne Uganda abantu aba wansi basimbibwa mu kkooti ewozesa abakenuzi era abavunaanibwa batono.

translation.en: In Rwanda, only six percent of respondents said that they had actually paid a bribe.
translation.lug: Mu Rwanda, abantu ebitundu mukaaga ku kikumi bokka ku baabuuzibwa be baagamba nti baali basasudde enguzi.

translation.en: Due to the limited numbers of reported bribery incidents, the index for Rwanda couldn't be formulated by compilers in their report.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba nti abantu batono abawa enguzi, omuwendo gwa Rwanda eyagasse alipoota eno teyagutaddemu.

translation.en: No other East African country registered high optimism in corruption perceptions compared to Rwanda.
translation.lug: Tewali ggwanga ddala mu East Africa lyalaga bwerufu bwa waggulu ku nguzi bw'oligeraageranya ne Rwanda.

translation.en: A common new form of corruption used by top government officials in Uganda involves delaying the execution of services to create a crisis.
translation.lug: Engeri empya eriirwamu enguzi ekozesebwa abakungu ba gavumenti mu Uganda erimu okulwawo okutuusa obuweereza okusobola okutondawo obwetaavu obw'amaanyi.

translation.en: It happened during the CHOGM in 2007 where colossal amounts of public funds were stolen in hurried procurements.
translation.lug: Kyatuukawo mu CHOGM mu 2007 nga ssente za gavumenti nnyingi zabbibwa mu kugula ebintu mu bwangu.

translation.en: The report says that it's clear that the anti-corruption legislations in Uganda have had little impact thus strengthening the cause to review them.
translation.lug: Alipoota egamba nti kyeraga lwatu nti abalwanyisa enguzi mu Uganda tebalina kye bakozeewo n'olw'ekyo ne kyongera okuleetawo obwetaavu obyekenneenya.

translation.en: The government's point man in the anti-corruption fight, Minister for Ethics and Integrity, James Nsaba Buturo;
translation.lug: Omukungu wa gavumenti mu kulwanyisa enguzi, minisita w'empisa n'obuntubulamu, James Nsaba Buturo;

translation.en: Gets defensive when presented with the figures.
translation.lug: Gaana singa obeera ng'osabiddwa enguzi.

translation.en: He says he doesn't know what safeway Transparency International's surveys use to arrive to its information.
translation.lug: Agamba tamanyi ngeri ki Transparency International z'ekozesa okutuuka ku bubaka buno.

translation.en: But Jasper Tumuhimbise, an anticorruption activist, has no doubt about the unease.
translation.lug: Naye Jasper Tumuhimbise, alwanyisa enguzi agamba nti talina kubuusabuusa ku kino.

translation.en: He says that Uganda might top the region in next year's survey.
translation.lug: Agamba Uganda eyinza okusinga mu kitundu mu kunoonyereza kw'omwaka ogujja.

translation.en: Tumuhimbise adds that Uganda ranks high on corruption.
translation.lug: Tumuhimbise ayongerako nti Uganda ekwata kifo kya waggulu mu buli bw'enguzi.

translation.en: Apart from Rwanda, all governments in the region appear to lack the will to fight corruption.
translation.lug: Okuggyako Rwanda, gavumenti zonna mu kitundu zirabika nga tezirina busobozi kulwanyisa nguzi.

translation.en: As a result of this, most citizens do not even bother to report the vice.
translation.lug: Ekiva mu kino, abatuuze abasinga tebafa nayo kuloopa muze guno.

translation.en: At 41 percent, Uganda has the highest number of respondents saying they do not report bribery cases because no action will be taken.
translation.lug: Ku bitundu 41 ku buli kikumi, Uganda y'esinga omuwendo gw'abaabuuzi abagamba nti tebaaloopa misango gya nguzi kubanga tewali kijja kukolebwa.

translation.en: In worst-performing Burundi, however, only 17 percent believe it will rise.
translation.lug: Wabula mu Burundi esingamu enguzi, 17 ku 100 bokka be basuubira nti ejja kweyongera.

translation.en: "What we need is the release of our money," said Odoi.
translation.lug: Twetaaga okuta ssente zaffe, Odoi bwe yagambye.

translation.en: "But we see no headway and we can't open the university to the students", Odoi continued.
translation.lug: Odoi era yayongedeko, tetulabawo kigenda mu maaso era tetusobola kuggulawo ssetendekero eri abayizi.

translation.en: "The scene at Makerere was calm on Monday but with each passing day the risk of restlessness and frustration grows", Odoi added.
translation.lug: Odoi yayongeddeko, embeera e Makerere yabadde nzikakkamu ku Mmande naye buli lunaku oluyita obunkenke bweyongera.

translation.en: A clash of faith is emerging at the all African Bishops Conference in Entebbe.
translation.lug: Obukuubagano bw'enzikiriza bubalukawo ku All African Bishops Conference Entebbe.

translation.en: The six day conference is aimed at fostering unity and breathing new life into the church.
translation.lug: Olusirika olw'ennaku omukaaga lugendereddwamu okunyweza obumu n'okuzza obulamu obupya mu Kkanisa.

translation.en: Under the theme, "Securing the future, unlocking our Potential," four hundred Anglicans faith will meet including Rowan Williams.
translation.lug: Wansi w'omulamwa, okutegekera ebiseera by'omu maaso, okusumulula obusobozi bwaffe, Abangirikaani ebikumi bina bajja ku sisinkana nga kw'otadde ne Rowan Williams.

translation.en: He is the Archbishop of Canterbury.
translation.lug: Ye Ssaabasumba w'e Canterbury.

translation.en: This is a difficult time for the Anglican faith as the divide between Bishops in Africa and outside continues to grow.
translation.lug: Kano akaseera kazibu eri enzikiriza y'Abangirikaani nga okweyawula wakati w'a bepiskoopi mu Afirika n'ebweru kweyongera okukula.

translation.en: Archbishop Williams has a substantially more favorable stand on homosexuality and gay Bishops serving in the church than African counterparts.
translation.lug: Ssaabasumba Williams ayina w'asibidde awenkizo ku bepiskoopi abalya ebisiyaga okuwereza mu kkanisa okusinga banne abalala mu Afirika.

translation.en: The Independent of Aug 27 - Sept 02, 2010 said there is no easy way out of the brutality that confronts the Karimojong civilians today.
translation.lug: Independent eyo gw'omunaana 27 - ogw'omwenda 02,2010,yagamba tewaliiyo ngeri nyangu ya bukaambwe ey'okwenganga aba kalamoja leero.

translation.en: As darkness deepens over Karamoja, the National Resistance Movement government continues with its brutal "disarmament programme".
translation.lug: Enzikiza gye yeyongera eri aba karamoja, gavumenti ya National Resistance Movement bweyongera obukambwe bwayo mu ntekateka z'okubaggyako ebyo kulwanyisa.

translation.en: Sadly enough, while this scenario continues, it is business as usual for Ugandans and the rest of the world.
translation.lug: Ekyenaku ekisinga,nga embeera eno ekyagenda mu maaso,Kya bulijjo eri bannayuganda n'ensi endala.

translation.en: According to available information from Karamoja, the Uganda People's Defence Forces soldiers are conducting a military campaign.
translation.lug: Okusinzira ku mawulire agaliwo okuva e karamoja ,abajaasi ba Uganda People's Defence Force bakola kakuyege w'amagye.

translation.en: A Pokot chief elder Mzee Aramutori Lokodo, first brought the plight of the Karimojong to the public in February this year.
translation.lug: Omukadde we Pokot Aramutori Lokodo,yasooka kutereeza mbera ya bakalamoja eri abantu mu gw'okubiri omwaka guno.

translation.en: Then on April 29, 2010, Nicholas Abul, the Kacheri LCIII chairman, was quoted in the media.
translation.lug: Awo ogw'okuna nga 29, 2010,Nicholac Abul,ssentebe wa LCIII owe kacheri,yayogedwako mu mawulire

translation.en: "The army should identify the warriors who are armed and those who are not", Nicholas Abdul said.
translation.lug: Nicholas yagambye nti ,eggye liyina okuzuula abatujju abalina eby'okulwanyisa n'abo abataalina,

translation.en: During his tour of Karamoja, the Forum for Democratic Change President, Dr Kizza Besigye, saw what was happening there.
translation.lug: Mukulambula kwe e karamoja,pulezidenti wa Forum for Democratic Change,Dr Kizza Besigye yalaba ekyali kigenda mu maaso.

translation.en: Besigye told journalists at the FDC party headquarters in Najjanankumbi that the abuses take the form of extreme torture.
translation.lug: Besigye yagambye bannamawulire ku kitebe kya FDC e Najjanankumbi nti ebivumo bikola ekika  ky'okutulugunya eky'amaanyi

translation.en: In the New Vision of May 24, 2010, the Uganda Human Rights Commission said Kotido district residents were panic stricken.
translation.lug: Mu New Vision w'ogwokutaano 24,2010,Uganda Human Rights Commision yagamba, abatuuze mu disitulikiti ye Kotido baagwamu entiisa.

translation.en: Later, in a meeting with Uganda Human Rights Commission on June 28, the visiting Irish Foreign Affairs minister Michael Martin had some remarks.
translation.lug: Oluvanyuma, mu lukiiko ne Uganda Human Rights Commission nga 28 ogw'omukaaga,minisita w'ensonga z'ebweru eyakyala okuva mu Island Michael Martin aliko bye yayogera.

translation.en: "We are concerned about reports on human rights violation against women and children in Karamoja," Martin said.
translation.lug: Martin yagamba, tufaayo ku alipoota ezikolebwa ku kutyoboola eddembe lya bakyala n'abaana e karamoja.

translation.en: Pokot Member of Parliament, accuses the Elite Special Forces unit of the Uganda People's Defence Forces for the killing "innocent Pokot people".
translation.lug: Omubaka wa paalamenti ow'e Pokot, anenya Elite Special Forces unit eya Uganda People's Defence Forces okutta abantu ba Pokot abataalina musango.

translation.en: Kiyonga also accused the Uganda People's Defence Forces of scalding suspected Karimojong rustlers with hot metals.
translation.lug: Kiyonga naye yanenya Uganda People's Defence Forces okukubisa Abakaramoja abateeberezebwa okuba ababbi b'ente n'ebyuma ebyokya.

translation.en: The army spokesman, Leutenant. Colonel. Felix Kulayigye, dismissed the allegations as "unfounded".
translation.lug: Omwogezi w'amagye,Leutenant.Colonel.Felix Kulayigye,yasambazze ebigambibwa nga ebitaliiyo.

translation.en: On removing people's teeth as a method of torture, Kulayigye said: "Karimojong people have removed their teeth culturally".
translation.lug: Mukuggyamu amannyo nga engeri y'okutulugunya, Kulayigye yagambye, abakaramoja baggyemu amannyo gaabwe lwa buwangwa.

translation.en: Even before the current allegations, another MP wrote to President Museveni and the Commander in Chief about the army's conduct.
translation.lug: Nga nebigambibwa tebinabaawo,MP omulala yawandiikira Pulezidenti Museveni n'omuduumizi w'amagye ku neyisa y'abamagye.

translation.en: Jie County Member of Parliament told President Museveni that soldiers killed between twenty eight to forty three civilians in April.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa paalamenti ow'essazza lye Jie yagambye pulezidenti Museveni nti abaserikale batta abantu ba bulijjo abali wakati w'abiri mu munaana n'amakumi ana mu basatu mu gw'okuna.

translation.en: The president dismissed the allegations as "baseless" and that the army was "doing a good job in ridding Karamoja of guns.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti yasambazze ebigambibwa nga bwe bitayina nsibuko era nti eggye lyali likola omulimu omulungi mu kuggyako abakaramoja emundu.

translation.en: So such is the tragic situation that has been playing itself in the Karamoja sub-region of North eastern Uganda.
translation.lug: So nno eyo y'embeera ey'entiisa ebadde yeeyolekera mu bitundu by'e Karamoja mu North Eastern Uganda.

translation.en: The practice of drawing civilians into the fray of military "operations" is the Uganda People's Defence Force's long standing tradition.
translation.lug: Ekikolwa ky'okukwata abantu ba bulijjo mu bikwekweto by'amagye muze gwa Uganda People's Defence Force.

translation.en: They know that not all Karimojong carry guns.
translation.lug: Bakimanyi nti si buli Mukaramoja nti ayina emundu.

translation.en: Neither are all Karimojong cattle rustlers, yet they are targeted as if they were.
translation.lug: Si Bakarimajongo bonna nti babbi ba nte, kyokka basongedwamu nga gy'oli nti bali.

translation.en: This is not to suggest that the Karimojong warriors who terrorise their communities and neighbouring districts should not be held accountable.
translation.lug: Kuno si kuteesa nti abakarimojongo abatabaazi abatigomya ebitundu byabwe ne disitulikiti ezibaliranye tebateekeddwa kuvunaanibwa.

translation.en: To the Uganda People's Defence Forces, they are all the same, all "Karimojong are warriors".
translation.lug: Eri Uganda People's Defence Forces, bonna bafaanagana ,Bakarimojongo bonna batabaazi

translation.en: Common sense has to prevail, the Karimojong warriors must be separated from the ordinary civilians.
translation.lug: Amagezi amazaale galina okukola, Bakarimojongo abatabaazi bateekeddwa okwawulibwa ku bantu ba bulijjo.

translation.en: Museveni hasn't learnt from the twenty five years of the insurgency in Acholi if he expects to rid Karamoja of guns by force.
translation.lug: Museveni tayigidde ku myaka abiri mu etaano egy'obutabanguko mu Acholi bwaba asuubira okuggyako karamoja emundu n'ekifuba.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Defence Forces continues to target women and children.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Defence Forces eyongera okulubirira abakyala n'abaana.

translation.en: "Collective punishment cannot deliver a peaceful Karamoja." said Olara, a human rights advocate.
translation.lug: Ekibonerezo eky'awamu tekiyinza kuleeta mirembe mu Karamoja, Olara omulwanirizi w'eddembe ly'obuntu bwe yagambye.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Defence Forces continues to target women and children.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Defence Forces eyongera okulubirira abakyala n'abaana.

translation.en: It is rare to read an opinion about politics in Uganda in our media whose premise is our reality.
translation.lug: Tekisangika okusoma endowooza ku by'obufuzi mu Uganda ku mikutu gyaffe egy'empuliziganya  nga ekirowoozo ekyo mbeera zaffe za ddala.

translation.en: Two months ago, two former prime ministers of Buganda Kingdom announced their support for the opposition in the forthcoming elections.
translation.lug: Emyezi ebiiri egyiyise, abaliiko ba katikkiro ba Buganda babiri balangirira obuwagizi bwabwe eri oludda oluvuganya mu kalulu akajja.

translation.en: Given President Museveni's battles with Mengo over land and federo lately, this was a big public relations coup for our embattled opposition.
translation.lug: Ku lw'entalo za Pulezidenti Museveni ne Mengo ku by'ettaka ne Federo gye buvudeko,luno lwali luwenda lunene eri oludda lwaffe oluvuganya.

translation.en: In trying to win over ethnic Baganda, the opposition has done little to root itself in their existential problems.
translation.lug: Mu kugezaako okuwangula Abaganda, oludda oluvuganya lukoze kitono okusimba amakanda ku bizibu byalwo.

translation.en: However, the calculation is obvious that by winning over powerful Baganda leaders to its side, the opposition hopes to leverage their reputation.
translation.lug: Newankubadde ekibalo kirabirwawo nti okuwangula abakulembeze Abaganda abamaanyi okubeera ku ludda lwabwe ,oludda oluvuganya lusuubira okukozesa ekifaananyi kyabwe.

translation.en: In this lies the fundamental failure of politics in Africa.
translation.lug: Mukino mwe muva ensibuko y'okulemwa eby'obufuzi mu Afirika.

translation.en: During 2006 presidential election, Museveni got one point six million votes and seventy five point four percent in the West.
translation.lug: Mu kalulu k'obwapulezidenti aka 2006,Museveni yafuna obululu akakadde kamu mu emitwalo nkaaga n'ebitundu nsanvu mu bitaano n'obutundutundu buna mu buvanjuba.

translation.en: Let us assume the same number of registered voters and the same voter turnout as in 2006.
translation.lug: Katusuubire omuwendo ogw'ewandiisa gwegumu n'omuwendo gw'abalonda mu 2006.

translation.en: The opposition needs to only force Museveni to a draw in the south east and to forty percent in Buganda.
translation.lug: Oludda oluvuganya lw'etaaga kukaka Museveni basibagane mu South East n'ebitundu ana mu Buganda.

translation.en: For then the combined vote of the opposition would be three point four five million against Museveni's three point three million votes.
translation.lug: N'olwekyo obululu obugatte obw'aboludda oluvuganya bwandibadde obukadde busatu mu emitwalo ana mu etaano okusinga obwa Museveni obukadde busatu mu emitwalo asatu.

translation.en: Buganda is therefore the major battle ground region around which Museveni's presidency will be fought.
translation.lug: Buganda n'olwekyo ky'ekitundu ky'eddwaniro ekkulu obukulembeze bwa Museveni we bujja okulwanyisibwa.

translation.en: If Muliika and Ssemogerere tilt the balance against Museveni in Buganda, it is very likely that we will get another change.
translation.lug: Singa Muliika ne Ssemogerere bakendeeza obululu bwa Museveni mu Buganda, kisuubirwa nti tujja kufuna enkyukakyuka endala.

translation.en: The worrying feature about democratic politics in Africa is how much elites are able to make bargains at the top.
translation.lug: Ekyeraliikiriza ku nkola y'obufuzi eya demokulasiya mu Afirika y'engeri abayivu gye basobola okulamuziganya  waggulu.

translation.en: If the opposition can win Buganda simply by entering a deal with a few Baganda elites, it will have little incentive.
translation.lug: Singa oludda oluvuganya lusobola okuwangula Buganda nga bayingira buyingizi mu ddiiru n'abayivu abatono mu buganda, kijja kwetaagisa ebintu bitono.

translation.en: Politicians in Africa find it more electorally profitable to prioritize the allocation of private goods over pubic goods.
translation.lug: Ab'ebyobufuzi mu Afirika bakisanga nti kifuna nnyo mu byobufuzi okukulembeza ebya maguzi by'obwannannyini ku bya gavumenti.

translation.en: To dismantle this elite driven politics is the biggest challenge to democratization in Africa.
translation.lug: Okusanyawo eby'obufuzi bino eby'abasoma, kwe kusoomoza okusinga mu kuteekawo dimokulasiya mu Afirika.

translation.en: This is where the opposition has failed to offer an alternative to National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Wano oludda oluvuganya we lulemereddwa okuwa ekikira ku National Resistance Movement .

translation.en: Even in western democracies, the endorsement of influential elites is important, but only for its symbolic value.
translation.lug: Ne demokulasiya mu mawanga g'abazungu, okusimbawo abayivu ab'amaanyi kya mugaso, naye ku lw'emiganyulo gyabwe.

translation.en: It is rare to hear an issue based organizational voice backing a candidate in Uganda.
translation.lug: Tekisangika mu Uganda okuwulira eddoboozi ly'ekibiina nga kisemba ey'esimbyewo.

translation.en: The worrying feature about democratic politics in Africa is how much elites are able to make bargains at the top.
translation.lug: Ekyeraliikiriza ku byobufuzi by'ebibiina ebingi mu Afirika y'engeri abayivu gye basobola okulamuziganyaamu waggulu.

translation.en: The crisis of democracy in Africa.
translation.lug: Akatuubagiro ka demokolasiya mu Afirika.

translation.en: Dan Mugarura, the Chairman for Electoral Affairs of the main opposition party, the Forum for Democratic Change, is a very worried man.
translation.lug: Dan Mugarura, ssentebe w'ebyokulonda mu kibiina ky'oludda oluvuganya ekisinga amaanyi ekya Forum for Democratic Change, mweraliikirivu.

translation.en: "If you can shoot your own child and wife, it means you will tear up your neighbour," Mugarura told The Independent.
translation.lug: Mugarura yagambye Independent nti, bwoba osobola okukuba omwana wo ne mukazi wo amasasi, kitegeeza nti osobola okuyuzaayuza muliraanwawo.

translation.en: He was referring to the violence during the ruling National Resistance Movement party district elections and constituency primaries.
translation.lug: Yali ajuliza ku mivuyo mu kalulu k'ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza ekya National Resistance Movement aka disitulikiti n'akamyufu ka consitituwensi.

translation.en: Mugarura's fears are not unfounded.
translation.lug: Okutya kwa Mugarura tekyina nsibuko.

translation.en: In Kapchorwa's Tingey county, violence erupted between supporters of former minister Stephen Chebrot and the incumbent MP Herbert Sabila.
translation.lug: Mu ssaza lya Kapcholwa erya Tingey, akavuyo kaabalukawo wakati w'abawagizi b'eyaliko Minisita Stephen Chebrot n'abomubaka aliko Herbert Sabila.

translation.en: In West Budama Minister Emmanuel Otala drew a gun at supporters of his opponent.
translation.lug: Mu Budama ey'obuvanjuba, Minisita Emmanuel Otala yatunuza emmundu mu bawagizi b'eyali amuvuganya.

translation.en: Dr. Gabriel Aridru Ajedra clashed at Awindiri Old Market.
translation.lug: Dokita Gabriel Ajedra yafuna akabenje ku katale Awindiri omukadde.

translation.en: In Kaliro, elections were cancelled twice over alleged malpractices.
translation.lug: Mu Kaliro, okulonda kwasazibwamu emirundi ebiri olw'ebigambibwa nti kwalimu emivuyo.

translation.en: In Butaleja the elections were cancelled after a mob attacked the organisers.
translation.lug: Mu Butalejja, okulonda kwasazibwamu oluvannyuma lw'ekibinja ky'abantu okulumba abategesi.

translation.en: For many observers, they were indicators of what government could have been dealing with in 2011.
translation.lug: Eri abalabi bangi, waaliwo obubonero obulaga Gavumenti kye yandibadde ekola mu 2011.

translation.en: According to a 2009 Human Rights Watch International report, security agencies present the single biggest threat.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku lipoota ya Human Rights Watch International eya 2009 egamba nti ebitongole by'ebyokwerinda bitulugunya abantu.

translation.en: Ikuya Magode, summed up the current crisis for his party and the country going into the 2011 elections.
translation.lug: Ikuya Magode, yawa ekifaananyi ku mbeera y'akatyabaga mu kibiina kye ng'eggwanga ligenda mu kulonda kwa 2011.

translation.en: The Igbo says, "whenever you see a toad jumping in broad daylight, then know that something is after its life".
translation.lug: Omuyigbo agamba nti, "buli lw'olaba ng'ekikere kibuuka bwe kidduka okuva mu kifo emisana ttuku, ng'omanya nti waliwo abikiyigga,".

translation.en: Such was the situation on July 13 when Matia Kasaija, Amama Mbabazi and Crispus Kiyonga, issued statements about the July 11 bomb attacks.
translation.lug: Eyo y'embeera eyaliwo nga 13 Ogwomusanvu, Matia Kasaija, Amama Mbabazi ne Crispus Kiyonga, bwe baayogera ku bulumbaganyi bwa bbomu obwaliwo mu Gwomunaana nga 11.

translation.en: Security minister Mbabazi told parliament that when they introduce additional security measures they expect the public to support them.
translation.lug: Minisita w'obutebenkevu Mbabazi yategeeza Paalamenti nti basuubira abantu okubawagira bwe baleetawo engeri z'okukuuma obutebenkevu endala.

translation.en: On July 14, the Regulation of Interception Bill was hastily passed inspite of the concerns that it would infringe on citizens' right to privacy.
translation.lug: Ebbago ly'etteeka ku kukebera n'okulondoola abantu lyayisibwa mu Gwomusanvu nga 14, wakati mu bamu okuliwakanya nga bagamba nti lyali lya kuyingirira obulamu bwa Bannayuganda obw'ekyama.

translation.en: Finally, in early August, President Museveni issued a policy directive to the Ministry of Finance to remove taxes on security equipment.
translation.lug: Kyaddaaki ng'Ogwomunaana gutandika, Pulezidenti Museveni yayisa ekiragiro ng'alagira minisitule y'ebyensimbi okuggyawo emisolo ku bikozesebwa mu byokwerinda.

translation.en: Nathan Igeme Nabeta, Chairperson Parliamentary CommitteeICT, says it will be some time before the Regulation of Interception Law is operational.
translation.lug: Nathan Igeme Nabeta, ssentebe w'akakiiko ka Paalamenti aka Tekinologiya, agamba nti kijja kubaawo ng'etteeka ly'okulondoola ebyempuliziganya terinnatandika kuteekebwa mu nkola.

translation.en: The government requires funds to equip and run a communication monitoring center and these were not provided for in 2009/2010 budget.
translation.lug: Gavumenti yeetaaga ssente okugulan'okuddukanya ekifo ekinaasinziirwangamu okulondoola ebyempuliziganya ate nga tekyateekebwa mu mbalirira ya2009/2010.

translation.en: Nabeta says that right now the law is not useful in the fight against terror.
translation.lug: Nabeta agamba nti mu kiseera kino etteeka terikola ku kulwanyisa obutujju.

translation.en: In May 2002, the Anti terrorism Act was passed, but it has never been made operational.
translation.lug: Mu Gwomunaana 2002, etteeka erikwata ku butujju lyayisibwa naye libadde teriteekebwanga mu nkola.

translation.en: Amama Mbabazi insisted in parliament that the Regulation of Interception Law was more specific.
translation.lug: Amama Mbabazi yalemeddeko mu paalamenti nti etteeka ery'okulondoola ebyempuliziganya teryali lyanjulukufu kimala.

translation.en: Resident District Commissioners have embarked on an exercise to push Local Councils back into community policing.
translation.lug: Ababaka ba Pulezidenti batandise kaweefube okulaba ng'abakulembeze b'ebitundu baddayo wansi mu bantu nga babalondoola okulaba ebiba bigenda mu maaso.

translation.en: Nakawa Resident District Commissioner Fred Bamwine has ordered Local Councils to resume some of their former policing roles.
translation.lug: Omubaka wa Pulezidenti mu Nakawa Fred Bamwine alagidde bassentebe b'ebyalo okuddamu egimu ku mulimu gy'okulondoola nga bwe kyali.

translation.en: However, until fresh LC elections are held in line with the April 2, 2007 Constitutional Court ruling they cannot dispense justice in minor cases.
translation.lug: Kyokka, okutuusa okulonda kwa bassentebe b'ebyalo lwe kwaliwo nga 2 Ogwomunaana 2007 nga kkooti ya ssemateeka bwe yasalawo, tebasobola kweggyako kutuusa bwenkanya mu misango emitono.

translation.en: The 2007 ruling nullified the election of village and parish councils and ordered that new ones be elected under the multi party political order.
translation.lug: Ensala ya 2007 yasazaamu okulondebwa kwa bassentebe b'ebyalo n'ab'emiruka nti abapya baddemu balondebwe wansi w'enkola y'ebibiina ebingi.

translation.en: Designed to provide a platform through which political parties and organisations collaborate with the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Yakolebwa okuteekawo oluwenda ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi n'ebitongole mwe biyita okukwatagana n'ekakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: Article 20 provides for a National Consultative Forum to have a chairman nominated from a party with the most representation in parliament.
translation.lug: Ennyingo 20 ewa National Consultative Forum obuyinza okusunsula ssentebe okuva mu ekisinga ababaka mu Paalamenti.

translation.en: Sam Rwakojo, the Electoral Commission secretary, explained to the twenty eight parties and organisations that attended the launch.
translation.lug: Omuwandiisi w'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda Sam Rwakojo, yannyonnyodde ebibiina abiri mu omunaana n'ebibiina ebirala ebyetabye mu kutongoza.

translation.en: But the absence of even a single National Resistance Movement representative raised eyebrows.
translation.lug: Naye obutakiikirirwa wadde omukiise wa National Resistance Movement bwaleka bangi nga beebuuza ebibuuzo.

translation.en: Ssemujja Ibrahim Nganda, spokes person of IPC, which brings together five political parties wondered why the law was amended.
translation.lug: Ssemujja Ibrahim Nganda, omwogezi wa IPC, nga kye kigatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebitaano yeewuunya lwaki etteeka lyakolebwako ennongoosereza.

translation.en: Nganda suspects wicked play.
translation.lug: Nganda ateebereza nti byandibaamu sindikeeti.

translation.en: With the chairman's chair empty, the opposition Forum for Democratic Change party's Amanya Mushega was nominated as the vice chairperson.
translation.lug: Ng'entebe ya ssentebe nkalu, ekibiina ekiri ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti ekya Forum for Democratic Change kyasunsula Amanya Mushega ku ky'omumyuka wa ssentebe.

translation.en: Nganda said that at times people put much importance to the establishment of an organisation.
translation.lug: Nganda yagamba nti ebiseera ebimu abantu bassa nnyo essira ku kutondawo ekibiina.

translation.en: Asuman Basalirwa, said he does not think the political parties and organisations will benefit from the forum.
translation.lug: Asuman Basalirwa, yagambye nti talowooza nti ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi n'ebitongole nti bijja kuganyulwa mu mukago.

translation.en: Article 67 of the 1995 Uganda constitution states;
translation.lug: Ennyingo 67 eya ssemateeka wa Uganga owa 1995 egamba nti;

translation.en: "No election candidate shall be denied reasonable access and use of State owned communication media".
translation.lug: Tewali yeesimbyewo anaagaanibwa okweyambisa emikutu gy'ebyempuliziganya egy'eggwanga.

translation.en: Basalirwa said, for example, if it had been established earlier, the Forum would have dealt with the reconstitution of the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Okugeza Basalirwa yagambye nti kyali kyateekebwawo mu bwango, omukago gwandiyambyeko mu kuzza obuggya akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The independence of the Electoral Commission is doubted by the opposition parties.
translation.lug: Ab'ebibiina ebiri ludda oluvuganya gavumenti babuusabuusa obwetengereze bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The forum was a prerequisite under the Public Procurement Oversight Authority that was passed by parliament on March 20, 2002.
translation.lug: Omukago gwali gwasabibwa mu kitongole ekikola ku kugula n'okutunda ebintu bya gavumenti ekyayisibwa Paalamenti mu Gwokusatu nga 20, 2002.

translation.en: Basalirwa predicts that the Forum will be of no help between now and February 2011, when the general elections will be held.
translation.lug: Basalirwa ateebereza nti omukago tegujja kuba na mugaso okuva kati okutuuka mu Gwokubiri 2011, akalulu ka bonna gye kanaabeererayo.

translation.en: It is six months to the next elections and it is obvious the forum has many issues to address.
translation.lug: Wasigadde emyezi mukaaga okutuuka ku kulonda era kirabikirawo nti omukago gulina ensonga nnyingi ez'okukolako.

translation.en: President Museveni, who is the chairman of the NRM and appoints the Electoral Commission, has said he will not change its composition.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni, nga ye ssentebe wa NRM era alonda akakiiko k'ebyokulonda yagamba nti tasobola kukakyusaamu.

translation.en: The launch was at Hotel Africana Kampala on August.
translation.lug: Okutongoza kwali ku Hotel Africana Kampala mu Gwomunaana.

translation.en: Rwakoojo conducted over seventeen meetings together with all Electoral Commission commissioners.
translation.lug: Rwakoojo ng'ali wamu ne bakaminsona b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda bonna yateekateeka enkungaana ezisukka ekkumi n'omusanvu.

translation.en: The EC chairman, Engineer. Badru Kiggundu and Rwakoojo, said they would ensure that political parties comply with the code of conduct.
translation.lug: Ssentebe w'akakiiko kano, yinginiya Badru Kiggundu ne Rwakoojo, baagamba nti baakulaba ng'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi bikuuma empisa.

translation.en: Nganda told the Independent that the leadership does not matter but what matters is how decisions are arrived at.
translation.lug: Nganda yategeeza Independent nti obukulembeze si kye kikulu, wabula ekikulu y'engeri okusalawo gye kutuukibwako.

translation.en: Basalirwa agrees that if the leader of the forum has good will, then the forum will succeed in addressing the issues.
translation.lug: Basalirwa akkirirza nti ssinga ssentebe w'omukago anaaba n'omutima ogugwagaliza, omukago guno gwa kuggusa ensonga zonna.

translation.en: National Resistance Movement absence threatens party forum launch.
translation.lug: Obutabaawo bwa National Resistance Movement kissa okutongoza omukago mu kattu.

translation.en: Last week the police blocked a meeting by the Democratic Party faction led by Samuel Lubega at Nsambya Youth Sharing Hall in Kampala.
translation.lug: Wiiki ewedde poliisi yalemesa olukungaana lw'ekiwayi kya Democratic Party ekikulirwa Samuel Lubega ku Nsambya Youth Sharing Hall mu Kampala.

translation.en: The meeting was to discuss terms under which they would join the Interparty Cooperation, a loose alliance of five political parties.
translation.lug: Olukungaana lwali lwa kuteesa ku ngeri gye bandiyiseemu okwegatta ku mukago gw'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebitaano.

translation.en: The faction relocated the meeting to Kabusu village and resolved to join the Inter Party Corporation.
translation.lug: Ekiwayi kino kyakyusa olukiiko ne kiruzza ku kyalo Kasubi ne basalawo okwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: The officially recognised DP said that they had summoned the five leaders of the Lubega faction to the party's disciplinary committee.
translation.lug: DP emanyikiddwa mu butongole yagamba nti baali baayita abakulembeze b'ekiwayi kya Lubega mu kakiiko k'ekibiina akakwasisa empisa.

translation.en: Simon Peter Ochieng, said they had not received any letter calling them to appear before the disciplinary committee.
translation.lug: Simon Peter Ochieng, yagamba nti baali tebannafuna bbaluwa yonna ebayita okulabikako eri akakiiko akakwasisa empisa.

translation.en: He said Mao's group only summoned them through a press conference for publicity purposes.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ekibinja kya Mao kyabayita buyisi mu lukiiko lwa bannamawulire n'ekigendererwa ky'okumanyibwa.

translation.en: Ochieng said that Mao's group loves media attention.
translation.lug: Ochieng yagamba nti ekibinja kya Mao kyagala nnyo amawulire.

translation.en: He said they pulled the same action on August 18 when they went to meet the Inter Party Corporation leaders and called journalists to escort them.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti baakola ekintu kye kimu nga 18 Ogwomunaana bwe baagenda okusisinka omukago ogutaba ebibiina bye byobufuzi ne bayita bannamwawulire okubawerekererako.

translation.en: Salaam Musumba, approves that Mao's group went to meet the Inter Party Corporation for publicity purposes.
translation.lug: Salaam Musumba, akakasa nti ekiwayi kya Mao kyagenda okusisinkana omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi n'ekigendererwa ky'okumanyika.

translation.en: Musumba described Mao's decision to meet Inter Party Corporation leaders as a childish check to attract publicity.
translation.lug: Musumba yannyonnyola okusalowo kwa Mao okusisinkana abakulembeze b'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ng'ekyekito eky'okwagala okwogerwako.

translation.en: The Mao group's sudden change of attitude was very surprising given that they have been publicly minimizing the Inter Party Corporation.
translation.lug: Engeri ekiwayi kya Mao okwekyusa mbagirawo kyali kyewuunyisa olw'okuba nti kyali kyagala nnyo amawulire g'omukago ogutaba ebibiina bye byobufuzi.

translation.en: Musumba said they were not interested in spoiling in childish politics.
translation.lug: Musumba yagamba nti tebaali beetegefu kumala biseera mu byabufuzi bya kito.

translation.en: She said the Inter Party Corporation had written to the Mao group to join Inter Party Corporation but they refused.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gwali gwawandiikira ekiwayi kya Mao okugwegattako naye nga kyagaana.

translation.en: They later decided to examine the legal and political implications of accepting one faction of Democratic Party when the other is out.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma baatandika okwetegereza enkola ey'amateeka n'enkola z'ebyobufuzi ezandivudde mu kukkiriza ekiwayi kya Democratic Party ekimu ng'ekirala tebakolagana nakyo.

translation.en: The Inter Party Corporation then subjected the issue to a legal and political survey.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ensonga gwagizza ku kunoonyereza kw'amateeka n'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: Musumba said, it was then Mao and his group came accompanied by journalists to meet the Inter Party Corporation.
translation.lug: Musumba yagamba nti mu kiseera ekyo Mao n'ekibinja bajja nga bawerekeddwako bannawawulire okusisinkana omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: She said it appears Mao's Democratic Party is neither interested in joining the Inter Party Corporation nor cooperating with them on anything.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti kirabika nga ekiri nti Democratic Party ya Mao teyagala kwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi oba nga tekolagana nakyo mu ngeri yonna.

translation.en: Mao had said after the Inter Party Corporation meeting that Democratic Party was up to exploring the form.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'olusisinkana olwo n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyofuzi Mao yagamba nti Democratic Party yali egezaako okunoonya engeri z'okukolamu emirimu.

translation.en: The Mao group wants to field their own presidential candidate but can cooperate with the Inter Party Corporation on other areas.
translation.lug: Ekibinja kya Mao kyagala kusimbawo omuntu waakyo avuganye ku Bwapulezidenti olwo kikwatagane n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi mu bifo ebirala.

translation.en: Mao also said he supports the Inter Party Corporation position to have the current Electoral Commission changed.
translation.lug: Mao era yagamba nti akkaanya n'eky'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi okukyusa engeri ebyobufuzi gye bikolebwamu.

translation.en: Musumba said this was Mao's trick to hinder the IPC from considering the option of accepting the other Democratic Party faction.
translation.lug: Musumba yagamba nti kano kaali kakodyo ka kiwayi kya Mao okulaba ng'omukago gwa IPC tegulowooza ku kya kukkirirza kwegattibwako kiwayi kya Democratic Party ekirala.

translation.en: However Mathias Nsubuga, the secretary general of the Mao Democratic Party, said it's the Inter Party Corporation who invited them for a meeting.
translation.lug: Wabula Mathias Nsubuga, ssaabawandisi wa Democratic Party, yagambye nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi nti gwayitibwa mu lukungaana.

translation.en: Musumba removed Nsubuga's claim.
translation.lug: Musumba yamazeewo Nsubuga by'ayogera.

translation.en: She said Mao's group came for other reasons other than the invitation because they had long ignored it.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti ekiwayi kya Mao kyajja lwa nsonga ndala ezitali ku kuyitibwa kubanga baali baludde nga bagyewala.

translation.en: Some members of the Inter Party Corporation say they have put on hold the decision to accept one Democratic Party group.
translation.lug: Bammemba abamu ab'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi bagamba nti baayimirizza eky'okusalawo ku kukkiriza okuyingiza ekimu ki biwayi bya Democratic Party.

translation.en: Dr Frank Nabwiso believes the two groups can reconcile.
translation.lug: Dr Frank Nabwiso alina okukkiriza nti ebiwayi ebibiri bisobola okutabagana.

translation.en: But the Lubega faction is looking at admission into the Inter Party Corporation rather than reconcile with the Mao group.
translation.lug: Naye ekiwayi kya Lubega kiruubirira bukulembeze bw'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi so si kutabagana n'ekibinja kya Mao.

translation.en: In an interview with Lubega before Mbale conference early this year, his position on joining Inter Party Corporation was the same as Mao's.
translation.lug: Mu mboozi ey'akafubo ne Lubega eyaliwo nga ttabamiruka w'e Mbale tannabaawo, endowooza ye ku kwegatta ku IPC yali y'emu ng'eya Mao.

translation.en: The Democratic Party would not join the Inter party Cooperation because the party always lost their members in such unions.
translation.lug: Democratic party si yakwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina kubanga ekibiina kizze kiviibwako bammemba bakyo mu mikago ng'egyo.

translation.en: Observers say he was one sided to take his Democratic Party camp into the 2011 elections without the backing of other opposition parties.
translation.lug: Abatunuulizi b'ensonga bagamba nti yalina kyekubiira okutwala enkambi ye eya Democratic Party mu kulonda kwa 2011 nga tasembeddwa bibiina by'oludda oluvuganya ebirala.

translation.en: They were also facing a lot of pressure from the Mao group.
translation.lug: Era baali basanga okunyigirizibwa kungi nnyo okuva mu kibinja kya Mao.

translation.en: The Mao group ignored reconciliation with the Lubega group.
translation.lug: Ekibinja kya Mao kyesamba okutabagana n'ekibinja kya Lubega.

translation.en: Nsubuga said that court declared Mao the lawful leader of the Democratic Party.
translation.lug: Nsubuga yagambye nti kkooti yalangiridde Mao ng'omukulembeze wa Dmocratic Party mu mateeka.

translation.en: He says the Lubega group must succumb to Mao, who was elected in the Mbale Delegates Conference.
translation.lug: Agamba nti ekibinja kya Lubega kirina okugondera Mao eyalondeddwa mu lukiiko ttabamiruka e Mbale .

translation.en: Both Democratic Party groups have been holding similar activities since the Mbale conference.
translation.lug: Ebibinja bya Democratic Party byombi bibadde bikola emirimu gye gimu okuva lwe byava mu lukiiko e Mbale.

translation.en: Mukasa Mbidde told the Independent that they asked the police to block the meeting of the Lubega's group in Nsambya Sharing Hall.
translation.lug: Mukasa Mbidde yagambye Independent nti baasaba poliisi okulemesa olukungaana lw'ekibinja kya Lubega ku Nsambya Sharing Hall.

translation.en: According to the Independent issue on August 27- September 02, 2010, Mubatsi reported, Mao seeks to work with the Inter Party Cooperation.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent eyafulumizibwa nga 27 Ogwomunaana okutuka Ogwomwenda nga 02, 2010, Mubatsi yagamba nti Mao anoonya kukolagana n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina.

translation.en: The Inter Party Cooperation brings together five opposition parties.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina gugatta wamu ebibiina ebitaano ebiri ku ludda oluvuganya.

translation.en: Four of the five parties nominated their candidates except Uganda People's Congress.
translation.lug: Ebibiina bina ku bitaano byasunsula abeesimbyewo ng'oggyeko Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: The Ugandan People's Congress, the third largest opposition party in parliament, did not attend the nominations at Kololo Airstrip.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress, ekibiina ekyokusatu mu bunene mu paalamenti, tekyetaba mu kusunsula ku kisaawe ky'ennyonyi e Kololo.

translation.en: The nomination was extended to August 23 to give Uganda People's Congress time to nominate its candidate, but the deadline elapsed.
translation.lug: Okusunsula kwayongezebwayo okutuka nga 23 Ogwomunaana okuwa Uganda People's Congress obudde okusunsula abantu baayo naye ssalessale yayitako.

translation.en: This time Otunnu pointed out unresolved issues under the Inter Party Cooperation arrangement which must be sorted out first.
translation.lug: Omulundi guno Otunnu yanokoddeyo ensonga ezitannakolwako wansi w'enteekateeka z'omukago ogutaba ebibiina ezirina okusooka okukolwako.

translation.en: It's not the pending arrest of Otunnu that had prevented the Uganda People's Congress from nominating its candidate to Inter Party Cooperation.
translation.lug: Okusibwa kwa Otunnu si kwe kwagana Uganda People's Congress okusunsula abantu baayo okwegatta ku mukago ogutaba ebibiina.

translation.en: It provided practical coverage for growing conflicts within the Inter Party Congress.
translation.lug: Kyateekawo engeri y'okugonjoolamu obukuubagano mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina.

translation.en: The Inter Party Congress will nominate the joint candidate on August 31.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina gujja kusunsula abeesimbyewo okuva mu bibiina eby'enjawulo nga 31 Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: There is a strong feeling that the Inter Party Cooperation is being run mainly by the Federation of Democratic Change.
translation.lug: Waliwo okukkiriza kwa maanyi nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina gusinga kuddukanyizibwa Federation of Democratic Change.

translation.en: The UPC says the Federation of Democratic Change is running Inter Party Cooperation activities without involving the other participating parties.
translation.lug: UPC egamba nti Federation of Democratic Change eddukanya emirimu gy'omukago ogutaba ebibiina awatali kwetabyamu bibiina birala ebirimu.

translation.en: Sources within the Ugandan People's Congress say that the party wants Otunnu to be the Inter Party Congress joint candidate.
translation.lug: Ensonda okuva mu Ugandan People's Congress zigamba nti ekibiina kyagala Otunnu avuganye ku bwa mmemba bw'omukago ogutaba ebibiina.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress supported the Democratic Party's Paul Ssemogerere in the first interparty union in 1996 and Kizza Besigye in 2001.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress yawagira Paul Ssemwogerere owa Democratic Party mu kwegatta kw'ebibiina okwasooka mu 1996 ne Kizza Besigye mu 2001.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress will not settle for anything short of Otunnu being the automatic Inter Party Cooperation flag bearer.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress tejja kuwummula okutuusa nga Otunnu alondeddwa okukulembera omukago ogutaba ebibiina

translation.en: They would rather quit the Inter Party Cooperation arrangement and contest in 2011 as a party rather than an alliance.
translation.lug: Waakiri bava muntekateka z'omukago ogutaba ebibiina ne beesimbawo mu 2011 ng'ekibiina okusinga okwegatta awamu.

translation.en: They say Otunnu's cabinet is completely against their leader.
translation.lug: Bagamba nti kabinenti ya Otunnu ewakanyiza ddala omukulembeze waabwe.

translation.en: It was set up by the Uganda People's Congress.
translation.lug: Kyatandikibwawo Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: The rejection of the Electoral Commission was advanced by Olara Otunu.
translation.lug: Okugaana kw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kwayogerwako Olara Otunu.

translation.en: The Forum for Democratic Change has since diverted it into pretending it was their idea.
translation.lug: Forum for Democratic Change okuva olwo yakyusa nga yeeyisaako nti kyali kirowozo kyayo.

translation.en: Why did they take part in the elections even though they knew that the Electoral Commission was for the National Resistance Movement?
translation.lug: Lwaki beetaba mu kulonda ng'ate baali bakimanyi nti akakiiko k'ebyokulonda ka National Resistance Movement?

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress participated in the 2006 elections as well, which were presided over by the same Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress yeetaba ne mu kulonda okwa 2006, okwategekebwa akakiiko k'ebyokulonda ke kamu.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress is questioning why the Forum for Democratic Change did not reject the Electoral Commission in 2006.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress yeebuuza lwaki Forum for Democratic Change teyagaana kakiiko k'ebyokulonda mu 2006.

translation.en: It's clear that the Inter Party Congress partnership was hurriedly entered without much thought into the details of how it would work.
translation.lug: Kyeraga lwatu nti okukolera awamu mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina kwapapirwa okuyingirwamu ewatali kutunuulira ngeri gye guyinza kukolamu.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress claims that it never supported the idea of a joint candidate at this stage of the elections.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress yeemulugunya nti teyawagira kirowoozo kya kuleeta muntu omu bwe kyatuka ku kulonda.

translation.en: Our initial agreement in the Inter Party Congress was that we jointly fight the political harassment and the election malpractices.
translation.lug: Okukkiriziganya kwafe okwasooka mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina kwali kulwanyisiganyiza wamu okutulugunyizibwa mu byobufuzi n'emize emibi egirabikira mu bululu.

translation.en: Without a fifty percent win Museveni would be forced to go for a re-run.
translation.lug: Awatali kuwangula na bitundu ataano ku kikumi Museveni yandikakiddwa okuddamu okuvuganya.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress says the Forum for Democratic Change has changed from that position.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress egamba nti Forum for Democratic Change ekyuse okuva mu kifo ekyo.

translation.en: This hot fallout was mainly between the Forum for Democratic Change and the Uganda People's Congress.
translation.lug: Okuyomba kuno okusinga kwali wakati wa Forum for Democratic Change ne Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: When the parties came out of the meeting Otunnu made an unreal statement that the Uganda People's Congress has never said.
translation.lug: Ebibiina bwe byafuluma mu lukiiko, Otunnu yakola sitatimenti etaali ntuufu ku Uganda People's Congress gyetaayogera.

translation.en: He did not clarify whether he would submit himself for Inter Party Cooperation nominations.
translation.lug: Teyalambulula oba ng'aneetaba mu kusunsula kw'omukago ogutaba ebibiina.

translation.en: The confusion made it worse when Otunnu said he could not readily say he would be nominated by August 31.
translation.lug: Okutabulwa kweyongera Otunnu bwe yagamba nti teyali mwetegefu kusunsulwa nga 31 Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: Otunnu told the press that the Uganda People's Congress will decide accordingly after they have reviewed the Inter Party Congress decisions.
translation.lug: Otunnu yagamba bannamawulire nti Uganda People's Congress ejja kusalawo oluvannyuma lw'okulaba okusalawo kw'omukago ogutaba ebibiina.

translation.en: Lukyamuzi, Besigye and Kyanjo asked Otunnu if the Uganda People's Congress was withdrawing from the Inter Party Congress.
translation.lug: Lukyamuzi, Besigye ne Kyanjo baabuuza Otunnu oba nga Uganda People's Congress yali eva mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina.

translation.en: They were welcomed with songs of Uganda Patriotic Movement as they took up their seats.
translation.lug: Baayanirizibwa n'ennyimba za Uganda Patriotic Movement nga bwe batuula mu bifo byabwe.

translation.en: It was the birth of the Uganda Patriotic Movement.
translation.lug: Eyo ye yali entadikwa ya Uganda Patriotic Movement

translation.en: Yoweri Museveni was the temporary chairman and vice chairman of the Military Commission.
translation.lug: Yoweri Museveni ye yali ssentebe ow'ekiseera era omumyuka wa ssentebe w'akakiiko k'amaggye.

translation.en: These people, together with many others, found themselves unable to join either the Uganda People's Congress or the Democratic Party.
translation.lug: Abantu bano n'abalala bangi beesanga nga tebasobola kwegatta ku Uganda People's Congress oba ku Democratic Party.

translation.en: Museveni warned that the Ugandan people are fed up with dictatorship and are now concerned about a disciplined democracy.
translation.lug: Museveni yalabula nti Bannayuganda bakooye obwannakyemalira era kati bafa nnyo ku demokolasiya owempisa.

translation.en: The Uganda Patriotic Movement includes groups like the Front for National Salvation which fought Amin for eight years.
translation.lug: Uganda Patriotic Movement erimu ebibinja nga Front for National Salvation ekyalwanyisa Amin okumala emyaka munaana.

translation.en: Museveni warned that anyone who has the ambition of becoming a dictator in Uganda would be pushed out.
translation.lug: Museveni yalabula nti omuntu yenna alina ekiruubirirwa ky'okufuuka nnakyemalira mu Uganda ajja kusindiikirizibwa.

translation.en: The categories laid down by Mozambican freedom fighters for their grades as criminals used by the freedom fighters against their colleagues.
translation.lug: Engeri ez'enjawulo ezaateekebwawo ba Mozambican Freedom Fighters mu kubinjawaza emisango egikozesebwa abalwanirizi b'eddembe ku bannaabwe.

translation.en: Museveni declared amidst a laughter, that the question does not arise because Obote is welcome to join the movement.
translation.lug: Musseveni yalangirira nga bw'aseka, nti ekibuuzo tekituukawo olw'okuba nti Obote ayanirizibwa mu mugendo.

translation.en: Museveni stressed that membership is open to all.
translation.lug: Museveni yakikaatiriza nti obwammemba buggule eri buli muntu.

translation.en: He said that cleanliness in leadership is one of the rarest commodities in Uganda.
translation.lug: Agamba nti obwerufu mu bukulembeze kye kyamaguzi ekisinga obutalabika mu Uganda.

translation.en: The Uganda Patriotic Movement supports a mixed economy.
translation.lug: Uganda Patriotic Movement ewagira ebyenfuna ebyesigamiziddwa ku bintu ebingi.

translation.en: Museveni added that by capitalism, he did not mean those people who sell toilet paper and therefore call themselves capitalists.
translation.lug: Museveni yagaseeko nti okugamba abagala enyo ensimbi yabadde tategeza abo abatunda ebikookooma ebizungu era n'olwekyo abayita abaagazi b'ensimbi.

translation.en: Ugandans need to start manufacturing.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda beetaaga okutandika okufulumya.

translation.en: A man called Museveni was just an importer of shoes while another, Kasaija wanted to start producing shoes in Uganda.
translation.lug: Omusajja ayitibwa Museveni yali musuubuzi wa ngatto ate ye omulala, Kasaija yali ayagala kutandika kukola ngatto mu Uganda.

translation.en: The movement would encourage Kasaija because of the multiplier effect his enterprise would have on the economy.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kijja kuzzaamu Kasaija amaanyi olw'amagezi amangi galina mu kutandikawo emirimu egivaamu ensimbi mu ggwanga.

translation.en: It developed Europe from a backward old continent to a scientific economy.
translation.lug: Kyatumbula Europe okuva ku ssemazinga eyali obubi ennyo okutuka ku ssemazinga atambulira ku ssaayansi.

translation.en: Museveni said that the Uganda Patriotic Movement's differences with the Democratic Party are historical.
translation.lug: Museveni yagamba nti enjawukana za Uganda Patriotic Movement ne Democratic Party za byafaayo.

translation.en: The Democratic Party is identified with some social groups and continues to have this image even now.
translation.lug: Democratic Party erabibwa ng'ekibiina ky'abantu abava awamu era esigala ng'erina ekifaananyi kino na kati.

translation.en: We supported the Uganda National Liberation Front because it covered us up.
translation.lug: Twawagira Uganda National Liberation Front kubanga yatutaasa.

translation.en: Some of us belonged to the Uganda People's Congress.
translation.lug: Abamu ku ffe twali ba Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: The acting chairman of the Uganda Patriotic Movement concluded the meeting.
translation.lug: Akola nga ssentebe wa Uganda Patriotic Movement yakomekkereza olukiiko.

translation.en: Museveni warns of war in case the elections are rigged.
translation.lug: Museveni alabula ku lutalo singa obululu bubbibwa.

translation.en: Otuunu said the Uganda people's Congress has no problem whatsoever with the Inter Party Cooperation processes taking their course.
translation.lug: Otunnu agamba nti Uganda People's Congress terina buzibu bwonna n'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi mu kugenda maaso

translation.en: Besigye, the Inter Party Cooperation chairperson, said the standoff had been caused by poor communication between the cooperating parties.
translation.lug: Besigye, ssentebe w'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi, yagamba nti obuzibu buno bwaava ku mpuliziganya embi wakati w'ebibiina ebiriwo.

translation.en: Besigye said, there was a problem of communication that led to people coming up with different perceptions.
translation.lug: Besigye agamba nti waaliwo obuzibu mu mpuliziganya ekyaviirako abantu okufuna endowooza ez'enjawulo.

translation.en: This means the issues were not resolved in the meeting, which had been meant to bring the Uganda People's Congress back on board.
translation.lug: Kino kitegeeza nti ensonga tezaagonjoolwa mu lukiiko, olwali luteekeddwa okutabaganya Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: Besigye insisted they had discussions and drawn up a road map to follow in choosing a presidential flag bearer on August 31.
translation.lug: Besigye yalemerako nti baakubaganya ebirowoozo era ne bakola enteekateeka ez'okugoberera mu kulonda abanaakwata bendera ku bwa pulezidenti nga 31 Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: According to the independent published on August 27  2010, Asiimwe wrote that the head of common wealth observer team is in Rwanda.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku lupapula lwa Independent olwafuluma mu gwomunaana nga 27 2010 Asiimwe yawandiika nti omukulu w'abatunuulizi okuva mu nsi eziri wansi w'omukago gw'abazungu ali mu Rwanda.

translation.en: Herbert Otuao rose and received him like a gentleman.
translation.lug: Herbert Otuao yasituka n'amwaniriza nga omwami.

translation.en: The South African Shiraz wouldn't be a bad idea.
translation.lug: Omwenge gw'emizabbibu gya South Africa tekyandibadde kirowoozo kibi.

translation.en: How much do Range Rovers cost?
translation.lug: Range Rover zigulwa ssente mmeka?

translation.en: The independent issue of August 27-September 02, 2010, was reported by Nathan Kiwere.
translation.lug: Ensonga ya Independent owa nga 27 Ogwomunaana okutuuka nga 02 Ogwomwenda 2010, yasakibwa Nathan Kiwere.

translation.en: The exhibition was organized under the sponsorship of the plan of the Year of Peace and Security in Africa and the African Union.
translation.lug: Omwoleso gwategekebwa wansi w'okuvujjirirwa kw'enteekateeka y'omwaka gw'emirembe n'obukuumi mu Africa ne mu African Union.

translation.en: The United Nations Development Fund for Women declared that, it widely accepts violence against women has penerated in all African countries.
translation.lug: Ekitongole ky'amawanga amagatte ekivujjirira enkulaakulana y'abakyala kyalangiridde nti, kikkiriza nti abakyala batulugunyizibwa nti era kati kituuse mu mawanga ga Afirika gonna.

translation.en: In the Democratic Republic of Congo close to one thousand one hundred rapes are being reported each month.
translation.lug: Mu Democratic Republic of Congo emisango egy'okukabasanya egikunukkiriza mu lukumi mu kikumi giroopeebwa mu buli mwezi.

translation.en: More than three million girls in Africa are at risk of female private part cutting annually.
translation.lug: Abawala abasoba mu bukadde busatu mu Afirika bali mu katyabaga k'okusalwako ebitundu by'ekyama buli mwaka.

translation.en: In rural Ethiopia fifty nine percent of married women have experienced sexual violence by their partner.
translation.lug: Mu byalo bya Ethiopia, abakyala abafumbo ebitundu ataano mu mwenda ku kikumi batuusiddwako baganzi baabwe obuliisamaanyi.

translation.en: In Africa, between sixteen and forty seven percent of girls in primary or secondary school report sexual abuse from male teachers.
translation.lug: Mu Afirika, abawala wakati w'ebitundu kkumi na mukaaga n'ana mu musanvu ku kikumi mu masomero ga pulayimale oba ag'asekendule bakabassanyizibwa abasomesa abasajja.

translation.en: Women make up almost fifty seven percent of adults living with HIV in Sub Saharan Africa.
translation.lug: Abakazi kumpi bakola ebitundu ataano mu musanvu ku kikumi ku bantu abakulu abalina akawuka ka mukenenya mu Sub Saharan Africa.

translation.en: Across Africa women and girls are regularly subjected to sexual harassment and rape in streets, public transport and in their own homes.
translation.lug: Okwetoolola Afirika abakazi n'abawala batera okukabassanyizibwa n'okusobezebwako ku nguudo, mu ntambula ey'olukale ne mu maka gaabwe.

translation.en: The exhibition was on display from 19 to 25 July, 2010, in Munyonyo Resort as a side event from the African Union Assembly.
translation.lug: Omwoleso gwaliyo okuva nga 19 okutuuka nga 25 Ogwomusanvu, 2010, ku Munyonyo Resort ng'ekintu eky'emabbali ekitali kya African Union Assembly.

translation.en: According to the independent issue of August 27 - September 02, 2010, most decisions made by drivers are based on a blockage of the road ahead.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku nsonga ya Independent owa nga 27 Ogwomunaana okutuuka nga 02 Ogwomwenda 2010, okusalawo okusinga okukolebwa baddereeva esinziira ku kugala amakubo gye balaga.

translation.en: The windshield wiper blades on Joseph's car are not in good condition.
translation.lug: Obuyonja endabirwamu y'emmotoka ya Joseph tebuli mu mbeera nnungi.

translation.en: Every effort is made to ensure the advertisements in the Independent's hotlines are honest and truthful.
translation.lug: Buli maanyi agatekebwamu okulaba nti obulango bw'emitwe emikulu egya Independent gya mazima era nga mituufu.

translation.en: Mary Ochen further argued that misrepresentation is a criminal offence in Uganda.
translation.lug: Mary Ochen ayongera okugamba nti emisanga mu Uganda egiroopebwa mitono kw'egyo egikolebwa.

translation.en: Four journalists in Uganda were arrested and charged with promoting sectarianism.
translation.lug: Bannamawulire bana mu Uganda baakwatibwa ne bavunaanibwa ogw'okusaasaanya obusosoze.

translation.en: The constitutional court of Uganda was introduced by the colonial state for Independence to abolish the African demand.
translation.lug: Kkooti ya ssemateeka ya Uganda yateekebwawo abafuzi b'amatwale abalwanyisa obwetwaze okumalawo okuyaayaana kw'Abafirika.

translation.en: Bududa landslide victims are still hungry and waiting.
translation.lug: Abaakosebwa okubumbulukuka kw'ettaka e Bududa bakyali bayala era balindirira.

translation.en: Who funds National Resistance Movement party?
translation.lug: Ani avujjirira ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement?

translation.en: There was a price war in the telecom sector as Kenya cuts call rates.
translation.lug: Waaliwo olutalo lw'emiwendo mu byempuliziganya nga Kenya esaze ebisale by'okukuba essimu.

translation.en: Kagame talked about his victory and political oppression.
translation.lug: Kagame yayogedde ku buwanguzi bwe n'okutulugunyizibwa mu byobufuzi.

translation.en: What is the future freedom of Uganda?
translation.lug: Ebiseera by'eddembe lya Uganda eby'omu maso biri bitya?

translation.en: Those found to possess seditious material without a lawful excuse face three years in jail.
translation.lug: Abo abasangibwa n'ebintu ebisikiriza nga tebayise mu mateeka basibwa emyaka esatu mu kkomera.

translation.en: Dr George Lugalambi is the head of the Mass communication department at Makerere University.
translation.lug: Dr. George Lugalambi y'akulira ekitongole kya Mass communication ku ssettendekero ya Makerere.

translation.en: Unlike the time when President Museveni could not intervene in staff issues, this is now the case.
translation.lug: Okuggyako ekiseera Pulezidenti Museveni kyeyali tasobola kuyingirira mu nsonga za bakozi, eno kati y'ensonga.

translation.en: Mangu is just one of over eight thousand people that were left homeless by the mudslides.
translation.lug: Mangu y'omu ku bantu abasoba mu kanaana abaalekebwa nga tebalina we basula olw'amataba.

translation.en: Eighty nine people were killed and more than three thousand are missing in the Mount Elgon Village of Nametsi.
translation.lug: Abantu kinaana mu mwenda be battibwa n'abasoba mu nkumi ssatu tebalabikako ku kyalo kya Mount Elgon e Nametsi

translation.en: At least eight thousand one hundred seventy seven Internally displaced people live in Bulucheke camp.
translation.lug: Waakiri abantu kanaana mu kikumi mu nsanvu mu musanvu abatalina we babeera basangibwa mu nkambi y'e Bulucheke.

translation.en: Kubi Rama is the deputy director at a local Non Government Organizations called Gender Links.
translation.lug: Kubi Rama y'amyuka akulira ekitongole ky'obwannakyewa ekiyitibwa Gender Links.

translation.en: Kubi sounded this call while addressing journalists at a two day workshop.
translation.lug: Kubi yakuba essimu ng'ayogerako ne bannamawulire mu lukungaana olw'ennaku ebbiri.

translation.en: According to the Independent issue of September 17-23, 2010, by Patrick Matsiko stated that the Movement was formed thirty years ago.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent owa nga 17 Ogwomunaana okutuuka nga 23, 2010, Patrick Matsiko yagamba nti omugendo gwatandikibwawo emyaka asatu emabega.

translation.en: In 1980, when it first contested elections, it was the Uganda Patriotic Movement political party.
translation.lug: Mu 1980, lwe kyasooka okuvuganya mu kulonda kyali kiyitibwa Uganda Patriotic Movement Political Party.

translation.en: Unlike Museveni, Eriya Kategaya, Amanya Mushega, Amama Mbabazi, Bidandi Ssali nolonger hold the same position they did 30 years ago.
translation.lug: Ng'oggyeko Museveni, Eriya Kategaya, Amanya Mushega, Amama Mbabazi ne Bidandi Ssali tebakyalina kifo kye kimu kye baalina emyaka asatu emabega.

translation.en: So does Ruhakana Rugunda.
translation.lug: Ne Ruhakana Rugunda naye bw'atyo.

translation.en: This means that the survival of National Resistance Movement depends on the existence of Museveni.
translation.lug: Kino kitegeeza nti okubeerawo kw'ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement kwesigamiziddwa ku kubeerawo kwa Museveni.

translation.en: There are no permanent interests that hold the Movement together apart from the worship of Museveni's personality.
translation.lug: Tewali bigendererwa bya lubeerera ebikuumira omugendo awamu okuggyako okugulumiza Museveni ng'omuntu.

translation.en: The things that held the Movement together from 1980 to 1986 have since faded away.
translation.lug: Ebintu ebyali bikuumira ekibiina awamu okuva mu 1980 okutuuka mu 1986 okuva olwo byaseebengerera.

translation.en: President Museveni justified his 1981 rebellion because Milton Obote cheated in the 1980 elections
translation.lug: Pulezidenti Museveni yawagira olutalo lwe yakola mu 1981 kubanga Milton Obote yabba mu kulonda kwa 1980.

translation.en: Milton Obote did this by using violence and intimidation against the opposition.
translation.lug: Milton Obote yakola kino nga akozesa efujjo wamu n'okutiisatiisa ab'oludda oluvuganya.

translation.en: During his 25 year rule as president, the National Resistance Movement has failed to organise free and fair elections.
translation.lug: Mu myaka abiri mu etaano gy'amaze ng'afuga nga pulezidenti, ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement kiremereddwa okutegeka akalulu ak'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: The first presidential elections were held in 1996 ten years after he captured power in 1986.
translation.lug: Akalulu k'obwapulezidenti akaasooka kaaliwo mu 1996 emyaka kkumi oluvannyuma ye okuwamba obuyinza mu 1986.

translation.en: During the election campaign, Museveni released his opponent, Paul Ssemogerere, who had no counterpart in the Great Lakes region.
translation.lug: Mu biseera by'okunoonya akalulu, Museveni yata amuvuganya Paul Ssemogerere ataalina gwakolagana naye mu bitundu ebyetooloddwa ennyanja.

translation.en: In 2001, this political defeat led to the birth of a second Movement called the Reform Agenda.
translation.lug: Mu 2001, okuwangulwa mu byobufuzi kuno kwaviirako okutondebwawo kw'omugendo ogwokubiri ogwayitibwanga Reform Agenda.

translation.en: The second Movement comprised of deserters from the first Movement who were disgusted by the narrowing democratic space.
translation.lug: Omugendo ogwokubiri gwalimu abo abaava mu mugendo ogwasooka abaali beetamidwa okunyigirizibwa.

translation.en: It was led by Dr Kizza Besigye, a retired colonel who had formerly served as National Resistance Movement's national political supervisor.
translation.lug: Kyali kikulemberwa Dr. Kizza Besigye kkano eyawummula eyali yaweerezaako mu National Resistance Movement ng'omutunuulizi w'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: The Forum for Democratic Change also comprised other former National Resistance Movement members.
translation.lug: Forum for Democratic Change nayo yalimu abaaliko bammemba ba National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: The Reform Agenda was contesting power in the 2001 elections.
translation.lug: Reform Agenda yali erwanira buyinza mu kulonda kwa 2001.

translation.en: Besigye fled the country for four years and many of his supporters were also harrased out of the country.
translation.lug: Besigye yafuluma eggwanga okumala emyaka ena era n'abawagizi be bangi nabo baatulugunyizibwa wabweru w'eggwanga.

translation.en: Besigye returned in 2005 for a second battle with Museveni and by 2006, the second Movement had grown in number and strength.
translation.lug: Besigye yakomawo mu 2005 ku lutalo olwokubiri ne Museveni era mu 2006 omugendo ogwokubiri gwali guwezezza abantu n'amaanyi.

translation.en: The dissatisfied National Resistance Movement candidates had become discontented under the manner in which the 2006 election had been held.
translation.lug: Aba National Resistance Movement abeesimbawo tebaali bamativu n'engeri okulonda kwa 2006 gye kwakolebwamu.

translation.en: They claimed that the NRM 2006 party primaries had been rigged and decided to contest the general elections as independent candidates.
translation.lug: Beemulugunya nti akamyufu ka NRM aka 2006 kaali kabiddwa era ne basalawo bavuganye mu kalulu ka bonna ku bwa nnamunigina.

translation.en: They remained loyal to the National Resistance Movement once they succeeded on individual merit.
translation.lug: Baasigala bagondera National Resistance Movement kasita baayitiramu ku busobozi bwabwe nga ssekinoomu.

translation.en: About ninety five percent of the thirty seven independent Members of Parliament are connected to the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Ebitundu ebikunukiriza kyenda mu bitaano ku kikumi ku babaka ba Paalamenti asatu mu musanvu abeesimbawo ku bwa nnamunigina balina akakwate ku National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: A common political front challenged the National Resistance Movement existing condition.
translation.lug: Ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ekimanyikiddwa kyawakanyizza embeera National Resistance Movement gy'erimu.

translation.en: They cannot stand up as a force to challenge Museveni for the state power today.
translation.lug: Tebasobola kuvaayo nga eggye okuvuganya Museveni ku buyinza leero.

translation.en: There was recent chaos in the National Resistance Movement primaries.
translation.lug: Waaliwo obuvuyo mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: They are cursing the National Resistance Movement for messing up the election.
translation.lug: Bakolimira National Resistance Movement olw'okutabangula okulonda.

translation.en: As long as they are benefiting personally under the National Resistance Movement, they are willing to tolerate the rot and remain loyal.
translation.lug: Kasita baba nga baganyulwa mu National Resistance Movement, beteefuteefu okukkiriza buli kimu n'okusigala nga beesimu.

translation.en: And for that reason Museveni and the National Resistance Movement will not treat them harshly.
translation.lug: N'olwensonga eyo Museveni ne National Resistance Movement tebajja kubayisa bubi.

translation.en: Democratic free and fair elections have never been a value dearly and deeply held by the National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya tekubeerangako kwa mugaso era tekutegekebwangako National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: It has only been used to give the National Resistance Movement a democratic face in the public.
translation.lug: Kikozeseddwa bukozesebwa okulaga abantu nti National Resistance Movement essa ekitiibwa mu mateeka.

translation.en: That's why it has been easy for the National Resistance Movement to abandon the 1980 promise of free and fair elections.
translation.lug: Eyo y'ensonga lwaki kibadde kyangu National Resistance Movement obutatuukiriza kisuubizo kyayo ekya 1980 eky'akalulu ak'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: One of the values to which the National Resistance Movement has not withdrawn on is, joining of power.
translation.lug: Ebimu ku bintu lwaki National Resistance Movement tevuddeko kwe kugatta obuyinza.

translation.en: They pursued it as a matter of life and death through the bush war in 1981.
translation.lug: Baagitwala ng'ensonga y'obulamu n'okufa mu lutalo lw'omunsiko mu 1981.
