translation.en: The events in the recent National Resistance Movement primaries, Museveni did not go to the bush to fight Milton Obote for rigging elections.
translation.lug: Ebikolebwa kati mu kulonda kw'akamyufu National Resistance Movement, Museveni teyagenda mu nsiko okulwanyisa Milton Obote olw'okubba obululu.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement party has a chaos and selfish history.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kya National Resistance Movement kirina obuvuyo n'ekyafaayo ky'okweyagaliza kyokka.

translation.en: According to Andrew Mwenda, Besigye is right compared to Otunnu.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Andrew Mwena, Besigye mutuufu bw'omugeraageranya ku Otunnu.

translation.en: Besigye shares a similar feeling but believes that the demand for electoral reform should be incidential.
translation.lug: Besigye alina endowooza y'emu wabula akkiriza nti obwetaavu bw'enkyukakyuka mu kulonda bulina kuba bwa mbagirawo.

translation.en: I agree with Otunnu in principle but side with Besigye on the matter of practical politics.
translation.lug: Nzikiriziganya ne Otunnu mu buntu wabula ate nzikiriziganya ne Besigye mu nsonga z'ebyobufuzi.

translation.en: Otunnu does not appreciate the hard choices the opposition is faced with.
translation.lug: Otunnu tasiima okusalawo okuzibu oludda oluvuganya kwe lusanga.

translation.en: The opposition will now have a platform to register its grievances and demands before the wider Ugandan public.
translation.lug: Oludda oluvuganya kati lujja kuba n'oluwenda okulaga obutali bumativu bwalwo n'ebyetaago byalwo nga tebinnatuuka eri Bannayuganda.

translation.en: It will give President Museveni an opportunity to run a one man show.
translation.lug: Kijja kuwa pulezidenti Museveni omukisa obutavuganyizibwa.

translation.en: I often find most freedom and accountability activists in Uganda missing in this important communication.
translation.lug: Emirundi egisinga eddembe n'abalwanirizi b'eddembe mu Uganda bafiirwa okuwuliziganya okulungi

translation.en: I made this point during the Temangalo debate.
translation.lug: Nayogera ku nsonga eno mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku Temangalo.

translation.en: The procurement process in the National Social Security Fund was full of changes.
translation.lug: Enteekateeka y'okugula ebintu mu National Social Security Fund yali ejjudde okukyusibwa

translation.en: It was better to hold the fund to account for delivering five thousand cheap houses in Temangalo and hang Amama Mbabazi later.
translation.lug: Kyali kisingako okulindako okussa ssente ku akaawunti ez'okuwaayo ku mayumba enkumi ttaano aga layisi e Temangalo oluvannyuma Amama Mbabazi awanikibwe.

translation.en: The naive and emotional gossiping classes of Kampala were swayed by their personal desires.
translation.lug: Abatalina kye bamanyi n'abengambo mu Kampala buzunga nga beenoonyeza byabwe.

translation.en: We lost both ways, the project failed and Mbabazi was not punished.
translation.lug: Twafiirwa mu ngeri zombi, pulojekiti yafa ne Mbabazi teyabonerezebwa.

translation.en: Uganda's opposition has huge technological and economic opportunities that it can build on to defeat Museveni.
translation.lug: Oludda oluvuganya mu Uganda lulina tekinologiya n'ebyenfuna bingi bye lusobola okukozesa okuwangula Museveni.

translation.en: The opposition has grown its base from twenty four percent of the vote in 1996 to forty one percent in the last election.
translation.lug: Oludda oluvuganya lwongedde ku bululu okuva ku bitundu abiri mu bina ku kikumi mu 1996 okutuuka ku bitundu ana mu kimu ku kikumi mu kulonda okuwedde.

translation.en: Uganda should have a perfect election process.
translation.lug: Uganda erina okuba n'okulonda okulungi ennyo.

translation.en: Karl Popper in his book, Conjectures and Refutations, offered the best insight.
translation.lug: Karl Popper mu kitabo kye, Conjectures and Refutations, yaggyayo amakulu agasinga.

translation.en: It is unlikely that Uganda can get a free and fair election today.
translation.lug: Si kyangu nti Uganda esobola okubeera n'akalulu ak'amazima n'obwenkanya leero.

translation.en: Otunnu had a passionate desire with digging out the past of Luwero and the Northern War.
translation.lug: Otunnu yalina obwagazi bw'okumalawo ebyali bimanyiddwa ku Luwero n'olutalo lw'omu bukiikakkono.

translation.en: America was involved in an endless debate on slavery.
translation.lug: America yeenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okutakoma ku buddu.

translation.en: Majority of Ugandan voters are between the ages of eighteen and thirty.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda abalonzi abasinga bali wakati w'emyaka kkumi na munaana n'asatu.

translation.en: They were too young to care about what happened in Luwero.
translation.lug: Baali bato nnyo okufaayo kw'ebyo ebyaliwo e Luwero.

translation.en: Making Luwero an electoral issue in 2010 meant discussing issues that interest 1% of voters.
translation.lug: Okufuula Luwero ensonga y'ebyokulonda mu 2010 kyategeeza kuteesa nsonga ezisikiriza 1% ez'abalonzi.

translation.en: People in northern Uganda have suffered a million and one injustices under Museveni's rule.
translation.lug: Abantu mu Bukiikakkono bwa Uganda babonyeebonye n'obutali bw'enkanya emirundi akakadde kamu wansi w'obukulembeze bwa Museveni.

translation.en: Andrew Mwenda is the founder and owner of the independent news magazine.
translation.lug: Andrew Mwenda ye mutandisi era nannyini magazini ya Independent news.

translation.en: Joseph Ocheng is a Ugandan journalist born in Kotido district, nothern Uganda.
translation.lug: Joseph Ocheng munnamawulire munnayuganda eyazaalibwa mu disitulikiti y'e Kotido mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.

translation.en: Otunnu does not seem to understand the difficult choices to be made by the opposition.
translation.lug: Otunnu alabika obutategeera kusalawo kuzibu oludda oluvuganya kwe lulina okukola.

translation.en: According to the Independent issue of September 17-23, 2010, Mubatsi stated that election chaos threatened to obstruct the NRM primaries.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent ensonga z'omwezi Gwomwenda 17-23 2010, Mubatsi yagamba nti obukuubagano mu by'okulonda byatiisa okulemesa akamyufu ka NRM

translation.en: Gideon Badagamawa, an expert on environment and natural resources, explains that plastic is non biodegradable hence affets soils.
translation.lug: Gideon Badagamawa, omukugu mu byobutonde bw'ensi, annyonnyola nti ebintu ebya pulasitiika tebivunda nga n'olw'ekyo bikosa ettaka.

translation.en: Badagamawa says over fifty percent imports of food come to Africa, not because we cannot produce food but because our soils have degenerated because they are chocked with plastics.
translation.lug: Badagamawa agamba nti emmere etundibwa mu Afirika esukka mu bitundu ataano ku kikumi, sso lwa nsonga nti tetusobola kwerimira mmere wabula kubanga ettaka lyaffe liddiridde olw'okwonoonebwa ebintu ebya pulaasitiika.

translation.en: Badagamawa says that well managed recycling programs can reduce pollution.
translation.lug: Badagamawa agamba nti enteekateeka y'okusaanuusa ebintu ekendeeza ku butonde okwonooneka.

translation.en: In poor countries like Uganda, reducing plastic usage is not an easy task.
translation.lug: Mu mawanga amaavu nga Uganda, okukendeeza okukozesa ebyapulaasitiika si mulimu mwangu.

translation.en: Uganda manufactures warned that banning plastics, which are largely used for packaging, would increase costs of production.
translation.lug: Abakola ebyamaguzi mu Uganda baalabula nti okuwera ebintu ebya pulaasitiika ebisinga okukozesebwa kusabika ebyamaguzi kyandifuula okufulumya ebyamaguzi okw'obuseere.

translation.en: It would also increase prices of consumer goods.
translation.lug: Era kyandirinnyisa n'emiwendo abantu kwe bagulira ebyamaguzi.

translation.en: Uganda Plastic Manufacturers and Recycling Association intend to continue to lobby the government for support.
translation.lug: Uganda Plastic Manufacturers and Recycling Association biruubirira okwongera okusaba gavumenti okukiyambako.

translation.en: Lukwiya revealed that Acaye Ecomog sent his six children to government and is being urged to come out and look after his children.
translation.lug: Lukwiya yagamba nti Acaye Ecomog yasindika abaana be omukaaga eri Gavumenti kyokka era akoowoolwa okuvaayo alabirire abaana be.

translation.en: Lotiba was instructed to deploy soldiers to attack Sudan People's Liberation Army camps and loot food.
translation.lug: Lotiba yalagirwa okuyiwa abasirikale okulumba enkambi z'eggye lya Sudan People's Liberation Army balinyageyo emmere.

translation.en: Otti claimed that he checked the area where he got in contact with Uganda Peoples Defence Forces.
translation.lug: Otti agamba nti yakebedde ekifo we yakwataganira n'eggye lya Uganda erya Uganda Peoples Defence Forces.

translation.en: Otti bragged that Uganda Peoples Defence Forces has paid him salary indirectly.
translation.lug: Otti yeewaana nti Uganda Peoples Defence Forces emusasudde okusaala mu ngeri etali ya mu mpeke.

translation.en: Otti suspected Okulu's squad to be the one which attacked a location in Madi.
translation.lug: Otti yateebereza nti ekibinja kya Okulu kye kyalumba enkambi y'e Madi.

translation.en: Lukwiya reported that Okulu Ben met Labongo and they separated some days back.
translation.lug: Lukwiya yagamba nti Okulu Ben yasisinkana ne Labongo ne baawukana mu nnaku eziyise emabega.

translation.en: Kapere met Lagulu across undisclosed river today.
translation.lug: Kapere yasisinkana Lagulu ku mugga ogutamanyiddwa leero.

translation.en: Labongo reported that he is trying to meet Okuti after getting information that his and Okuti's squads met in undisclosed location.
translation.lug: Labongo yagambanti yali agezaako okusisinkana Okuti oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obubaka nti enkabi ye n'eya Okuti zaasisinkanako mu kifo ekitamanyiddwa.

translation.en: Dominic instructed Okuti to move with the entire group to join him after meeting.
translation.lug: Dominic yalagira Okuti atambule n'ekibinja kyonna bamusisinkane oluvannyuma lw'olukiiko.

translation.en: Ocan Bunia revealed that his medical condition is deteriorating and commented that he has put it in God's hands.
translation.lug: Ocan Bunia yategeezezza nti obulamu bwe bwali bugenda bukendeera n'agamba nti yali abutadde mu mikono gya Katonda.

translation.en: Angola reported to Kony that Uganda Peoples Defence Forces attacked him and among the dead is a captain.
translation.lug: Angola yaloopera Kony nti Uganda Peoples Defence Forces yamulumba n'emuttira abalwanyi omuli ne kkapiteeni.

translation.en: In reaction to Kony's orders, Angola reported clearly that he failed to control Acaye Ecomog.
translation.lug: Mu kwanukula ebiragiro bya Kony, Angola yamunnyonnyola lwatu nti yali alemeddwa okufuga Acaye Ecomog.

translation.en: The news of Acaye Ecomog and Angola's reaction to Kony's orders to command other commanders, has put Kony in another state of confusion.
translation.lug: Amawulire g'ebyakoleddwa Acaye ne Angola ku biragiro bya Kony okuduumira abaduumizi abalala kitadde Kony mu kutabulwatabulwa okulala.

translation.en: It is a big sign of loss of command and control on Kony's side.
translation.lug: Kabonero kanene akalaga nti Kony takyali mu mitambo era takyasobola kufuga mbeera.

translation.en: We expect Kony to harass and use Lukwiya as his army commander to arrest that situation.
translation.lug: Tusuubira Kony okuyisa obubi Lukwiya ng'omuduumizi we ow'amagye okukkakkanya embeera eyo.

translation.en: Kony's prescriptions to Ocan Bunia's disease looks a gamble.
translation.lug: Engeri Kony gy'annyonnyolamu endwadde ya Ocan Bunia erabika ng'ey'obulimba.

translation.en: If his commanders who are already with questionable loyalty take note of Ocan Bunia's disease, it could increase their negative attitude.
translation.lug: Singa abaduumizi be abaali batankanibwa obwesimbu bwabwe bamanya ku bulwadde bwa Ocan Bunia, kyandiyongedde ku butafaayo bwabwe.

translation.en: Uganda Peoples Defence Forces should be informed of Angola's stand, so his position could be constantly attacked to destroy his morale.
translation.lug: Uganda Peoples Defence Forces lirina okumanyisibwa ku ndowooza ya Angola, okulaba ng'endowooza ye ekolokotebwa buli kiseera akiveeko.

translation.en: UPDF propaganda desk should exploit Kony's guesswork on prescribing the various medicine for Ocan Bunia which have not worked.
translation.lug: Abatambuza abawulire agataliiko bukakafu ba UPDF balina okusaabulula ennyinyonnyola y'eddagala lya Ocan Bunia ennyingirire Kony gy'azze akozesa nga n'okukola tekola.

translation.en: Opio Makas was directed to fragment his and Lotiba's force into smaller groups to avoid Uganda Peoples Defence Forces pursuit.
translation.lug: Opio Makas ne Lotiba baalagirwa okukutula mu bibinja byabwe bufuuke obubinja obutono beewale Uganda Peoples Defence Forces okubagwa mu buwufu.

translation.en: If Makas does what he has been told, he will reach safely especially now that it is too bushy for the gunship to observe well.
translation.lug: Makas bw'akola nga bw'alagiddwa, ajja kutuuka mirembe naddala nga kati ensiko ekuze nga kizibu bamukwatammundu okulaba obulungi.

translation.en: Makas was reminded that Equatoria Defence Force are also potential enemies of Lords Resistance Army.
translation.lug: Makas yajjukiziddwa nti Equatoria Defence Force nayo yali esobola okuba omulabe wa Lords Resistance Army.

translation.en: Kony stated clearly that these days he does not trust his soldiers because their minds are mixed up and believes that's why they are escaping.
translation.lug: Kony yakyogera mu lwatu nti ennaku zino takyesiga bajaasi be kubanga endowooza zaabwe zitabuddwatabuddwa era y'ensonga lwaki batoloka.

translation.en: Lukwiya could not get Kony clearly when he asked him his plans now that Lukwiya is near the border.
translation.lug: Lukwiya teyategeera bulungi Kony bwe yamubuuza ku enteekateeka ze naddala nga Lukwiya asemberedde ensalo.

translation.en: Kony ordered Lukwiya to cross the border.
translation.lug: Kony yalagira Lukwiya okusala ensalo.

translation.en: Labongo reported that he met Okuti Okello.
translation.lug: Labongo yategeeza nti yasisinkana Okuti Okello.

translation.en: Okuti was intercepted by Uganda Peoples Defence Forces while he was coming from ambush.
translation.lug: Okuti yataataaganyizibwa Uganda Peoples Defence Forces bwe yali akomawo okuva mu bulumbaganyi.

translation.en: One of the officers who is a son of Labongo's aunt died with three others.
translation.lug: Omu ku boofiisa eyali mutabani wa ssenga wa Labongo yafa n'abalala basatu.

translation.en: Labongo narrated that Ayoli is talking on the Frequency Modulation radios.
translation.lug: Labongo yanyumya nti Ayoli ayogera ku leediyo za FM.

translation.en: Lotiba reported that he heard some gunshots about a kilometer from his location.
translation.lug: Lotiba yagamba nti yawulira ebyasi nga bibwatuka kiromita ng'emu okuva we yali.

translation.en: Uganda Peoples Defence Forces have gone back to their base.
translation.lug: Uganda Peoples Defence Forces ezzeeyo mu nkambi yaayo.

translation.en: The UPC party president Dr. Olara Otunnu announced the party's withdrawal from Interparty Cooperation on August thirtieth.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti w'ekibiina kya UPC Dr. Olara Otunnu yalangirira okuva kw'ekibiina mu omukago ogugatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi nga asatu Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: He said the Uganda People's Congress position was not to take part in an election.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti Uganda People's Congress teyali ya kwetaba mu kulonda.

translation.en: Otunnu restated this position during a media briefing last week.
translation.lug: Otunnu yaddamu okwogera ensonga y'emu bwe yali ayogerako eri bannamawulire wiiki ewedde.

translation.en: He said that there was widespread election violence in the recent National Resistance Movement primaries.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti waaliwo obumenyi bw'amateeka bungi mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Information from inside Uganda People's Congress shows that Otunnu could be facing a near riot within its own party.
translation.lug: Amawulire okuva mu nsonda ez'omunda mu Uganda People's Congress galaga nti Otunnu kirabika yalina obukuubagano bungi munda mu kibiina kye.

translation.en: Yona Kanyomoozi is a former Minister of Cooperatives and Marketing in the Obote two regime from one thousand eighty to eighty five.
translation.lug: Yona Kanyomoozi yaliko minisita w'obwegassi n'obutale mu gavumenti ya Obote eyookubiri okuva mu lukumi mu lwenda kinaana okutuuka mu kinaana mu etaano.

translation.en: He says he will stand as an independent candidate in Ntungamo in next year's elections.
translation.lug: Agamba nti ajja kwesimbawo ku bwannamunigina ku ky'omubaka wa Ntungamo mu kulonda kw'omwaka ogujja.

translation.en: Kanyomozi was also a candidate in the March Uganda People's Congress party presidential elections.
translation.lug: Kanyomozi era yavuganya ku kya Pulezidenti wa Uganda People's Congress mu kulonda okwaliwo mu Gwokusatu.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Congress withdrawal from the Inter Party Cooperation was a huge mistake which is likely to kill the party.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress okuva mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi yali nsobi nnene ekiyinza n'okusuula ekibiina.

translation.en: He says it would be yet another big error not to participate in the two thousand eleven general elections.
translation.lug: Agamba nti era yandiba ensobi ennene ssinga ekibiina tekyetaba mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi mu gumu.

translation.en: Otunnu is behaving like Obote did in one thousand nine hundred ninety four.
translation.lug: Otunnu yeeyisa nga Obote bwe yakola mu lukumi mu lwenda kyenda mu ena.

translation.en: Only five people from the Uganda People's Congress were in that assembly.
translation.lug: Bannakibiina kya Uganda People's Congress bataano bokka be baali mu lukungaana.

translation.en: Otunnu is doing what Obote did by pulling out of the Inter Party Cooperation, which is also a very big mistake.
translation.lug: Otunnu akola Obote kye yakola bwe yava mu mukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi, nga nayo nsobi nnene.

translation.en: My supporters have urged me to stand for the Ntungamo Municipality parliamentary seat and I can not let them down.
translation.lug: Abawagizi bange bansabye nneesimbewo ku kifo ky'omubaka wa Munisipaali y'e Ntungamo mu Paalamenti era sisobola kubayiwa.

translation.en: I am going to stand as an independent and as a Uganda People's Congress because that is where I belong.
translation.lug: Ngenda kwesimbawo ku bwannamunigina era ng'owa Uganda People's Congress kubanga kye kibiina mwe nva.

translation.en: Inside sources said former UPC presidential contenders Jimmy Akena, Joseph Ochieno and Henry Mayega will contest in two thousand eleven.
translation.lug: Ensonda ez'omunda zaategeezezza nti abaavuganyaako ku ky'obwapulezidenti wa UPC omuli; Jimmy Akena, Joseph Ochieno ne Henry Mayega baakuvuganya mu nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: By the time of filing this story, Ochieno was reportedly upcountry campaigning.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera emboozi eno we yamalirizibwa, kigambibwa nti Ochieno nti yali mu byalo ng'akuyega balonzi.

translation.en: Sospater Akwenyu is the chairman Uganda People's Congress Kaberamaido district.
translation.lug: Sospater Akwenyu ye ssentebe wa Uganda People's Congress mu disitulikiti y'e Kaberamaido.

translation.en: "We have another Congressman Alfred Ewatu who wants to stand so I stepped down for him," said Akwenyu.
translation.lug: Tulina munnakibiina omulala Alfred Ewatu ayagala okuvuganya, n'olw'ekyo navuddemu ne nkimulekera, Akwenyu bwe yagamba.

translation.en: Uganda People Congress will participate in the general elections or maintain its boycott stand, Akwenyu said.
translation.lug: Akwenyu yagamba nti Uganda People Congress ejja kwetaba mu kulonda kwa bonna bwe kitaba ekyo ejja kukusibira ekikookolo.

translation.en: We shall tell the people of Uganda our position when we have reached the bridge.
translation.lug: Tujja kutegeeza Bannayuganda kye tusibiddeko nga tumaze okusalawo.

translation.en: Akwenyu serves on Otunnu's cabinet.
translation.lug: Akwenyu aweereza ku kabineeti ya Otunnu.

translation.en: In the Independent last week, Otunnu said that Uganda People's Congress had encountered a fork in the road.
translation.lug: Mu Independent wa wiiki ewedde, Otunnu yategeeza nti Uganda People's Congress kyali kisanze akaseera akazibu mu kusalawo.

translation.en: Some members from Uganda People's Congress disobeyed the directive of the party President Milton Obote in one thousand nine hundred eighty nine.
translation.lug: Mu lukumi mu lwenda kinaana mu mwenda, Bammemba ba Uganda People's Congress abamu baava ku kiragiro ky'eyali Pulezidenti w'ekibiina Milton Obote.

translation.en: Two weeks after the March Uganda People's Congress party presidential elections, appointments made by Otunnu were rejected.
translation.lug: Bwe waayitawo wiiki bbiri ng'okulonda kw'ekibiina okw'okulonda Pulezidenti wa Uganda People's Congress okwa Ogwokusatu kuwedde, abantu abaalondebwa Otunnu bonna baagaanibwa.

translation.en: They both questioned why Otunnu had made the appointments without consulting them.
translation.lug: Bombi beebuuza lwaki Otunnu yali alonze abakulembeze abapya nga tamaze kubeebuuzaako.

translation.en: Sources say that the growing rebellion against Otunnu in the Uganda People's Congress stems from his association with the anti Obote faction.
translation.lug: Ensonda zigamba nti okuwakanya okungi eri Otunnu mu Uganda People's Congress kiviira ddala ku nkolagana ye n'abantu abatatambulira ku nkola za Obote.

translation.en: This faction is the gang of four that controls the Milton Obote Foundation and the investment wing of the Uganda People's Congress.
translation.lug: Akakundi kano ke k'abantu bana abafuga Milton Obote Foundation era akateekateeka okusiga ensimbi mu Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: It is said that this gang supported Otunnu to take the Uganda People's Congress presidency.
translation.lug: Kigambibwa nti akabinja kano kaawagira Otunnu okwesimbawo ku ky'obwapulezidenti bwa Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: Kanyomoozi shares the view that Otunnu's problems stem from his links with the Gang of Four.
translation.lug: Kanyomoozi agamba nti ebizibu bwa Otunnu busibuka ku nkolagana ye n'akabondo k'abantu bana.

translation.en: Otunnu is under intensive pressure from a group known in Uganda People's Congress circles as the gang of four.
translation.lug: Otunnu ali ku bwerinde obuva ku kabinja akamanyikiddwa nga ganga of four Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: Mindra was the corporation secretary of the Milton Obote Foundation.
translation.lug: Mindra ye yali omuwandiisi ow'ekyama owa Milton Obote Foundation.

translation.en: They are uncontrollably against the Obote family.
translation.lug: Tebagambwako bwe kituuka ku kukuubagana ne famire ya Obote.

translation.en: The gang succeeded in defeating the Obote family as represented by Jimmy Akena at Nambole during the UPC presidential elections.
translation.lug: Akabinja kano kaawangula famire ya Obote bwe yali ekiikiriddwa Jimmy Akena mu kulonda kwa Pulezidenti wa UPC e Nambole.

translation.en: Walubiri, one of the said gang of four, did not cut up words in expressing his opposition to the Obotes.
translation.lug: Walubiri, omu ku bagambibwa okuba mu kabinja k'abana, teyaluma mu bigambo bye bwe yali ayogera ng'alaga nga bw'atawagira bali ku ludda lwa famire ya Obote.

translation.en: Our problem started when some of Obote's family members thought leadership in the party was by succession which we opposed on principle.
translation.lug: Obuzibu bwaffe bwava ku mbeera nti abamu ku bava mu famire ya Obote bwe baalowooza nti obukulembeze mu kibiina bwali bwansikirano ekintu kye twawakanyiza ddala.

translation.en: Similar groups emerged in the one thousand nine hundred sixties after independence.
translation.lug: Ebibinja ebirala byamerukawo mu myaka gya lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga oluvannyuma lw'ameefuga.

translation.en: It also involved pro and anti Obote forces within Uganda People's Congress.
translation.lug: Era kyalimu abaali bawagira n'abatawagira Obote mu Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: Opposing Democratic Party lost key constituencies to rival parties by Dicta Asiimwe.
translation.lug: Ekibiina ekyali kivuganya ekya Democratic Party kyawangulwa mu konsityuwensi ez'enkizo eri ekibiina bwe byali ku mbiranye ekya Dicta Asiimwe.

translation.en: The Democratic Party Secretary General Mathias Nsubuga is defiant.
translation.lug: Ssaabawandiisi wa Democratic Party Mathias Nsubuga mugugubi.

translation.en: He courageously says Democratic Party will take over state power in the two thousand eleven general elections.
translation.lug: Mu buvumu agamba nti Democratic Party ya kutwala obuyinza mu kulonda kwa bonna okwa nkumi bbiri mu kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: Nsubuga says the Democratic Party President Norbert Mao commands the highest appeal to the youth.
translation.lug: Nsubuga agamba nti Pulezidenti wa Democratic Party, Norbert Mao awulirirwamu nnyo abavubuka.

translation.en: Nsubuga's claims appear to be at variance with the events on September thirty first.
translation.lug: Ebigambo bya Nsubuga byafaanana ng'ebituufu bw'ogeraageranya ku byaliwo nga asatu mu lumu mu Gwomwenda.

translation.en: Ssuubi has absorbed many members of Democratic Party.
translation.lug: Ssuubi etutte bammemba ba Democratic Party bangi.

translation.en: Prior to the two thousand six general elections, Democratic Party was the king maker in Kampala.
translation.lug: Ng'okulonda kwa bonna okwa nkumi bbiri mu mukaaga tekunnatuuka, Democratic Party ye yali esinga amaanyi mu Kampala.

translation.en: In that year's election, Charles Musoke Sserunjogi was replaced by Godfrey Nyakaana as Kampala Central division chairperson.
translation.lug: Mu kulonda kw'omwaka ogwo, Charles Musoke Sserunjogi yasuulibwa n'asikizibwa Godfrey Nyakaana nga ssentebe wa divizoni ya Kampala Central.

translation.en: The mayorship went to Hajji Nasser Sebaggala.
translation.lug: Obwammeeya bwatwalibwa Hajji Nasser Sebaggala.

translation.en: Deo Kijjambu was the Democratic Party Kampala district treasurer.
translation.lug: Deo Kijjambu ye yali omuwanika wa Democratic Party mu disitulikiti ya Kampala.

translation.en: Erias Lukwago captured the Kampala Central Member of Parliament seat from Francis Babu.
translation.lug: Erias Lukwago yawangula eky'omubaka wa Kampala Central mu Paalamenti ng'adda mu bigere bya Francis Babu.

translation.en: Today Democratic Party leads in only two divisions out of the five.
translation.lug: We butuukidde olwaleero nga Democratic Party ekulembera mu divizoni bbirir zokka ku ttaano ezikola Kampala.

translation.en: Protazio Kintu is Local council three Chairman for Nakawa Division.
translation.lug: Protazio Kintu ye ssentebe wa LC eyookusatu owa divizoni y'e Nakawa.

translation.en: The Democratic Party also leads three out of Kampala's eight parliamentary constituencies.
translation.lug: Era Democratic Party ekulembera konsitituwensi ssatu zokka ku ezo omunaana ezikola Kampala mu Paalamenti ya Uganda.

translation.en: The party has three Members of Parliament only in Kampala Central, Kawempe North and Kawempe South.
translation.lug: Ekibiina kirina bammemba ba Paalamenti basatu bokka mu Kampala Central, Kawempe North ne Kawempe South.

translation.en: Kampala district Democratic Party chairman, Vincent Mayanja, laments that the party is ceding ground to other parties in the city.
translation.lug: Ssentebe wa Democratic Party mu Kampala, Vincent Mayanja, alina obweraliikirirvu nti ekibiina kye obuwagizi bugenze bukiggwako mu kibuga naddala wansi mu bantu nga beeyunira ebibiina ebirala.

translation.en: Mayanja, like the Democratic Party Secretary General Nsubuga, claims they will take back Kampala.
translation.lug: Mayanja nga ssaabawandiisi wa Democratic Party Nsubuga, nti Kampala bajja kumweddiza.

translation.en: They were carrying out primary elections while another Democratic Party group of Sam Lubega was electing their own flag bearers elsewhere.
translation.lug: Bwe baali mu kamyufu k'abakulembeze ate akabinja ka bammemba ba Democratic Party akalala akaali kakulirwa Sam Lubega baali beerondera bo be baagala mu kifo ekirala.

translation.en: Democratic Party will have candidates from the same party competing against each other for votes from the same supporters.
translation.lug: Democratic Party ya kubeera n'abeesimbyewo ab'enjawulo nga beevuganya era nga basaba obululu mu balonzi be bamu.

translation.en: Democratic Party's trouble is not only Lubega's group.
translation.lug: Emitawaana gya Democratic Party si kabinja ka Lubega kokka.

translation.en: Erias Lukwago is the Kampala Central Member of Parliament.
translation.lug: Erias Lukwago ye mubaka wa Paalamenti owa Kampala Central.

translation.en: Mao group held their elections for the Democratic Party Kampala Central flag bearer on August twenty eighth.
translation.lug: Ekiwayi kya Mao kyakola okulonda okwakyo ku ani anaakwata bendera ya Democratic Party mu Kampala Central nga abiri mu munaana Ogwomunaana.

translation.en: Mayanja said the party pleaded with Lukwago to send his nomination application for Democratic Party's flag but he never did.
translation.lug: Mayanja yagamba nti beegayirira Lukwago ateekeyo okusaba kwe okw'okukwatira Democratic Party bendera naye teyakikola.

translation.en: Lukwago said that he could not subscribe to one group of the party.
translation.lug: Lukwago yagamba nti yali takkiriziganya n'oludda lw'ekibiina olumu.

translation.en: He said he would only participate after the two groups have reconciled, which looks unlikely to happen.
translation.lug: Yagamba nti yali wa kwetabamu ssinga ebiwayi byombi byali byegasse, ekintu ekiyinza obutabaawo.

translation.en: Most likely Lukwago will join Forum for Democratic Change which has cultivated a strong opposition presence in and around Kampala.
translation.lug: Obubonero obusinga bulaga nti Lukwago yandyegatta ku Forum for Democratic Change ekifunye obuwagizi obusinga mu by'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti mu kampala n'emiriraano.

translation.en: Initially Lukwago wanted to become the mayor of Kampala.
translation.lug: Okusooka Lukwago yali ayagala kufuuka mmeeya wa Kampala.

translation.en: He had been told that Parliament was set to pass the Kampala takeover bill when Members of Parliament returned from the recess.
translation.lug: Yali akitegeddeko nti Paalamenti yali eteekateeka okuyisa ebbago ly'etteeka erifuga ekibuga Kampala ng'ababaka ba Paalamenti bavudde mu luwummula.

translation.en: If that happens, he says, he will stand for Kampala Central Member of Parliament.
translation.lug: Agamba nti ssinga ekyo kibaawo, ajja kwesimbawo ng'omubaka wa Kampala Central mu Paalamenti.

translation.en: Democratic Party will have two candidates Lukwago and Yawe.
translation.lug: Democratic Party ejja kubeera n'abeesimbyewo babiri okuli Lukwago ne Yawe.

translation.en: This will give advantage to Forum for Democratic Change and National Resistance Movement candidates.
translation.lug: Kino kyakuwa omukisa ababavuganya okuva mu Forum for Democratic Change ne National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: The Interparty Cooperation is now inviting National Resistance Movement losers.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina kati guyita abaagwa mu National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Those troubled by National Resistance Movement's rigging machinery should join the cooperation in the "struggle for free and fair elections".
translation.lug: Abo abakwatibwako engeri National Resistance Movement gye kibbamu obululu balina okwegatta ku mukago okulwanirira kaweefube ow'okuteekawo okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya.

translation.en: The opposition seems to be attempting to seize the opportunity of the fights within National Resistance Movement.
translation.lug: Abooludda oluvuganya balaga nga abataakozese mukisa guno ng'aba National Resistance Movement balwanagana.

translation.en: The Inter Party Cooperation told the press about the violence witnessed in the National Resistance Movement primary elections.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gwategeezezza bannamawulire ku bikolwa eby'obumenyi b'wamateeka ebyeyolekedde mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: The Inter Party Cooperation condemned the election violence and rigging.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gwavumiridde okuyiwa omusaayi n'okubba obululu.

translation.en: IPC chairman and presidential flag bearer Doctor Kizza Besigye says what happens in political parties is a matter of public concern.
translation.lug: Ssentebe wa IPC era akwatidde omukago ogwo bendera Doctor Kizza Besigye agamba nti ebigenda mu maaso mu bibiina bikosa abantu ba bulijjo.

translation.en: It would be wrong for Inter Party Cooperation to keep quiet as National Resistance Movement spreads violence on its members in elections.
translation.lug: Kikyamu omukago gw'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi okusirika obusirisi nga National Resistance Movement esaasaanya obumenyi bw'amateeka ne ku bammemba baayo mu kulonda.

translation.en: The Inter Party Cooperation punished the National Resistance Movement for involving the police and the army in its elections.
translation.lug: Ekibiina ekigatta ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi kyabonolezza National Resistance Movement olw'okwetabya poliisi n'amagye mu byokulonda kwakyo.

translation.en: Besigye pointed out that police were assigned to deliver National Resistance Movement electoral materials.
translation.lug: Besigye yagamba nti poliisi ye yaweebwa ogw'okubunya n'okutambuza eby'okulondesa mu kamyufu ka National Resistance Movement.

translation.en: Robert Isoke was detailed to monitor and investigate the alleged ballot stuffing in Kabarole district.
translation.lug: Robert Isoke yaweebwa obuvunaanyizibwa obw'okulondoola n'okunoonyereza ku kukukusa obululu mu disitulikiti y'e Kabarole.

translation.en: Besigye said these are clear cases of partisan behaviour that security forces are exhibiting which must stop.
translation.lug: Besigye yagamba nti kano kabonero ak'enkukunala akalaga nti abakuumaddembe balina oludda lwe bakolera nga kino kirina okukoma.

translation.en: The Inter Party Cooperation described these actions as criminal and called for prosecution of the culprits.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina gwataputa ebikolwa bino kyabiyita bumenyi bw'amateeka era ne kisaba abeenyigira mu bikolwa bino bavunaanibwe.

translation.en: The violence in NRM primaries has given the Inter Party Cooperation reason to press for a new national Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Obujagalalo mu kamyufu ka NRM buwadde omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ensonga okuteesa nti wateekebwewo akakikiiko k'ebyokulonda ak'eggwanga akapya.

translation.en: The Inter Party Cooperation says the National Resistance Movement election mismanagement will show up into the national Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gugamba nti okukwata obubi okulonda kwa National Resistance Movement kwa kulabikako mu kakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: When Fufa's AGM convenes on August 20, Watson confirmed that necessary constitutional arrangements will be considered first on the agenda.
translation.lug: Olukiiko lwa buli mwaka olwa Fufa bwe lwakakasibwa mu Gwomunaana nga 20, Watson yakakasa nti enteekateeka za ssemateeka ezeetaagisa ze zisooka okufiibwako ku binaagobererwa mu lukiiko.

translation.en: By the time the new league season kicks off mid next month, Uganda Super league Limited is expected to be running things.
translation.lug: Mu kiseera sizoni y'omupiira empya weenaatandikira wakati w’omwezi ogujja, Uganda Supper League Limited esuubirwa okuba nga y'eddukanya ebintu.

translation.en: Jinja declared 2014 as the year of progress towards achieving the evaluation of professionalization of the Super League.
translation.lug: Jinja yalangirira 2014 ng'omwaka gw'okugenda mu maaso okutuuka ku bw'okupima eddaala ly'ekikugu obwa Supper League.

translation.en: Magogo insists that what matters is to start somewhere so that challenges are handled as they manifest along the way.
translation.lug: Magogo alemerako nti ekikulu kwe kubaako ne we batandikira ebizibu bye basanga bikolebweko nga bwe batambula.

translation.en: Denis Mbidde, a local football enthusiast believes that the new arrangement presents an opportunity for a fresh start.
translation.lug: Denis Mbidde, omu ku bawagizi b’omupiira akkiriza nti entegeka empya ziwa omukisa gw'okutandika obuggya.

translation.en: Mbidde says that the new administration will give rise to a well shaped structure compared to the current set up.
translation.lug: Mbidde agamba nti  obukulembeze obupya bujja kuteekawo ennambika ennungi bw'ogeraageranya kw'eriwo.

translation.en: He explains that Fufa is currently overwhelmed by many responsibilities.
translation.lug: Annyonnyola nti mu kiseera kino Fufa erina obuvunaanyizibwa bungi.

translation.en: Fufa runs district football, first division, second division, women football, Uganda Cranes and Uganda Kobs.
translation.lug: Fufa eddukanya emipiira gya disitulikiti, ekibinja ekisooka, ekibinja ekyokubiri, omupiira gw’abakyala, ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'omupiira gw'ebigere enkulu, ttiimu y'eggwanga ey'ompiira gw'ebigere ey'abali wansi w'emyaka ekkumi n'omunaana.

translation.en: The fresh start that Mbidde dreams of is around the corner.
translation.lug: Entandikwa empya Mbidde gy’alootako enaatera okutuuka.

translation.en: The Fufa Chief Executive Officer, Edgar Watson, is right.
translation.lug: Akulira enzirukanya y'emirimu mu Fufa, Edgar Watson, mutuufu.

translation.en: The ongoing painting exhibition by emerging artist James Sensalire came as no particular surprise to regular art observers.
translation.lug: Omwoleso gw’okusiiga ogugenda mu maaso ogw’omusiizi James Sensalire tegwajja nga kyewuunyo eri abalabi b'ebissiige aba bulijjo.

translation.en: Sensalire claims that there are certain environmental features that are fast becoming extinct because of human activities.
translation.lug: Sensalire agamba nti waliwo ebintu by’obutonde ebimu ebizzeewo olw’emirimu abantu gye bakola.

translation.en: There is always the aspect of African female dancers engaged in some kind of tribal dance.
translation.lug: Bulijjo waliwo enkola y'abakyala abazinyi Abafirika abeeta mu mazina g’obuwangwa agamu.

translation.en: After finishing his studies at National Teachers College, Nkozi in 2002, Sensalire did not make any time to face the blackboards.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliririza emisomo gye ku National Teaches College, Nkozi mu 2002, Sensalire teyaddamu kusoma.

translation.en: He immediately got employed as an illustrator for a monthly catholic magazine called Leadership.
translation.lug: Baamuweerawo omulimu ng'omusomesa mu katabo k'amawulire k'Obukatoliki akaafulumanga buli mwezi akayitibwa Leadership.

translation.en: Martin Luther King said, " if a man has not discovered something he will die for, he is not fit to live".
translation.lug: Martin Luther King yagamba nti singa omusajja aba talina ky'azudde ky'anaafiiririra, aba talina kubeera mulamu.

translation.en: Sensalire is passionate about wildlife and nature.
translation.lug: Sensalire ayagala nnyo ebisolo by'omu nsiko n’obutonde.

translation.en: Blue sky international provides all types of vehicle servicing and repairs, genuine spare parts and general vehicle maintenance.
translation.lug: Blue sky international ekola ku kuddaabiiriza emmotoka okw'ebika bwonna, ebyetaagisa ku mmotoka, ebyetaagisa ku motoka ebirungi ennyo, n'okwekebejja emmotoka yonna.

translation.en: The address of the contact person is;Director Evas Orland,Chief Mechanic; Yunusu Kabuya Workshop,P.O Box 27210,Kampala Uganda.
translation.lug: Endagiriro y’omuntu atuukirwako eri: Director Evas Orland, Makanika omukulu: Edduuka Yunusu Kabuya A.K.P 27210, Kampala Uganda.

translation.en: Is Uganda People`s Congress pulling out of Inter-Party Cooperation?
translation.lug: Uganda People’s Congress egenda kuva mu mukago ogutabaebibiina by'ebyobufuzi?

translation.en: Doctor Salim Ahmed was the chairperson of the Commonwealth Observer Group for Rwanda's Presidential elections.
translation.lug: Musawo Salim Ahmed ye yali ssentebe w'ekibinja ky'agaaliko amatwale ga Bungereza ekitunuulira okulonda k'obwapulezidenti mu Rwanda.

translation.en: The National Resistance Movement election violence shows that the situation may get worse in 2011 when opposition joins the race.
translation.lug: Obutabanguko mu kulonda kwa National Resistance Movement kulaga nti embeera eyinza kusajjuka mu 2011 ng'oludda oluvuganya lwegasse mu lwokaano.

translation.en: During the NRM internal elections, voting was scrambled in Sembabule where Lwemiyaga MP Ssekikubo battled Minister Sam Kutesa.
translation.lug: Mu kulonda kw'omu kibiina kya NRM, okulonda kwali kwa kuzibu nnyo mu sembabule nga MP w'e Lwemiyaga Ssekikubo attunka ne minisita Sam Kuteesa.

translation.en: In Kapchorwa, violence erupted between supporters of Stephen Chebrot and MP Sabila.
translation.lug: E Kapchorwa, obutabanguko bwabalukawo wakati w’abawagizi ba Stephen Chebrot n'aba MP Sabila.

translation.en: In West Budama Minister Otala drew a gun at supporters of his opponent; in Kibale MP Tinkansimire's car was stoned.
translation.lug: Mu West Budama Minisita Otala yatunuza emmundu mu bawagizi b’amuvuganya, e Kibale emmotoka y’omubaka Tinkansimire yakubwa amayinja.

translation.en: In Kaliro, elections were cancelled twice over malpractices.
translation.lug: E Kaliro, okulonda kwasazibwamu emirundi ebiri lwa bikolwa ebitakkirizibwa mu mateeka.

translation.en: In Butaleja, the elections were cancelled after a mob attacked the organisers.
translation.lug: E Butalejja, okulonda kwasazibwamu oluvannyuma lw'ekibinja ky'abatwalira amateeka mu ngalo okulumba abategesi.

translation.en: Forum for Democratic Changes's Musumba, described Mao's decision to meet Inter-Party Cooperation as an immature act to attract publicity.
translation.lug: Musumba owa Forum for Democratic Change, yannyonnyola okusalawo kwa Mao okusisinkana omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ng'ekikolwa eky’ekito eky'okusasamaza abantu.

translation.en: The Mao group's sudden change of attitude was very surprising given that they have been publicly criticizing the Inter-Party Cooperation.
translation.lug: Okukyuka kw’enneeyisa y’ekibinja kya Mao kwewuunyisa nnyo kubanga baali bavumirira omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi mu lwatu.

translation.en: Musumba said, "We are not interested in getting involved in immature politics."
translation.lug: Musumba yagamba nti bo si beetegefu kwetaba mu byabufuzi bya kito.

translation.en: Since President Kagame's election victory, the majority of Rwandans in and outside the country have been in festive mood.
translation.lug: Okuva Pulezidenti Kagame bwe yawangula akalulu, Abanyalwanda abasinga wabweru ne munda we ggwanga babadde bajaguza.

translation.en: The night election results were announced, scenes of jubilation on Televisions as many people in Amahoro stadium celebrated was appealing.
translation.lug: Ekiro ebyava mu kulonda lwe byalangirirwa, ebifo ebijaguzibwa byalagibwa ku zi terefayina ng'abantu bangi mu kisaawe ky'e Amahoro bajaguza, byali bisanyusa.

translation.en: Godfrey Lukongwa Binaisa that was Uganda's fifth president since independence, was a strong hearted freedom fighter and adventurous.
translation.lug: Godfrey Lukongwa Binaisa eyali pulezidenti wa Uganda owookutaano okuva ku meefuga, yali mulwanyi nnyo ow'eddembe era ow’omutima omugumu.

translation.en: We were together in Uganda National Congress from 1956 up to early 1960 when we split due to internal disagreements.
translation.lug: Twali ffenna mu Uganda National Congress okuva mu 1957 okutuuka ku ntandikwa ya 1960 bwe twayawukanya olw’obutakkaanya munda mu kibiina.

translation.en: Uganda National Congress, the party which spread the gospel of nationalism and fought for Uganda's independence was founded by six men.
translation.lug: Uganda National Congress, ekibiina ekyabunya enjiri y'obwamwoyogwaggwanga era ne kirwanirira obwetwaze bwa Uganda kyatandikibwawo abasajja mukaaga.

translation.en: Musazi was the founding President General and Abubaker Mayanja founding Secretary General.
translation.lug: Musaazi ye yali pulezidenti ku ntandikwa ate Abubaker Mayanja ye yali ssaabawandiisi ku ntandikwa.

translation.en: Binaisa's early life was adventurous.
translation.lug: Obulamu bwa Binaisa nga muto bwali bunyuma.

translation.en: After Makerere University, he went to London without much financial support.
translation.lug: Nga avudde ku ssetendekero y'e Makerere, yagenda e London nga talina bulingi nsimbi.

translation.en: He raised tuition fees by digging graves in London.
translation.lug: Yasobola okufuna ebisale ng'asima ntaana e London.

translation.en: This is what he used to tell us in Katwe in 1957 during our conversations about life.
translation.lug: Bino bye yateranga okutugamba e Katwe mu 1957 nga tunyumya ku bulamu.

translation.en: Mother Teresa said that the Chinese government could do something about it.
translation.lug: Maama Teresa agamba nti Gavumenti ya China erina ky'eyinza okukikolako.

translation.en: This is not about their sovereignty in Tibet, this is about how their security forces behave.
translation.lug: Kino tekiri ku buyinza bwabwe mu Tibet, kiri ku ngeri amagye gaabwe gye geeyisaamu.

translation.en: Theary Seng, a Cambodian human rights lawyer, commented on the conviction of Kaing Guek Eav.
translation.lug: Theary Senge, munnamateeka omulwanirizi w'eddembe ly'obuntu mu Combodia yayogera ku Kaing Guek Eav okusingisibwa omusango.

translation.en: These people were not victimized in any way after the overthrow of Amin.
translation.lug: Abantu bano tebaavunaanibwa mu ngeri yonna oluvannyuma lwa Amin okuggyibwako.

translation.en: But there was evidence against them that they aided Amin in Killing Uganda People's Congress members.
translation.lug: Naye waaliwo obukakafu obulaga nti baayambako Amin mu kutta ba mmemba ba Uganda People's Congress.

translation.en: Let Kahigiriza come here and contradict my words if what I say is not correct.
translation.lug: Leka Kahigiriza ajje awakanye ebigambo byange bwe biba nga si bituufu.

translation.en: Muwanga requested then to take the message to Buzabo and all the Democratic Party supporters to stop the dirty politics immediately.
translation.lug: Muwanga yabasaba batwale obubaka ewa Buzabo n'abawagizi ba Democratic Party bonna balekeraawo ebyobufuzi eby'emivuyo mu bunnambiro.

translation.en: The liberty which was brought by the Uganda People's Congress cost people's lives some died in Lake Victoria, others between Mutukula and Arua.
translation.lug: Eddembe eryaleetebwa Uganda People's Congress lyaviirako abantu okufiirwa obulamu bwabwe nga abamu baafiira mu nnyanja Nalubaale ate abalala wakati wa Mutukula ne Arua.

translation.en: They sacrificed their lives for the freedom of everyone in Uganda.
translation.lug: Bawaayo obulamu bwabwe ku lw'eddembe lya buli munnayuganda

translation.en: Muwanga warned that members of different parties should not claim to have an upper hand on others by molesting them.
translation.lug: Muwanga yalabula nti bammemba b'ebibiina eby'enjawulo tebalina kulaga nti basinga abalala nga babakozesaako eryanyi.

translation.en: Muwanga talked to the Uganda people's Congress in Mbirizi, Masaka South-West constituency.
translation.lug: Muwanga yayogera eri aba Uganda People's Congress e Mbirizi, mu konsitituwensi ya Masaka South-West.

translation.en: The 65 year old chairman who effectively participated in last years' liberation war which removed Amin was among the speakers.
translation.lug: Ssentebe ow'emyaka 65 eyeetaba ennyo mu lutalo lw'ameenunula olw'omwaka oguwedde olwaggyako Amin era yali omu ku boogezi.

translation.en: The youth of Uganda People's Congress will spearhead the reconstruction and development task.
translation.lug: Abavubuka ba Uganda People's Congress bajja ku kulemberamu omulimu gw'okuddamu okuzimba n'emirimu gy'enkulaakulana.

translation.en: The first thing the Uganda People's Congress will do as soon as it comes to power will be to engage the youth in productive work.
translation.lug: Ekintu Uganda People's Congress ky'enaasokera ddala okola ng'eze mu buyinza kwe kwetabya abavubuka mu mirimu egifuna.

translation.en: Uganda People's Congress youths will spearhead this so as to set an example to the rest.
translation.lug: Abavubuka ba Uganda People's Congress bajja kukulemberamu kino okusobola okulaga ekyokulabirako eri abalala.

translation.en: Muwanga also appealed to Ugandans to strive hard and establish mutual respect for each other.
translation.lug: Muwanga era yasaba Bannayuganda okulwana ennyo okuwangana ekitiibwa.

translation.en: At Bwezibwera, the chairman pledged, never again shall the Uganda People's Congress allow Uganda to be humiliated as it was in the Amin's days.
translation.lug: E Bwezibwera, ssentebe yeeyama nti Uganda People's Congress tejja kuddamu kukkiriza bannayuganda kutulugunyizibwa nga bwe kyali mu biseera bya Amin.

translation.en: Never shall Uganda be characterized with the life of scarcities of essential commodities.
translation.lug: Uganda teribeera mu mbeera ya bbulwa lya bintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo.

translation.en: Uganda People's Congress needs determined characters who would stand with this nation even in difficult times.
translation.lug: Uganda People's Congress yeetaaga abantu abamalirivu abajja okuyimirirawo n'eggwanga lino ne mu biseera ebizibu.

translation.en: Commenting on the Democratic Party led by Paulo Kawanga Semogerere, he said it was characterized by contradictions.
translation.lug: Okwogera ku Democratic Party ekulemberwa Paulo Kawanga Ssemwogerere, agamba nti kyali kijjudde okwetema engalike.

translation.en: He commended Semogerere for his ability to lead a party that was almost torn apart by contradictions.
translation.lug: Yasemba Ssemwogerere olw'obusobozi bwe okukulembera ekibiina kumpi ekitaagudwataagudwa olw'okwetema engalike.

translation.en: The Democratic Party, the serious contender with the Uganda People's Congress in the polls, had given away more than 10 parliamentary seats.
translation.lug: Democratic Party esinga okuvuganya Uganda People's Congress mu kulonda okujja yali eviiriddwako ebifo bw'obwa mmemba bwa paalamenti ebisoba mu 10.

translation.en: Otherwise, how can we have the 1980 parliamentary candidates who cannot fill in the forms and present them in time?
translation.lug: Ekitali ekyo, tuyinza tutya okuba n'ababaka ba paalamenti eya 1980 abatasobola kujjuza mpapula ne baziwaayo mu budde?

translation.en: This series is compiled and reproduced by John Njoroge.
translation.lug: Obutundu buno bugattidwa ne bufulumizibwa John Njoroge.

translation.en: According to the independent on Jul 30- August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumire reported that a young woman in Soroti was raped while returning home.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent owa nga 30 Ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga 05 Ogwomunaana, 2010, Rosebell Kagumire agamba nti omukyala e Soroti yasobozebwako ng'adda ewaka.

translation.en: The 28 year old Grace Nakasi, a victim of an insurgency in eastern Uganda, was pulled off the road to the bush and gang-raped by the men in uniform.
translation.lug: Grace Nakasi ewemyaka 28, eyakosebwa mu kino ekyali mu bugwanjuba bwa Uganda, yasikibwa okuva ku kkubo n'asobezebwako ekibinja ky'abasajja abaali mu yunifoomu.

translation.en: I was living in Soroti town.
translation.lug: Nali mbeera mu kibuga Soroti.

translation.en: I met nine soldiers on patrol at about seven o'clock in the evening.
translation.lug: Nasisinkana abasirikale mwenda ku ppatulo ku ssaawa nga emu ey'olweggulo.

translation.en: Nakasi begins her story by narrating how they all raped her and abandoned her by the roadside.
translation.lug: Nakasi atandika emboozi ye ng'anyumya engeri bonna gye baamusobyako ne bamuleka ku mabbali g'ekkubo.

translation.en: This was 1987, a year after President Yoweri Museveni had captured power and announced a fundamental change.
translation.lug: Kino kyali mu 1987, nga Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni ng'azze mu buyinza n'alangirira enkyukakyuka ey'omuggundu.

translation.en: One year later, Nakasi received information that her parents had been killed by rebels.
translation.lug: Nga wayise omwaka gumu, Nakasi yafuna obubaka nti bazadde be baali battiddwa abayeekera.

translation.en: Nakasi narrated to us how she decided to go to the bus park to take a bus to visit her home.
translation.lug: Nakasi yatuttottoledde bwe yasalawo okugenda mu ppaaka ya bbaasi afune bbaasi agende ewaabwe.

translation.en: It was on the way to the bus park that Nakasi became a victim of the second rape.
translation.lug: Nakasi bwe yali agenda mu ppaaka ya bbaasi, yasobezebwako omulundi ogwokubiri.

translation.en: Nakasi met four National Resistance Army soldiers, two of them dragged her off the road and forced themselves on her.
translation.lug: Nakasi yasisinkana abasirikale ba National Resistence Army bana, ababiri ku bo ne bamusika ku kkubo ne bamwekakaatikako.

translation.en: There was a meeting with Ugandan women's groups under the support of the Women's International Cross-Cultural Exchange during the AU summit.
translation.lug: Waaliwo olukiiko lw'ekibiina ky'abakyala abannayuganda nga bawagirwa Women's international cross-cultural Exchange mu lukungaana lwa AU.

translation.en: The Africa Union Summit took place in Kampala the capital city of Uganda.
translation.lug: Olukungaana lwa African union lwali mu Kampala, ekibuga ekikulu ekya Uganda.

translation.en: Nakasi a mother of 12 children, a resident of Soroti, was raped 16 times, infected with HIV and later thrown out of her marital home by the husband.
translation.lug: Nakasi nga maama w'abaana 12, mutuuze w'e Soroti, yasobezebwako emirundi 16, n'asiigibwa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya oluvannyuma omwami we n'amugoba mu maka ge.

translation.en: It's a touching narrative and a wider reflection of the tribulations women face in Africa's conflict-torn regions.
translation.lug: Mboozi ekwasa ennaku n'okwefumiitiriza ebizibu abakyala bye baayitamu mu Afirica mu bitundu ebitaaguddwataaguddwa entalo.

translation.en: She is one of the faces of Ugandan women that carry the burden of sexual violence.
translation.lug: Y'omu ku bakyala ba Uganda abaali basobezeddwako.

translation.en: For the past decade, Uganda has been applauded on the world stage as a successful story in the fight against the Human immunodeficiency Virus.
translation.lug: Mu kyasa ekiyise, Uganda yaasiimibwa ku ddaala ly'ensi yonna okubeera ng'ekoze bulungi mu kulwanyisa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.

translation.en: Women who were harrased by the Lord's Resistance Army rebels have been affected by HIV more than any other women in the rest of the country.
translation.lug: Abakazi abaakabassanyizibwa abayeekera ba Lord's Resistance Army basiigidwa nnyo akawuka akaleeta mukenenya okusinga abakazi abalala bonna mu ggwanga.

translation.en: The sexual violence by both the Lord Resistance Army and government soldiers has left behind a traumatized and stressed generation of women.
translation.lug: Resistance Army n'abajaasi ba gavumenti okukabassanya abakyala kirese omugigi gw'abakyala omwennyamivu era ogutalina mirembe.

translation.en: In 1990, Nakasi was again gang-raped by men whom she believes were government soldiers.
translation.lug: Mu 1990, Nakasi yaddamu okusobezebwako ekibinja ky'abasajja baasuubira nti baali basirikale ba gavumenti

translation.en: She was admitted to Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital in Kampala for several months after the rape incident.
translation.lug: Yaweebwa ekitanda mu ddwaliro lya Butabika Mental Rehabilitation Hospital mu Kampala okumala emyezi egiwera oluvannyuma lw'okusobezebwako.

translation.en: In 2002, Nakasi took an HIV test.
translation.lug: Mu 2002, Nakasi yakeberebwa akawuka akaleeta mukenenya.

translation.en: But the day I told him I had tested HIV positive, he threw me out of the house, Nakasi narrates in a tone of courage that has defied many odds.
translation.lug: Nakasi attottola mu ddoboozi ery'obuvumu eryewunyisa buli omu nti, olunaku lwe yamugamba nti yali azuulidwamu akawuka akaleeta mukenenya, yamugoba mu nnyumba,

translation.en: Nakasi was excommunicated from the community.
translation.lug: Nakasi yasosolwa mu kitundu.

translation.en: A ray of hope emerged in 2007.
translation.lug: Essuubi lyatuukawo mu 2007

translation.en: Nakasi was rescued by World Vision International which paid for her operation to remove her uterus which helps eliminate the fistula condition.
translation.lug: Nakasi yaanunulwa World Vision International abaasasulira okulongosebwa kwe okumuggyamu nnabaana ekyamuyamba okuwona ekikulukuto.

translation.en: After the treatment, she and other women, who are victims of sexual violence, started a support group called Teso Peace Women's Activists.
translation.lug: Oluvanyuma ly'okujjanjabibwa, ye n'abakazi abalala abaakabassanyizibwa, baatandikawo ekibiina ekiyambi ekiyitibwa Teso Peace Women's Activists.

translation.en: Nakasi's story is heartbreaking.
translation.lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi emenya omutima.

translation.en: According to the Independent issue of July 30-August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumi wrote an article about women and girls who are abandoned after rape.
translation.lug: Okusinziira ku Independent eyafuluma nga 30 Ogwomusanvu okutuuka nga 05 Ogwomunaana, 2010, Rosebell Kagumi yawandiika emboozi ekwata ku bakyala n'abawala abasuuliddwawo oluvannyuma lw'okukabassanyizibwako.

translation.en: Nakasi said the young girl's parents died in the war and now at nine no one wants to take care of her yet has six orphans under her care.
translation.lug: Nakasi agamba nti abazadde b'omuwala baafiira mu lutalo era kati ku myaka mwenda tewali n'omu ayagala kumulabirira kyokka ng'alina bamulekwa mukaaga b'alabirira.

translation.en: Nakasi's story is not unique in Uganda's war-ravaged communities.
translation.lug: Emboozi ya Nakasi si mpya mu bitundu bya Uganda omwali entalo.

translation.en: She told the Independent that about 40 women within just one sub-county of Tubur in Soroti where she works suffer from vaginal fistula due to rape.
translation.lug: Yagambye independent nti abakazi abakunukkiriza mu 40 mu ggombolola emu ey'e Tubur mu Soroti gy'akolera balina ekirwadde ky'ekikulukuto olw'okusobezebwako.

translation.en: Nakasi and other HIV- positive women regularly walk many miles from Tubur to get life pronging drugs.
translation.lug: Nakasi n'abakazi abalala abalina akawuka akaleeta mukenenya batambula mmayiro nnyingi okuva e e Tubur okufuna eddagala eribeezaawo obulamu.

translation.en: Nakasi has managed to get funds from Women's International Cross-Cultural Exchange and Urgent Action Fund Africa.
translation.lug: Nakasi asobodde okufuna obuyambi okuva mu Women's international cross-cultural Exchange ne Urgent action fund Africa.

translation.en: Nakasi will use the funds to help orphans and provide medicines to people living with HIV in her village.
translation.lug: Nakasi ajja kukozesa ensimbi okuyamba bamulekwa n'okufunira abantu abalina akawuka akaleeta mukenenya eddagala mu kyalo kye

translation.en: I tend to think that Semogerere is only unfortunate to lead such men.
translation.lug: Ntera okulowooza nti Semwogerere si wa mukisa kukulembera basajja ng'abo.

translation.en: The heinous incident marked the dawn of repeated sexual violence against Nakasi and many other women in conflict areas.
translation.lug: Embeera embi ennyo yaaviraako okusobyanga ku Nakasi entakera n'abakyala abalala bangi mu bitundu ebirimu entalo.

translation.en: Reports indicated that the majority of voters had cast their ballots within three hours of polls opening.
translation.lug: Alipoota zalaga nti abalonzi abasinga baali bamaze okulonda mu ssaawa ssatu ng'okulonda kutandise.

translation.en: For Kagame's supporters, the cheerful mood from the campaign will reenergize the Rwanda Patriotic Font base.
translation.lug: Eri abawagizi ba Kagame, embeera y'ebugumu okuva mu kampayini ejja kuzzaamu enkambi ya Rwanda Patriotic Font amanyi.

translation.en: Display of the National Voter's Register is from eleventh to thirty first August two thousand ten.
translation.lug: Okulaga enkalala z'abalonzi kutandika nga kkumi na lumu okutuuka ng'asatu mu lumu Ogwomunaana nkumi bbiri mu kkumi.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission has appointed eleventh August to thirty first August two thousand ten for Display of the National Voters' Register.
translation.lug: Akakiko k'ebyokulonda kalonze olwa nga kkumi na lumu okutuuka ng'asatu mu lumu Ogwomunaana nkumi bbiri mu kkumi okukebererako enkalala z'abalonzi.

translation.en: There twenty three thousand nine hundred fifteen polling stations throughout Uganda.
translation.lug: Ebifo ebironderwamu mu Uganda biri enkumi ssatu mu lwenda mu kkumi na bitaano.

translation.en: The display shall begin at eight in the morning and end at six in the evening at each polling station.
translation.lug: Okukeberwa kujja kutandika ku ssaawa bbiri ez'okumakya kuggwe ku ssaawa kkumi na bbiri olweggulo mu buli kifo we balondera.

translation.en: The lists of all persons recommended for deletion from the National Voters' Register, shall be displayed for a period of ten days.
translation.lug: Enkalala z'abantu bonna abalina okuggyibwa mu nkalala z'abalonzi, zijja kutimbibwa okumala ebbanga lya nnaku kkumi.

translation.en: Engineer Dr Badru Kiggundu was the Chairperson Electoral Commission for the national elections two thousand eleven.
translation.lug: Yinginiya Dr. Badru Kiggundu ye yaali ssentebe w'akakiiko k'eby'obyokulonda mu kulonda kwa nkumi bbiri kkumi na gumu.

translation.en: On May twenty sixth, President Museveni gave a rare speech about Uganda's opposition.
translation.lug: Mu Gwokutaano nga abiri mu mukaaga, Pulezidenti Museveni yayogera okwogera okutali kwa bulijjo ku ludda oluvuganya mu Uganda.

translation.en: The president spoke at the opening ceremony of the Africa Regional Conference on the Electoral Cycle.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti yayogera ku mukolo ogwaggulawo Africa Regional Conference ku byokulonda.

translation.en: The interparty organisations dialogue hosted Democratic reforms at Munyonyo Resort.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gw'ateeka olukiko ku nkola z'amateeka ezinaagobererwanga ku Munyonyo Resort.

translation.en: InterParty Organisation for Dialogue brings together political parties with representation in parliament.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gugatta wamu ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebirina ababaka mu paalamenti.

translation.en: The InterParty Organisation for Dialogue comprises of the ruling party and the opposition parties.
translation.lug: Omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebirina ababaka mu paalamenti gukolebwa ekibiina ekiri mu buyinza n'ebibiina ebiri ku ludda oluvuganya.

translation.en: The president said It is the ultimate responsibility of all Africans to promote dialogue and fight dictatorship.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti yagambye nti buvunaanyizibwa bwa buli Mufirika okutondawo enteeseganya n'okulwanyisa obwannakyemalira.

translation.en: He argued that the dialogue must be based on issues that are important to the African people.
translation.lug: Yagambye nti okwogerezeganya kulina kukolebwa ku nsonga ez'omugaso eri Abafirika.

translation.en: The opposition parties suggested reforms in the method of constituting the Electoral Commission to ensure a level ground.
translation.lug: Ebibiina ebiri ku ludda oluvuganya byasabye enkyukakyuka mu nnonda y'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda okusobola okuteekawo obwenkanya.

translation.en: In his book, Sowing the Mustard Seed, Museveni writes that Paulo Muwanga's government refused to amend the electoral law.
translation.lug: Mu kitabo kye Sowing the Mustard Seed, Museveni awandiika nti gavumenti ya Paulo Muwanga yagaana okukyusa etteeka ly'okulonda.

translation.en: All the Uganda People's Congress members wanted the fa√ßade of an election in order to legitimise the coup.
translation.lug: Bammemba ba Uganda People's Congress baali baagala akalulu akalungi okusobola okuggyako gavumenti.

translation.en: The electoral law reforms the president is writing about are the same reforms the opposition parties are demanding today.
translation.lug: Ennongoosereza z'okulonda Pulezidenti z'awandiikako ze zimu n'ebibiina by'oluda oluvuganya bye zibanja leero.

translation.en: Museveni too rejected the opposition's call for electoral law reforms just like Muwanga in one thousand nine hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Museveni naye yagaana enkyukakyuka mu tteeka ly'okulonda nga Muwanga mu lukumi mu lwenda mu kinaana.

translation.en: The Election Commission is very competent with people of high integrity.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kamanyi bulungi eky'okukola nga kaliko abantu abeesimbu nnyo.

translation.en: The struggle for electoral law reforms in Uganda has been on since one thousand nine hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Okulwanirira enkyukakyuka mu tteeka ly'okulonda mu Uganda kubaddewo okuva mu lukumi mu lwenda mu kinaana.

translation.en: The results of one thousand nine hundred eighty general elections were contested and a rebellion ensued.
translation.lug: Ebyava mu kulonda kwa lukumi mu lwenda mu kinaana byawakanyizibwa era ne bivaavu okwekalakaasa.

translation.en: About five hundred thousand Ugandans died during the five-year insurgency that brought Museveni to power.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda abali mu mitwalo ataano baafiira mu lutalo olw'emyaka etaano olwaleeta Museveni mu buyinza.

translation.en: Museveni gave one of the reasons for the National Resistance Army rebellion.
translation.lug: Museveni yawa emu ku nsonga ezaviirako aba National Resistance Army okwegugunga.

translation.en: The Supreme Court ruled that the Electoral Commission failed to conduct free and fair elections in two thousand one and six.
translation.lug: Kkooti ensukkulumu yasala nti akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kaalemwa okuteekateeka okulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya mu nkumi bbiri mu gumu ne mukaaga.

translation.en: This is the same commission the president insists is too competent to be changed.
translation.lug: Kano akakiiko ke kamu Pulezidenti kaalemereko nti kamanyi eky'okukola era tekayinza kukyusibwa.

translation.en: Uganda has held four elections since one thousand nine hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Uganda ebadde n'okulonda kwa mirundi ena okuva mu lukumi mu lwenda mu kinaana.

translation.en: The participating political parties in the electoral process are suspicious of the independence of the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ebyetabye mu kulonda bibuusabuusa obwetengereze bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission organises credible elections without due influence from the ruling party.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kategeka okulonda okulungi okutaliimu kusendebwasendebwa kibiina ekiri mu buyinza.

translation.en: Many analysts say that the selection of Electoral Commission members must be by a neutral committee comprising Ugandans of national integrity.
translation.lug: Abatunuulizi b'ensonga bangi bagamba nti okulonda bammemba b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kulina kukolebwa akakiiko akatalina ludda nga kaliko Bannayuganda abeesimbu.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission members especially the chairperson and secretary should never again be persons handpicked by the ruling party alone.
translation.lug: Bammemba b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda naddala ssentebe n'omuwandiisi tebalina kuddamu kulondebwa kibiina kiri mu buyinza kyokka.

translation.en: It should be the national consensus committee of great persons that should supervise and judge the work of the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Kalina kuba akakiiko k'eggwanga akatabaganya ak'abantu abasukkulumu abalina okulondoola n'okulamula emirimu gy'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The national consensus committee resorts to courts of laws in its supervision of the Electoral Commission.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'eggwanga akatabaganya kaloopa mu mbuga z'amateeka nga kalondoola emirimu gy'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: Uganda's political opposition groups agree with this proposal.
translation.lug: Ebibiina by'oludda oluvuganya mu Uganda bikkaanya n'ebbago lyabwe.

translation.en: This arrangement has worked in Malawi
translation.lug: Entekateka eno ekoze mu Malawi.

translation.en: The Malawian Electoral Commission is headed by a judge nominated by the judicial service commission.
translation.lug: Akakiiko k'ebyokulonda aka Malawi kakulirwa omulamuzi alondebwa akakiiko k'abalamuzi.

translation.en: The Malawian president, in consultation with leaders of the political parties represented in parliament, appoints qualified members of the commission.
translation.lug: Pulezidenti wa Malawi mu kwebuuza ku bakulembeze b'ebibiina byobufuzi ebirina ababaka mu paalamenti, alonda bammemba b'akakiiko abalina ebisaanyizo.

translation.en: The commissioners have a four-year renewable tenure of Electoral commissions.
translation.lug: Ab'akakiiko balina ekisanja ky'akakiiko ky'ebyokulonda eky'emyaka ena ekizzibwa obuggya.

translation.en: Africa's new kingmaker Yoweri Museveni addresses a rally in one thousand nine hundred eighty.
translation.lug: Omukulembeze wa Afirika ayambako abalala okujja mu buyinza Yoweri Museveni ayogerako eri abantu mu lukumi mu mwenda mu kinaana.

translation.en: Ghana on the other hand has the most detailed process of selecting its Electoral Commission team.
translation.lug: Ku ludda olulala Ghana y'esinga emitendera emiwanvu mu kulonda akakiiko kaayo ak'ebyokulonda.

translation.en: The current Ghanaian Electoral Commission members were appointed in the year one thousand nine hundred ninety-three.
translation.lug: Bammemba b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda aka Ghana akaliko baalondebwa mu mwaka gwa lukumi mu lwenda mu kyenda mu ssatu.

translation.en: AMISOM as the AU and UN mandated peace keeping force has a limited capacity to protect the Presidential Palace, Mogadishu airport.
translation.lug: AMISOM ng'ekiragiro kya AU ne UN eky'okukuuma emirembe tebirina busobozi kukuuma lubiri lw'obwapulezidenti, Mogadishu airport.

translation.en: The Uganda People's Defence Force presence within the AMISOM framework does not answer the needs of the Ugandans.
translation.lug: Okubeera kwa Uganda Peolpe's Defence Force mu AMISOM tekyanukula byetaago bya bannayuganda.

translation.en: When the population talks of wiping out Al-Shabaab from Somalia, they mean militarily defeating them thus removing ability of launching attacks.
translation.lug: Abantu bwe boogera ku kusaanyaawo Al-Shabaab mu Somalia, bategeeza okubawangula mu by'ekijaasi awo ne baba nga tebakyalina busobozi kukola bulumbaganyi.

translation.en: Since the Uganda People`s Defence Force cannot achieve that goal, the only feasible option is to withdraw from Somalia.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba nti Uganda People's Defence Force tesobola kutuukkirza kirubirirwa ekyo, ky'esobola kyokka okukola kwe kuva mu Somalia.

translation.en: We can then, as a member state of the UN, ask the UN Security Council for a mandate forcefully invade Somalia to pursue Al-Shabaab.
translation.lug: Ffe nga bammemba ba UN tusaba akakiiko k'ebyokwerinda okuyisa ekiragiro okuyingira mu Somalia ku kifuba twengange Al-Shabaab.

translation.en: This strategy would allow Uganda to launch attacks against the Al-Shabaab.
translation.lug: Enkora eno yandisobozesezza Uganda okukola ennumba ku Al-Shabaab.

translation.en: Bwesigye works with Advocates for Public International Law Uganda.
translation.lug: Bwesigye akola ne Advocates for Public International Law Uganda.

translation.en: During its National Executive Conference in January, the NRMovement declared it had registered 8 million members including the under age.
translation.lug: Mu lukungaana lwayo olw'akakiiko akafuzi mu Gatonya, NRMovement yalangirira nti yali ewandiisizza bammemba obukadde munaana omuli n'abali wansi w'emyaka.

translation.en: This was before the EC started the national voter registration exercise which also yielded about 15 million voters, up from 10 million in 2006.
translation.lug: Kino kyaliwo nga EC tennatandika nteekateeka ya kukebera nkalala z'abalonzi era ekyavaamu abalonzi obukadde 15 okuva ku bukadde 10 mu 2006.

translation.en: The NRM has been registering people it calls its members across the country.
translation.lug: NRM ebadde ewandisa abantu b'eyita bammemba abaayo okwetoloola eggwanga lyonna.

translation.en: The Electoral Commission also doubts the authenticity of the NRM figures.
translation.lug: Akakiiko akalonzi nako kabuusabuusa obutuufu bw'emiwendo gya NRM.

translation.en: Early this year, the NRM also doubted the genuineness of the EC's national voter register, alleging that it contained two million ghost names.
translation.lug: Nga omwaka guno gutandika, NRM nayo yabuusabuusa obutuufu bw'enkalala z'abalonzi ez'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda, ng'egamba nti zirimu amanya obukadde bubiri ag'empewo.

translation.en: Uganda's demographic statistics put the 2009 population projections to 30.6 million.
translation.lug: Ebibalo by'abantu mu Uganda mu 2009 baatuuka ku bukadde 30.6.

translation.en: This implies that 14.2 million Ugandans are above 18 and thus qualified to register as voters.
translation.lug: Kino kitegeeza nti obukadde 14.2 obwa Bannayuganda bali waggulu w'emyka 18 n'olw'ekyo bakkirizibwa okwewandiisa ng'abalonzi.

translation.en: Population estimates published by the Population Secretariat rise even more questions on the Electro Commission's 15 million voters.
translation.lug: Enteebereza y'omuwendo gw'abantu eyafulumizibwaeggwandiisizo ly'emiwendo gweyongera n'ebibuuzo ebisingawo ku balonzi b'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda obukadde 15.

translation.en: The estimates for 2010 show Ugandans of 18 years and above are 13.9 million, up from 12.9 million in 2008.
translation.lug: Ebyateberezebwa bya 2010 biraga bannayuganda eb'emyaka 18 n'okugenda waggulu bali obukadde 13.9 okuva ku bukadde 12.9 mu 2008.

translation.en: Given the high apathy among Ugandans to register for voting and death of some registered voters, the number of new voters would be fewer.
translation.lug: Olw'okuba nti Bannayuganda tebaagala kwewandiisa kulonda n'okufa kw'abalonzi abawandiise, omuwendo gw'abalonzi abapya gwandibadde wansi.

translation.en: However, the EC has said this is not the final figure.
translation.lug: Newankubaddde EC egambye nti guno si gwe muwendo ogw'enkomeredde.

translation.en: Even if some superman had inherited the presidency, it was practically impossible for anyone to govern Uganda.
translation.lug: N'omufuusa ne bwe yandisikidde pulezidenti, kyandibadde kizibu omuntu yenna okulembera Uganda.

translation.en: Various conflicting parties had begun fighting for power back in Moshi sorted out each other.
translation.lug: Ebibiina eby'enjawulo ebyali byatandika okulwanira obuyinza mu Moshi byatabagana.

translation.en: After the fall of Idi Amin, all successor regimes were nothing but caretakers, stop-gap measures, until the final showdown.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lwa Idi Amin okuva mu buyinza, emirembe gyonna egyaddako gyali gya kaseera buseera okutuuka lwe gyaviirawo ddala.

translation.en: This only happened in one thousand nine hundred eighty-six with President Yoweri Museveni's National Resistance Movement emerging as a victor.
translation.lug: Kino kyatuukawo mu lukumi mu lwenda kinaana mukaaga oluvannyuma lwa National Resistance Movement eya Pulezidenti Yoweri Museveni okuwangula.

translation.en: It is therefore surprising that Binaisa, in spite of all this, was able to hold on to power for nearly a year.
translation.lug: Nolwekyo kyewuunyisa nti nga oggyeko bino byonna, Binaisa yasobola okumala mu buyinza kumpi mwaka mulamba.

translation.en: Ugandans might as well be grateful that here was a man who never craved to be president.
translation.lug: Bannayuganda bayinza okuba abasanyufu nti wano waaliwo omusajja ataayayaanira kuba Pulezidenti.

translation.en: He held Uganda together, made her laugh and was gradually steering her to normality before the forces of instability struck.
translation.lug: Yakuuma Uganda nga eri bumu, yasekererwa naye mu mpola mpola baatandika okumwagala obutabanguko bwe bwali nga tebunnatuukawo.

translation.en: He asserted civilian supremacy by demoting the Army Chief of Staff, General Oyite Ojok.
translation.lug: Yakakasa obuyinza bw'omuntu wa bulijjo nga assa eddaala ly'akulira amagye, Genero Oyite Ojok.

translation.en: An umbrella government was embraced by National Resistance Movement once it came to power.
translation.lug: Gavumenti ey'awamu yateekebwawo National Resistance Movement bwe yajja mu buyinza.

translation.en: Binaisa was also not a corrupt president as his personal life reveals.
translation.lug: Binaisa naye yali Pulezidenti atalya nguzi ng'obulamu bwe obwa bulijjo bwe bulaga.

translation.en: Immediately after the loss of his presidency, he fled back to New York where he resumed his law practice.
translation.lug: Amangu ddala ng'avudde ku bwa pulezidenti, yaddayo e New York okuddamu okukola obwannamateeka bwe.

translation.en: In the year one thousand nine hundred eighty-six, soon after the National Resistance Movement government had come to power he returned.
translation.lug: Mu mwaka gwa lukumi mu lwenda kinaana mukaaga, amangu ddala nga National Resistance Movement ezze mu buyinza, yakomawo.

translation.en: He put up an unfinished shell at the top of Mutundwe hill.
translation.lug: Yazimbawo ennyumba etaggwa waggulu ku kasozi k'e Mutundwe.

translation.en: He opened a law firm, walked freely on the streets of Kampala as he had nothing to hide.
translation.lug: Yaggulawo kkampuni y'amateeka, yatambulanga kyere ku nguudo z'e Kampala nga talina kintu kyonna kya kukweka.

translation.en: After the violent death of former freedom fighter leader, Andrew Kayira fled back to exile in New York.
translation.lug: Oluvannyuma lw'okufa okw'effujjo okwa eyali omukulembeze omulwanirizi ow'eddembe, Andrew Kayira yaddayo mu buwanganguse mu New York.

translation.en: Museveni compatriot Andrew Kayira fled back to exile in New York where he took up a lowly job as a state attorney.
translation.lug: Munywanyi wa Museveni Andrew Kayira yaddayo mu buwanganguse mu New York gye yafunira omulimu ogwa wansi ng'omuwabuzi wa gavumenti.

translation.en: How many ex-presidents in Africa have had to work for a living once overthrown, given the exploitative regimes prevalent on the continent?
translation.lug: Abaaliko bapulezidenti bameka mu Afirika abasobodde okubaako ke beekolera nga bavudde mu buyinza nga waliwo emirembe eminyuunyunsi egiri ku ssemazinga.

translation.en: In the 1962 constitution, he always said he had to write the "pigeon hole constitution".
translation.lug: Mu ssemateeka wa 1962, buli kiseera yategeezanga bwe yalina okuwandiika ssemateeka alambika buli muntu gy'agwa.

translation.en: The"pigeon hole constitution" was written to fill a void after the one thousand nine hundred sixty-six crisis.
translation.lug: Ssemateeka alaga buli omu gy'agwa yawandiikibwa okuziba omuwaatwa oluvannyuma lw'akatyabaga ka lukumi mu lwenda nkaaga mu mukaaga.
